reviewText: $100 for a device that does so much (and continues to get more features via software updates on a regular basis). iTunes movies/tv shows in HD (both own and renting with your Apple ID), HBOgo, Netflix, Hulu, you name it.I am obsessed!
5 minutes out of the box and I feel like I've used this product forever. Nice small size. Wonderful product. Have sold 5 more of these to family members who have been over.
…be aware that you can't stream from your computer directly. Everything has to be MP4 coded and 'imported' to iTunes.
summary: Like it - just what I expected

reviewText: Able to watch all kinds of TV, instant access to Netflix, YouTube, Vevo, and so much more. I definitely recommend!

About me, I'm a tech guy with 30 years experience. Over the past 2 years I have heavily invested in the Apple Eco System. I have IPods, an iPad 2, a 2012 Mac Mini, and now Apple TV (newest version). It's been well stated that there is not a lot available for content outside of the Apple Eco System as compared to Roku, for example.I've hardwired the ethernet connection to my router from the Apple TV, as suggested, to avoid overloading my wireless capability at home.I'm running the latest version of the OS on the Apple TV, Mirroring my Mountain Lion and Ipad screens is very handy.I've updated my review and added a 4th star because the 'wired ethernet causing content load failure' issue has been addressed. The device needs to have more content available and have it available from the Itunes store. That's the only drawback at this point that I see, and it costs 1 star...I have seen one 'bug' in the current version of the software. Loading select Vimeo content caused an error message stating that the content wouldn't load because my TV didn't support the 'HDMC' protocol (an encryption protocol used by newer HDMI devices). Recommended fix was replugging my Apple TV into the TV. That didn't work. Cold booting the Apple TV did fix the issue.As others have stated, this is a no brainer if you already have Apple products, especially newer ones. If you don't have Apple products, then unfortunately at this time, I could not recommend this product to you, it simply wouldn't have the value per the cost to you... That's the bottom line.
summary: First Impressions - Needs more Content but Great for Up to Date Apple Users

reviewText: Absolutely fantastic. It's exactly what I expected from a Mac product-- easy to set up, easy to use, and works flawlessly with my other mac products. Definitely a must-have for any iPhone, iPad, or Macbook user.

Absolutely great little machine. A bit idiosyncratic and frustrating at times, but we do love it. The search entry with the remote is the most frustrating thing. Also how the only navigation is via the "Menu" button which takes you up one menu level at a time (You can hold it down a couple of seconds and it will take you to the top directly.)Works better with the "Remote" app on iPhone or iPad. This lets you enter search with a keyboard.  Still, it would be nice if there was a real GUI with the REmote app - like allowing you to select your application directly. Also - now so many apps that navigating is a pain. They should give option to put apps in a "not used" folder. 98% of what we do is Netflix.Still - overall - we love it.One great thing - go to Apple Maps on the iPad (or iPhone) - go to flyover - and send it to your big screen. VERY COOL!
summary: great little machine - but a few minor issues

reviewText: Absolutely LOVE Apple TV, This is the second one I have purchased.  It has great reception in my bedroom & now my living room........LOVE< LOVE< LOVE....You can stream videos from ITunes, Netflix, Hulu etc....
summary: This is my second Apple TV!!!!!!

reviewText: Absolutely love the Apple TV. I have been able to watch mlb.tv on it with high def. You can't go wrong with an Apple product
Absolutely no question as to whether anyone should get this if they have more apple devices. With Airplay, having the ability to stream from one device to the TV is wonderfull
summary: Perfect accompaniment to the rest of my Apple devices

reviewText: Absolutly love Apple TV, so much that I decided to get one for another TV in the house.  Lowered my Cable bill and now use itunes, and netflix to stream TV and Movies.  You can also "mirror" the iphone on your TV screen which makes searching the internet fun.

Admittedly, I have not Had the unit for more than a week by this time, but that is aside the point.MAIN Reason for selecting this unit was so that I or MA Hon could hook up and watch the contents of our other Apple Products, (POD, PAD, Air, Pro, Phone) on the TV Screen. and as far as this part is concerned, it serves its purpose, thou I still have to figure out how to interact on it with my Macbooks.Hook up, install and configuration was done in less than 15 mins, including the initial update.The User Interface, ie the Remot, leaves abundance to be desired, and With Iphone/iPad/Mac interaction, One would expect to be able to Input faster With the keyboard, but that is not supported.The connectivity is pretty standard, wifi or Ethernet for input, and HDMI for output.Surely i would had prefered if i could connect my external USB HDD to it too, but that is not supported. Then again, the item is a STREAMING Device. So that is Apparently not what it is suppose to doThe Pre-Set options that comes with this unit is VERY Limited. beside home sharing of the content on the Apple Products or the Purchases from ITunes, it only offers YouTube, Hulu and Netflix for streaming contents right off the internet. the search in youtube is easy and simple, but it lack the option to Sort or Refine the results with any criteria or catagory. at least I have not been able to locate the option to do so as of yet.

Admittedly, I was a bit intimidated, but determined. I actually got it up and running without calling tech support.The instruction pamphlet and website support is fairly good, maybe too much information online creating added confusion.The only perplexing head-scratch was the various on-screen "Submit" button activations. Eventually it is the "right" click off the keypad on the donut that takes you to the Submit button. Instructions for that was not exactly clear, and seemed many folks were hung up on that step.Follow the numerous instructions. And unplug and replug the cables if something doesn't work if you've done all the steps. Worked for me. Voila! I'm cooking with gas. So cool.Next step, Airplay.

Aesthetics: Apple Tv looks very sleek, it is pleasing to eye but also it doesn't isn't very eye-catching. 5/5Functionality: it connected almost instantly with my wifi network. I have to admit, I have it pretty nearby a router so connection has to be great. I bought this because the thought of airplay was just awesome. No cables. No strings attached. Tried it with a MacBook Air 11' 2012 model and the results were amazing. There was almost no lag at all. I could stream movies, surf the internet, just amazing! I also connected it with an iPad 2 the results were the same, I streamed a youtube video, image quality was also very nice. 5/5

After buying Apple TV my wife and decided we really didn't need to have Direct TV anymore. We can watch just about anything with out losing any of picture or sound quality that we enjoyed with Direct TV. Really the only thing missing is Amazon Prime.

After getting this and using it for a few months it became very apparent to me that I could finally cut the satellite. One thing I would recommend is either having an iphone or an ipad.  With either of those devices you can Airplay them on to your TV and watch pretty much any network TV show you want.  The other feature I love that I didn't expect was that all the music and movies you have in iTunes is available to play on the device.  I love this thing!

After reading some reviews, I had made plans to return this device for a Roku 2. I have the return mailing label (provided by Amazon) but before I place everything in the box, I gave it one more go around. And after reading MANY more reviews regarding Apple TV and Roku 2 and since I have EVERYTHING Apple (MacBook Pro, Mac Pro desktop and 2 iPads), I decided that the Apple TV (new version) is a keeper. Like everything else Apple it just works! Below line, if you are thinking differently, just stick with Apple!

After researching the differences between the Apple TV and Roku, I grabbed the top end Roku for a great price one of the times it was offered on Woot because it offers more services and was less expensive than the Apple TV. I never did hook it up, always next weekend's project, although the hookup is ridiculously easy. I never could get the Apple TV out of my head. Yes, it offers less services than Roku but as with all or most Apple products, the ease of use and seamless integration with other Apple devices can't be beat. I hooked up the Apple TV the day I got it. Just FYI, if you go through an HDMI switch you can't get sound without a toslink digital audio cable, at least I couldn't. No problem, I bought a toslink 1:3 switch on Amazon a while back so connecting the Apple TV with HDMI for video and toslink for audio was a breeze. Using Air Play in Mountain Lion and iOS 5 and 6 (Macbook Pro and Air, iPad 3rd gen, and iPnone 5 respectively) was just as seamless as advertised. There is a bit of lag but that's to be expected in Central Florida with the broadband traffic. Even with the slight lag, the ability to stream video and audio so easily is terrific. My iTunes Match music showed up almost immediately on my Samsung HD TV and in another couple of seconds the music started playing through my theater system. I inevitably have to bring work home so seeing my desktop on the big TV screen is a nice alternative, especially when I'm using my 11" MAcbook Air.Because I haven't hooked up the Roku, i can't say how its video and audio compare. Of course it doesn't do Air Play so there is no streaming from Apple devices to the TV.So why the 4 stars for the Apple TV? Even with my small hands, using the remote is frustrating. It's just so small that I'm forever pressing it incorrectly, causing delays when trying to navigate or type in passwords etc. I actually have to press it with my nail instead of the pad of my finger in order to be accurate. Also, the display on the Macbooks becomes so tiny when using Air Play that I can barely see it, although there's probably a way to adjust this other than by increasing the magnification manually.All in all, I don't regret my purchase. I'm not reinventing the wheel when I say that if you have a lot of Apple stuff, the Apple TV is the way to go. If not, the Roku may be the better choice.
summary: If you have Apple deices, this is the way to go

reviewText: After some initial pain of the apple server not being available it was very easy to set up.A very nice interface and allows good streaming from netflix or from my computer.I gave up on the cute little remote (that is too easy to misplace) and programmed my Logitech remote to control its functions.I do wish it had RCA audio out instead of just optical to make it more compatible and save me having to get an adapter.
A gift for my daughter in law. She really loves it and uses it all the time. Can stream videos and movies, etc.would definitely buy one for myself
a gift for my daughter she loves this both she and my son love the apple products and they use this all the time

Airplay is still under the infant stage. More apps need to support apple tv such as HBO Go and Netflix. However, so far it's great! Good product to play music videos or your song playlist without having to buy an expensive bluetooth speaker set.
Airplay works flawlessly. It even has the YouTube app (Roku doesn't !!). It would've been perfect if Airplay can play with Andriod devices too.
A little more comfortable than the original pair that apple made. Could wear it for a couple of hoursBroke after 2 weeks of use

A little unhappy with this unit right now- it's failed during the last three updates and requires a restore each time to be made usable again. I also want this unit to have Amazon Instant Videos added as a service, but I get that Apple doesn't play well with others and doesn't like to share the profits. So they don't work that way but they typically they make super high quality 'user-dumb' and highly usable equipment. Lastly, Air Play is very appreciated.
All Apple products are great. This one is no exception. All my Apple devices can be synced to/through the Apple TV. So cool!
All Apple products are of top notch quality.  It is surprisingly small and compact.  Works perfectly and is not another ugly device.
all excellent, as expected, excellent quality, easy to install, easy to user;, I am very happy with the item and my Iphone I can now connect to my TV
All the necessary apps available to enable you to cut the cord that is cable.  Appropriately priced. Just as easy to use as any other Apple product. Enough said.

Almost identical to the OEM product in size and quality.  Very happy with it.  The lightning connector is the same size as the oem, which is good.  The AmazonBasics cable is larger and doesn't work with my LifeProof case.

A lot of people see my AppleTV and still aren't sure what it does. Simply put, it can rent or buy on-demand movies and TV shows, buy music form the iTunes store, stream videos from Vimeo, YouTube or Netflix, plus Hockey, baseball and basketball (with a subscription).The feature I use most, however, is to stream the music and movies I already have on my computers to the TV in my living room. It's so easy to set up; just join your home wifi network, enter a name and password and you're all set. Any Mac or PC in the house, running iTunes, will automatically show up and stream to your TV.Yes, Roku, Xbox, PlayStation and other devices can do some or all of the above features, and if you have one of those, you probably don't need this. But the AppleTV is the simplest solution of them all. If you want something that a babysitter can figure out immediately without a lengthy training session, or something you can put in a guest room for company, or a way for your small children to watch their favorite cartoons over and over again, this is the way to go.

already own a first gen AppleTV and was game to try something else, so based on reading I did online and reviews, I bought a Roku 3 but was very disappointed by it, because it kept freezing during setup and I never even got to the point of using it. So I sent it back and bought a new AppleTV for my second TV. Stick with what you know, I guess, is the lesson.
Already own other Apple TV's and love them, needed this one for mobile presentations from my ipad - using the wireless screen share option makes it a breeze to do without being tethered to the tv.
also my son in law got it for christ mas for us and he say love it and work good

Although there are times when it chokes on streaming from the Apple server during high use periods,  if you pause the episode and get a drink, it usually has loaded by the time you get back. Great and easy to set up. I can even use my Flickr photos as a screensaver!

Although the Roku has more video services available, what I like most about the AppleTV is the way it integrates with my other Apple products. I'm reserving one star for when Hulu+ and an AppleTV app store appears. I was a HUGE fan of Walmart's VUDU service because of the streaming quality. VUDU, HBO GO and Hulu+ are all built into my Samsung Smart TV and I could get by without the Apple TV. But, I can afford to have an Apple TV in every room with an HDMI TV.If you have no Macs or iOS devices the cheapest Roku will do the job. But this AppleTV with 1080p is way more fun to use with my iPad 3, iPhone 4S, and MacBookPro. Sky Gamblers Air Supremacy is awesome and the Apple TV is small enough to take on trips.

Although we do not use this capability a lot. It works very well through the Apple N Router and a Samsung TV. It offers more options than TIVO for movies, etc. Of course it is not a DVR. If you want access to Netflix, You Tube, etc., this is a good product.
Always works, though wish that Apple would release more content like on the Roku.  Have had this since September 2012 without incident.
Amazing device! I use it for everything screw cable buy this! I even bring it to my friends and stuff so we can easily watch whatever we want.

Amazing product!!  I love it.  It is very user friendly.  I've owned a similar device for years which I've always liked and still do. However, the Apple TV makes everything so easy.  If you own an iPad or iPhone it is so easy to send your favorite shows to the Apple TV to view on the big screen!  We don't have cable and have found this to be a lot easier to see our cable shows rather than hooking up the laptop to the tv all the time!!  We will probably purchase another one soon for another TV.
Amazing product!  It keeps me at home and saves me money!!  Works extremely well and is very reliable, as to be expected from Apple.

Amazing!!! With the 1080 HD thhe video quality is superb -- as good as any blu ray DVD I have played. . Netflix streaming is excellent. I am on the 30 day free trial and I definiteely will subscribe  While newer movies and a lot of old movies are not included there is still ample material. Also there are a. world of TV series that are available from the first episode on. .The deciding factor in my selecting Apple TV over the latest Roku is the mirroring of the iPad (2 or later) screen onto the large screen TV. There were things that I could only watch on my computer that is a lot more enjoyable on the big screen TV.The remote is small but very good. I have had an older Roku for some time. The newer one also has 1080 hd capability and seems to sell for the same price. It might boil down to the mirroring.  No matter which one is right for you -- jump on it. I don't think it could get much better.I will add that the mirroring is a constant source of enjoyment.  It alone is worth the money.
summary: Wonderful picture and I love the iPad mirroring

reviewText: Amazon was offering the Apple TV for a 10% discount at the time I purchased it (since then Amazon has done this multiple times). Flawless execution, design, and build. Thanks, Apple & Amazon!
Am loving it because I can now watch Netflix and listen to radio and many other items.This is an amazing product that has revolutionized the TV industry.  GREAT product.Ger,Southington, CT

reviewText: Apple does it again. After having a Logitech Review with Google TV that gave me nothing but trouble, I upgraded to the Apple TV. Apple does it again with the adventure of technology meeting usefulness.  I can now stream my desktop to my HDTV, and with audio to boot.  Hard to find concerts, no problem. Apple mirroring excelent way for look every thing arround apple products, I'm use w iphone, ipad, macbook and mac mini

reviewText: Apple Products never let down. I have completely converted my home to Apple products and they simply perform better than any other similar products out there. Apple TV is great for the whole family and integrates with all our apple products.

Apple quality and efficiency of delivery from Amazon. Perfect combination!I am very pleased with the Apple TV. My two kids love animated films and programming from Netflix that Apple TV makes it even more interesting. I like that.

But it is probably just the matter of time.Overall, it is the great product.

Apple TV always works accordingly, did not like the fact that the remote died fast and need it replaced. Good product though.

Apple TV, another quality product if you are in the apple ecosystem this is a must have. Only thing I will say is if you get a "smart TV" the value of this device diminishes slightly... for things like NetFlix or YouTube videos for example

Apple TV doesn't disappoint. It is a quality, well conceived product with a clean logical interface as is the case with all of Apples products. It allows easy streaming of music and video directly from your computer, iPhone, iPad via AirPlay. Additionally, it provides complete access to iTunes. My only knock would be that I feel it should offer a few more channels.

Apple TV filled a need perfectly. I have a home theater without Bluetooth. Apple TV lets me wirelessly play music from my iPhone and MacBook through the home theater. I can also watch anything from my phone or computer on the large screen TV. And this is in addition to all the content available with the product. Installation was a snap. Just what I wanted.
Apple TV has a user friendly interface that is easy to learngreat for owners of other apple gear because of AirPlay

Apple TV has exceeded all my expections!  Hours and hours of great streaming.  It's so easy to use and right there, 24 hours a day!  I'm going to "cut the cable" to reduce the expense and go with broadcast TV, Netflix, and this little unit!

Apple TV has made my cord cutting experience tolerable.  I grew tired of increasing cable TV prices and having difficulty finding TV programming that I actually wanted to watch. I truly believe TV media is changing as we know it.  Apple TV and other streaming media devices are leading this change.PROS:- Airplay is awesome.- Did I mention that Airplay is awesome?- No really, Airplay is what sets apart Apple TV from all its competitors and really an amazing feature.  I digress...- I personally enjoy the following options on Apple TV:  YouTube, Apple Radio, iTunes via Airplay, Bloomberg News (surprisingly), Yahoo Screen (for SNL and The Onion), PBS, ESPN and NBA (for game highlights and short news clips) , Crackle, The Weather Channel, VEVO, Podcasts (which I never used before), and the Airplay Mirroring feature (mostly for Basic Hulu).- I can usually find something on Apple TV to occupy my time.  After all,  isn't that what TV is for?  It does take some effort to find something sometimes.  It's not like regular TV where you can just turn it on and all your programming is done for you.INTRIGUING OFFERS IF I FELT LIKE SPENDING MORE MONEY OR BEING MORE TECH SAVY:-Netflix, Hulu Plus, HBO GO-iMovie, Photos/Videos, FlickrCONS:- no amazon prime offering (however I think I read you can mirror Amazon Prime with an iOS device)- the remote works well however could be improved with a keyboard feature or headphone jack or sensor technology- no gaming features unless you use an iPad or iPhone with Mirroring- Mirroring did not work well straight out of the box (I had to alter my router settings to get rid of very jerky video playback.  This took me a while to figure out as no Apple representatives were able to help me.  I found the fix on some random messaging board.)- Video playback of HD quality video with mirroring is still slightly jerky.  Let me stress that the playback is only SLIGHTLY jerky.  It's to the point where its hardly noticeable to me.  It does not bother me, but it's not perfect.  My understanding is because it takes a lot of bandwidth to mirror from your device to the Apple TV.  I do not know that there is any way to completely fix this without running a cord.  Video playback used to be flawless using my HD cable. Despite all this, I value being able to mirror with Airplay more than running my HD cable.- not as much channel availability as the ROKU.  I have never used the ROKU, but I've heard that quality ROKU channels are few and far between despite their large channel lineup.WARNING:DON"T FORGET TO MAKE SURE YOU HAVE AN OPERATING SYSTEM ON YOUR APPLE DEVICE THAT IS COMPATIBLE WITH THE APPLE TV AIRPLAY FEATURE!BOTTOM LINE:If you are an Apple user already, I recommend the Apple TV.  If not, I think the ROKU is a fine option.  Apple TV and ROKU are especially valuable if you wish to "cut the cord" to Cable TV.MY TWO CENTS FOR THOSE "CUTTING THE CORD":Don't forget to use a quality TV antenna for those days when you cannot find something on your streaming media player.  TV via the antenna has come along way.

Apple TV.  How do I love thee?  Let me count the ways....No more DVD player.NetflixCan I get rid of cable yet?  Pretty soon.My only complaints, can't stream hbogo or PBS. I'm us they'll get there one of these days.  But it hasn't dulled my Apple TV love affair

Apple TV integrates very well with other Apple devices allowing you to easily stream videos or music to your TV.  Airplay Mirroring also works well for some things but not others.  For example, I originally bought this with the intent to stream Amazon Instant movies through my Prime membership to my TV.  That didn't work out well--I found out later that Amazon Instant seems to have some issues (even when just streaming directly to my Mac) that made for a bad viewing experience.Watching movies on the Apple TV through iTunes is awesome, but not very cost effective.  I ended up signing up for Netflix and that has worked out great.
summary: Works best with a subscribed service

reviewText: Apple TV is absolutely essential for any home with internet and apple products. I am already planning to order another one soon!

Apple TV is a fantastic product allowing users to view new content through multiple services. Netflix, Hulu, iTunes and more are all available through Apple TV. The remote is thin and streamlined for easy use and the unit has Wi-Fi and the option to be wired. It is small and unobtrusive. For the features, the unit is also priced well. I have three of these units throughout my home and all of them work well and function with my iPad, iPhone and Mac. Reduce the cable package, save some money, and buy an Apple TV.

Apple TV is a stellar product. If you have a Netflix account you owe it to yourself to try one out but even if you don't, there enough content available via streaming these days (more being added all the time) so that it's a great value.If you have a nice HD TV adding a product like this or a Roku or both is a relatively inexpensive way to get excellent content on your TV without adding the monthly expense of premium cable channels.Products like AppleTV and Netflix are part of the disruption that will be the end of cable TV as we know it.If you have other Apple products (iPhone, iPad, Mac) using AirPlay to share content on AppleTV is an added bonus.

Apple TV is a very typical product from the tech giant.Takes less than 5 minutes to setup once outside the box. The Apple TV integrates seamlessly with iTunes, Netflix, Huluplus, Youtube, and few other channels. It has VIMEO which has loads of videos.Compared to Roku or other boxes, Apple TV capability is limited as to the # of channels. Price is not cheap either. BUT remember, it is Apple, reliable, cool and classy and you'll love using it.

Apple TV is awesome for HD tvs, but if you own an ipad like I do, I personally don't see a good enough reason to pay $100 plus another $25 for iTunes Match, just to use your iOS device on your TV. There's other, easier and cheaper methods which I cannot say ;) but its a cool apple item

Apple TV is a wonderful device.  We have them at at each of our homes because we value the seamless way they not only let us send music and pictures from our computers to our TV, but allow us to access things like Netflix.

Apple TV is better than ever, but still not perfect. That's why only four stars.  You might consider a Roku box as an alternative that starts out even cheaper at about half the price.  If you're already bought in to the Apple "environment" however, I'd recommend this.

Apple TV is cool. It'll be even cooler when they realize how great this device can really be, and we get a lot more apps for it.Currently a little limited (hence the 4 stars), but what it does do, it does well.I love using AirPlay to listen to my iTunes library on my Denon home theater receiver.

APPLE TV is easy to add on to existing TV.  Adds wide variety of additional options to your potential viewing choices.  Also allows you to project photos, keynote presentations, videos from you iPhone or Apple computer with ease.  Versatile with frequent updates to units options/capacity.

Apple TV is everything that I imagined it would be. I was really trying to decide what to say when writing this review but, this product tells everything it self. Like at this moment, I was trying to decide if I wanted the new xbox one or the PS4. Then, I thought, I have an Apple TV that is just amazing. It runs fast, no delays, very responsive. Remote is very little, not another big remote that usually comes with a tv or cable box. Netflix is in HD, everything is in HD. It had a recent update that made it even better. Has numerous of apps. Netflix, HULU Plus, WWE TV, NBA TV, ABC TV, HBO GO and Crackle. I can go on and on about everything the APPLE TV has but, back to what I was saying. Xbox one, has all the entertainment features and gaming. Why pay an extra $100 for a product, that I had already paid $100 for that does everything that I need entertainment wise. So, I decided I'm going to eventually get the PS4. Now, enough about my xbox one or ps4 decision. The product is great. It's small, almost to the point that it's about as long as a credit card for it's width and height and the depth of it, is easily only about 3 inches. It won't take much room at all. The remote is small and is great. The added feature though, is if you're like myself and own numerous apple products already. The Apple TV let's you airplay anything that you see on your phone to your tv including pictures, videos, music, apps, messages. Anything. The other cool thing abut this product that I love so much is the fact that you can get the remote app for free in the apple store on your iPhone and use your iPhone as a remote for it. Instead of dealing with an extra remote, you can just leave the remote app running and always have your remote and it's free of buttons, so you just roll your fingers anywhere you want your apple tv to go when selected a product. That concludes why I love this product and why I give it a 5 out of 5 star rating. I would for sure recommend it to a friend and, I would just give them all the run downs and how they wouldn't regret making the awesome purchase.
summary: Apple TV is a Great Product!

reviewText: Apple TV is fantastic. It's easy to configure and I highly recommend this product to any other users considering purchasing it.
Apple TV is great....especially with kids...can stream all your iTunes movies and music. Also love the different apps on it and seeing my photos on the tv.

Apple TV is great for entertaining.  We have the Apple TV on a big screen in our screen room and we show photos, movies, play music, etc. all the time.  Wireless to my computer and iTunes, so no problem with running wires.  I did have a problem with the screen saver stopping after 30 minutes, then having to restart the Apple TV before it would connect to the PC again.  I downloaded the latest software and there must have been a fix in there because it hasn't done it since.All you do for the screen saver of your photos is make a folder on your computer and then point your iTunes to it via the iTunes software.  The screensaver can do various effects to bring photos in and out.  Very nice for family photos or vacation photos when you have people over.

Apple TV is great for homes with iPhones and iPads. We got it primarily to stream our pictures as a screensaver on the TV and are enjoying airplay and the built in apps as well. Easy to set up. Amazon as usual has super fast shipping and great prices!

Apple TV is great for use in either home or office. You can not only do nearly everything you can do on iTunes on the Apple TV, but you can AirPlay from any Apple device. Airplay is what I most use Apple TV for. Airplay has the ability to play or view any music, video, photo and even what is on your screen wirelessly through WIFI or Ethernet to the Apple TV from your Apple device. It provides 1080p FHD HDMI output and Dolby Digital sound quality. Rather a slideshow or PowerPoint presentation for work or just music and movies as I do, it's a great product. You can also choose from a variety of apps like PBS, ABC and HBO and many more to stream on demand directly from the Apple TV!
Apple TV is great.  I highly recommend it. Very compact, easy to use, and super dependable. Keep track of that tiny remote, though. It's easy to lose.

Apple TV is just great and will change the way you listen to music and watch TV at home. Basically, now I arrive home and set the music I want from my iPhone wirelessly and listen it through a LG sound system connected to the Apple TV. All hassle free.The same works for watching videos I have in my iPhone or in my computer at home. Just send it via AirPlay and watch on your TV.Additionally, the home screen from the Apple TV let you stream media from your computer or iCloud or Hulu or Netflix or YouTube which is nice if you pay for any of these services.I'm totally happy with this purchase. The 99 bugs are totally worth it.
Apple TV is just so perfect for family with all Apple's products. So convenience. Easy to set up and use also.

APPLE TV IS MY FAV.... bought this one for my gf.  She has no cable but with this bad boy... she can use my passwords for the various apps and I can now watch sports at here place on the ESPN app!  THANK YOU SWEET BABY JESUS!

apple tv is nothing special in my opinion.Pros:NetflixCool sleek remoteairplayCons:Boring channelsstreaming issues with wireless sometimesRecommendation: build yourself a cheap htpc and directly connect it to your router and you defeat anything apple tv and/or roku can offer.
Apple TV is one of the best creation that a man/woman could ever have. It's so HD and so easy to use better than all those product that was mimic on this device.

Apple TV is one of the simplest steaming boxes to use! I will say that it does not have all of the channels. I use Amazon Prime and you already know that app is not on there LOL. But everything else works great. When coupled with a Mac computer, you can steam your screen onto your TV through the ATV, which is a cool feature. And when streaming music from an iTunes library, you get large cover art that makes your tv look like a jukebox. That's one of my favorite uses, besides watching tv shows.

AppleTV is probably the best mini set top box. The interface is much smoother and slicker than other boxes and smart TVs or Blu-Ray players I've tried. And if you also own other Apple gear, you can use Airplay which is amazing.The only downsides are 1) No Amazon 2) No PLEX 3) No way (without hacking) to add/remove apps.
summary: AppleTV is probably the best mini set top box.

reviewText: Apple TV is really amazing and super easy to use. I would recommend it to everyone. The apps are great and they are adding more all the time.
Apple t v is small work great,this is more than I through it would be.i recommend this for anyone this is a 10star
AppleTv is so easy to use my 8 yr old daughter loves to show videos on our tv from her IPad mini.  Very easy to configure and set up
summary: A smart buy for any Apple Device user

reviewText: Apple TV is streaming smoothly. Apps launch with lag and hi-def streaming looks amazing. I love the fact that it starts within a second of turning it on. The remote is minimal and portable.
Apple TV is the best, Lots of Movies in the store, Youtube watching and Airplay is great and fast.I recommend it to everyone especially to people who own Apple devices.

Apple TV is very good.  I use it a lot.  Apple makes your life easier on everything they develope.  Streaming on Netflix HD, HULU plus, HBO Go, are just fantastic apps.I hope all tv channel were added to the apple tv.Just Great.Winston
summary: Very nice and easy to use product

reviewText: Apple TV is working better than I expected.  Easy and simple installation and setup, as I would expect from an Apple product.  I did have a problem with audio at first, but immediately found a fix online in Apple Support that took about 10 seconds to perform (simply turning my wifi off, and on again from my computer).  Total time to setup, even with the search and fix was 15 minutes.  I found ATV to have functionality and video channels beyond the music and photo/video streaming from my computer that I was wanting.  I was especially surprised to find that with AirPlay, I can use my TV as a monitor for my MacBook Pro.  I am very happy with Apple TV.

Apple TV is working out great for our family. I just wish it could host/store home movies on the device and not stream them from iTunes. Oh, well, I just have to make sure our computer is fired up and iTunes is up and running.
summary: Apple TV is working out great for our family

reviewText: Apple TV just keeps getting better and better as new channels are added. As Apple puts their plan in place to do to the video world what they did for the music , phone and computer world

Apple TV (MD199LL/A) is a pretty good supplement to my entertainment system. You can access many different non-apple accounts from; the NHL network to Vimeo and from youtube to Netflix. Also, you have the same access to the iTunes store that you would from a computer (albeit in a different interface). The real great thing about appleTV is that you can "mirror" your macbook and iphone to your television - this basically means that you can watch your computer screen on your TV. This only works if you have the iPhone 5 (or newer) and a 2011 or newer macbook pro - I'm not sure about other apple products, so please read the fine print before buying! Also, with slightly older apple technology (say iPhone 4) you will still be able to use airplay to play music and videos.However, I feel that apple is still lacking in the total user interface with appleTV. As of April 2013, they do not have access to an app store, so what you see on the main screen is what you get.

Apple TV MD199LL/A [NEWEST VERSION]I wanted the Apple TV so I could access recorded shows from my DVR onto another TV.  I wanted it to be able to access my DVR and transfer live TV to my other TV.  After I bought it, I read some discouraging reviews stating that Apple TV can not stream HBO GO or others.  The Apple TV DOES enable me to stream HBO GO in full screen mode using AirPlay and not by mirroring.  I access NPR music and PBS apps on my Ipad, and play the concerts and shows on full screen ( a 42 inch LG and a 55 inch LG led 3D tv.) I do the same with HBO GO too.  All of these work on Ipad 2 and 4 and Ipod Touch 4. The clarity of the picture is incredible, better than the Roku -- which is pretty good and beats most built in smart apps included with newer DVR's and "smart" TV's.I use DishAnywhere on my Ipad and can access all the live TV channels I subscribe to including any and all in either HD or SD.  I can access ShowTime and HBO as well as NBC or Comedy Central.  I access DishOnDemand and watch the shows on my large TV from the Ipad.  I am also able to access my stored shows and movies from the DVR and play them on the Ipad and then via Apple TV view and listen to them on the large screen TV in full HD quality.  I am not using 'mirroring.'Note: My Apple Ipad 2 does not allow me to access Dish Anywhere except only by "mirroring." That is not as good of an option since I cannot get the entire TV screen filled this way.  Also, regardless of which device I use, the Amazon app for the Ipad ( or Ipod Touch) will only broadcast the sound not the picture, so I would have to use mirroring for that app, but I have had a Roku 2XS, and I use that for Amazon Video streaming to access my Prime movies and others.The video quality on the Apple TV is brighter and appears to offer more definition and clarity than the Roku --- which, again provides an excellent picture.  I do not use Netflix but my wife is trying a one month sub only to get Blu Ray DVD's of a certain TV series. The Netflix app on the Apple TV is by far the best HD quality picture one can get.  The You Tube app is excellent since I can also use my paired Blue Tooth keyboard to search the Your Tube site.  The WSJ site is good too.  I am taken aback as to how much I can stream in HD from my Ipod Touch 4. I am using the Ipod over the Ipad to access the apps and DishAnywhere.Of course I can access the my iTunes library but I don't care to listen to the music on my TV.  I have a few movies in my library that I acquired via ultra violet or something like that which I have in my iTunes cloud. Playing them back from ?wherever they are via the Apple TV is a real pleasure. The color and picture quality are the best.  Apple still reigns supreme when it comes to producing a great visual and sound product.
Apple TV mostly works as advertised.  It's a little quirky in our environment but what it can do it does consistently.  My students are able to quickly demonstrate their work to others as am I.
summary: Like a lot of Apple products ...

reviewText: Apple tv promises it can do a lot of things, and it upholds some of them. Yes, sadly, only some.Can it stream your itunes library if your macbook is open? Absolutely! This is easily my favorite feature, and a great way to watch digital copies of movies and tv shows.Can you stream HBO Go? Sort of, if you don't mind buffering literally every minute unless you let the program load for several minutes. (I tried this on several internet connections, and still it was dodgy service at best. I blame this problem more on HBO than Apple)Can you stream Netflix? See HBO Go entry.Can you stream YouTube? Surprisingly, yes.Is Apple TV user friendly? It depends on your knowledge of apple and mac products I guess. For me I had to do a lot of googling to figure out how to make the darn thing work.Is it easy to set up? Most definitely. It's two cables and a box.Honestly I would give this a much lower review, but I got the thing for dirt cheap after Christmas, so it wasn't a total loss. However, if you are thinking about paying full price for one of these I would advise against it. Overall, I would NOT recommend this product.

Apple TV provides a far superior viewing experience than Chromecast. There is no latency between what is projected on the primary device (iPad or Mac) and TV. The pricture quality is excellent and is easy to use. I'd recommend Apple TV over Google's Chromecast
summary: Apple TV by far better than Chromecast

reviewText: Apple TV provides instant access to my entire iTunes library of movies, TV shows, and music with a fantastically simple remote.  It's hard to imagine a better, more intuitive way to get at audio and video files.  My TV/Blu-Ray combo is by LG and includes smart TV, but Apple TV is easier to use and much faster streaming or downloading content.  Actually, I suppose there is one thing I could ask for - closed captioning of the same quality as a good disk.  But to the best of my knowledge, nobody does that, so we wait.

Apple TV rocks! Make your tv into a mobile system, love the airplay feature for sharing YouTube videos, pictures, and videos! Definite must have for apple families. Can't believe we waited this long to get one!
Apple TV's are the best. No more buying DVD's. The cost of a movie is the same on iTunes. You can listen to your music, watch photo slides and connect to other internet sites.

Apple TV seems to be behind the curve to ROKU's channel offerings. They are expanding with more channels (AE and Historty) but mostly with those who already have cable television subscribers. Currently, the service is available to customers who subscribe to DirecTV, Verizon FiOS, and Cablevision Optimum, with support for additional providers coming in the near future. I have Comcast so i am out of luck.There are a couple of issues.Inputting username and password is a bear with the small remote control. Once it is done you should not have to re-enter the information.No Amazon Prime.
Apple TV, what more needs to be said. It's a great product.
Apple tv works exactly how it says.  Works great with my ipad2 and picture quality is exceptional.  Very satisfied with this product and the price is fair.

Apple TV works great but it does have a few quirks.  First of all, right out of the box is that annoying voice which I had to immediately learn how to turn off.  Airplay is quirky.  Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't(we've been using it with my wife's iPad).  I've also noticed that sometimes after enabling airplay on this device, that it will turn off after the unit is put in sleep mode.  Other than these few annoyances, the unit works well, picture is crystal clear, and the menus and organization is great.  I would recommend this.
summary: I like it but it has a few quirks...

reviewText: Apple TV Works great for streaming from your I pad or I phone.Great for looking at pictures ,TV shows,Movies, U Tube. Etc.
Apple works. It also rocks because it is easy to use. This is such a product and I can't believe I took so long deciding.

Apple would be genius if they used a bluetooth remote for this. The device itself is great and i stream movies in HD from my desktop to it and my music with no issue. Navigating the menus is a little annoying and the remote is a line-of-sight remote which can be annoying. BUT it integrates well with using a iPhone as your remote very well. Easy to set up with homesharing.
Arrived as expected.  Love it. I cancelled Sirius radio when I started playing it.  Also I now can get Netflix.
Arrived on the day they predicted and was very easy to install.  No problems with reception.  Then bought one for my daughter who wanted to get rid of her cable bill. A bit pricey though.
summary: Installation a Breeze and a Great Device

reviewText: As all Apple equipment, this is another great device.Easy to setupJust pay attention, cause you need newer Mac/Macbook Pro/IPad to stream videos
as all apple products it is a little over priced. Bought it for the a friend overseas, no other choice if you want to wirelessly watch your ipad on the TV.
As all products from Apple this one is amazing. I can watch all media from my macbook, beam my iPad display to TV via AirPlay, watch Netflix and many other things. Recommended!
As always apple creates great products that are simple and easy to use. I would be willing to recommend the apple TV to any one

reviewText: As always Apple does it right.  Sleek, good looking, easy to hook up ( if you have a newer TV) and intuitive if you have used Apple privets before.
As an apple fan, I bought one or two apple tv's every time I can for selling to my family and friends..I love this product!
As Apple has us acostumed this is a great product.  Only thing is for it to be able to see files from a NAS, with that it would be perfect.
As every other Apple product, this one exceed it's expectations. Package arrived as noted on order and the item was brand new, simply amazing

As I live in an ipad, iPhone, iMac world this little device brings them all to my large screen TV. People crying about Amazon video not working have not heard about airparrot for the Mac.  That program allows me to watch my Amazon movies and other videos on my TV.  Also my new Vizio smart TV has Amazon built in so I'm covered. reviewText: As long as your videos play in iTunes, they will play on the Apple TV. I had seen so much online about jailbreaking the Apple TV2 or using Plex with Apple TV3, but you don't have to do any of that stuff if you are okay with the built in GUI and don't mind converting your files to mp4. I wish I could airplay more than audio from my iPad 1, but besides that, I have no complaints.
As per my expectation, happy with price and enjoyed it well so far. Packing was good too! It was good!
As soon as I got the  Apple TV, I plugged to the TV and that was it! I love how the Apple products are so easy to use. This was a great buy and a great product!!!

As the device itself look sleek and good, it don't have much app as others said.  If you have itunes account with lot of movies, then it may be useful.  I know this when i buy, the main reason i bought this iplay (mirror) and its not as good as i expected.  It should least have amazon instant etc.  Little disappointed as i have couple of iphones and an ipad.

As the title hints, our household is already well furnished with Apple products. And as it has been said in other reviews in this thread, it will be a much more positive user experience for people who have Mac computers, or iPad / iPhone / iTouch, for these last three can be used as remote controls with an excellent free app ("Remote") from Apple.
As usual, Apple products superior to itself.Ease of use and absorbing.I received the shipment in a short period of timeRecommend this product is a unique experience
As usual, I loved it. I never ever have any problem with it for last 1 year. Beautiful stuff. Recommend it.

reviewText: As usually all apple devices are great one and this apple TV doing good with me and my TV!! Thanks

As with all Apple products, it is a quality item. It is a must have for iPad owners. It has Netflix, Hulu plus, YouTube, and many other programs. It has Internet radio, with your choice of hundreds of stations. And for iPad owners, for the screensaver it uses your photo stream photos. It also mirrors your iPad on your TV set. I would however, like to see more features in the future.

As with most Apple products its very easy to use. I love being able to stream Spotify directly from any of my devices to the Apple TV that is plugged into my Yamaha surround sound via digital optical cable. There are quite a few apps on the device but ones that aren't can easily be streamed from any IOS device by clicking the airplay icon. Once ATV was plugged into my network the icon appeared on all of my devices so there was no set up involved.
As you probably know, Apple products are never on sale.  This was!  No taxes or shipping make it a great value.  Love watching movies and viewing our pictures on our 52 inch TV!
As you would expect with an apple product, hook it up and away you go. Simple, easy to use, always works.
At first, it had a hard time connecting with my iPhone.  But by the next day or so, it worked great!  Been happy with Apple TV ever since.

At first I was worried about buying Apple TV because its online descriptions and its paperwork did not indicate that it could do what I wanted it to do: mirror what was on a iPad screen. However, I talked with other people who have Apple TV and received assurances that it would mirror. I have been really happy with it. The only trouble is that, when mirroring, it sometimes stalls or gets out of sync with the images on the iPad -- not often, though.

at times apple stuff is expensive and needlessly so, however the apple tv at under 100 dollars is good value for the amount of entertainment you can control with just the one device. worth it for anyone using hulu, netflix, or even youtube.

Average-build and it serves the purpose. I actually needed it in my car since the original apple cable is not retractable and I was not happy with cable clutter in front of me! I wish apple makes similar item (retractable cable).
Awesome, able to connect my new macbook pro r to apple tv. Enjoying watching "Once Upon A Time" abc television show on it.  Great if you big supporter of apple products.

Awesome alternative to getting a smart tv. Apple tv is probably even better than a smart tv because you can stream content from any apple device (not the ipod shuffle) onto the tv through airplay. Makes for great party accessory because you can throw a slide show or music from your ipad or iphone to the surround sound speakers.
