reviewText: Awesome device. If you have your ITunes on the cloud this device will let you stream all of your music through your TV and audio receiver. Easy to use and set up.
Awesome hardware if you are an Apple fanatic , I currently have several apple products and they work seamlessly together including the AT3.I would recommend this product to a friend
Awesome little box that allows me to watch Netflix et al. on my HDTV. Order right from the screen. Did I say awesome? Yes, I am an Apple fan.
Awesome! Love my apple tv. One of the best things i have bought! Great device for air play. Fast shipping, new product!
Awesome product for people who do not want to pay the high price of having cable in NYC.We love our Apple TV and it took less than 5 minutes to get up and running!

Awesome product if you are an apple user!  Even if you don't prefer apple products and rather use other devices... this little box is great to have if you are always online and have the TV going!  Go out and get one on Amazon when it is cheaper (bought on Black Friday & price didn't change when it was Cyber Monday).  Best thing about purchasing from Amazon.com:  No tax! (well, at least in my state)
awesome product.. no complaint... easy set up .. wish it comes with clear instruction of software information and menu set up
Beats Chromecast by 10,000%. Easy to use, works as stated.  If you purchase you will not be disappointed.  As always Apple put out another great product.
Been an Apple user for a few years with a substantial investment in content.  I love using this little box to share my collection, stream from other devices.  Glad I have this!

Been debating the whole AppleTV thing for about six months now! Bought Google TV Logitech review set-top box found out I hated it!! My built-in Samsung smart TV's web browsers three times faster than Google TVs chrome browser with their Logitech review.. So I bought the Apple TV. Love it the remote is very cool wafer thin the box is nice and Compact.. First of all YouTube has zero problems buffering and streaming Unlike some of the other devices I have tried with YouTube.. including Google TV!! And the newest model has Hulu. The navigation menus are very user-friendly to navigate. Netflix YouTube and Hulu it works great. Also if u have a iPhone you can download the remote control and link it to your AppleTV so when you type you don't have to scroll using the remote to type each painstaking letter one by one.. If you already own any other type of Apple device then this is a must for you to get!! You won't be sorry!! I'm just sorry that I didn't get this thing in the first place when I considered it Months ago..
summary: APPLE TV.. BUY IT BUY IT BUY IT!!!!!!!!!

reviewText: Before purchasing an Apple TV, I was using the Apple HDMI Cable to connect my iPhone/iPad to my TV.  Because I already had that cable, I wasn't sure if buying an Apple TV was going to be any improvement for me. I'm glad I took the chance.  Now I can do Airplay mirroring all wirelessly!  I can easily share photos and videos from my iPhone/iPad on my TV without needing to stand nearby for the wire.  I am a Netflix customer and another great benefit is being able to access the on demand Netflix movies right from Apple TV.  The Netflix interface is beautifully designed and easy to use.  I also like the fact that the Apple TV will automatically power down after a period of inactivity, so you can leave it plugged in all the time.  The only thing I didn't like about the Apple TV is that when you have to type something such as your Netflix login, you have to navigate an on-screen keyboard with the Apple TV remote, which is not very easy.

Being able to have my iTunes library played on our big screen TV is wonderful.  Netflix, HuluPlus and the MLB app are also inlcuded.  We subscribe to MLB package so now we can take it with us when we travel with our AppleTV.

Being an devout Apple product purchaser and user, I never really had the desire to use or purchase an Apple TV (aTV). But just last week, my family "Cut The Cord" from our Dish Network, picked up Hulu and Netflix and have enjoyed the results. Partly because the aTV offers us the freedom of having all the services we have come to enjoy in such an easy device, but also this device isn't static. Clean interface and extremely easy setup, the aTV offers the ability for my family to use it anywhere (given there is an internet connection).Pros:-The Apple Tv is clean. Being slightly bigger than a hockey puck and almost as thin, this little device can be placed virtually anywhere.-With more than one service (Now) currently available, the device makes it really nice to watch different content without having to pay the large price tag that comes with cable.-With Netflix, Hulu, MLB, NBA, NHL, iTunes, Vimeo and many more available, the hours that have been spent and will be spent are going to be countless.-1080p content on the Apple TV is visually Astounding. Even at 720p, the graphics and display of the aTV making watching TV more enjoyable with crisp, clean graphics.-User interface is extremely simple. With navigation of the device with the Apple Remote (which comes with the device) or the Remote App for iPad, iPhone, iPod Touch, makes traversing the content and options easy and quite simple compared to the Roku  or Netgear Neo.Con: (Yes there are a few)-Unlike many other services (Xbox Live, Playstation Network, Roku, Netgear Neo, Boxee), Apple TV doesn't offer other options such as Crackle, Voodu, Ultraviolet, or other services. If Apple hasn't released it in an update, it's not there.-Although much of the content can be accessed via Netflix and other services, not being able to access downloaded movies from Amazon or even your external HardDrive is a huge Con especially if your not limited to just one service provider for content.-iTunes is great for movies, music and tv shows, but there are many networks that allow these to be streamed for free over the internet. The Apple Tv doesn't allow for any connection to them (Unless your willing to break your warranty by Jailbreaking (unsuggested)).-There is no music services like Pandora, Last.Fm, or Spotify available.-HDMI is the only connection and is not supplied with the device.Overall:If you are looking for a great media streamer, with NetFlix, Hulu, many sports and the ability to watch previous movies/shows that have been purchased or downloaded with iTunes. Then Apple TV is right for you. Unlike many of the other media streamers, the interface and controls are much smoother and the experience is more enjoyable. If you have ever used or owned an Apple Product, the same quality that is used to make those products is used here with the Apple TV.I have tried and used many other of the media players and can say that you get what you pay for. $100 is seems like nothing when you don't pay $100's of dollars a year for cable/Dish services.

Being most TV's are smart TV's now the programming that comes with this seems a bit redundant. Also they are mostly subscription based so essentially I have a YouTube viewer. I bought it mostly so I could stream from my iPad. It was alright but a cable half the price would have done the same thing for my iPad. If they had more free channels in it I might like it more.
Being that this is an Apple product, it is just as I expected... Fantastic! There have been no issues thus far. A must buy!
Best aspect of the Apple TV is the display of the slideshow. Enjoy watching and remembering those wonderful memories again and again.
Best device ever!! It has changed our lives. Had a few glitches but those were easily trouble shooter. Definitely recommend this, even if you do not have Apple devices.
Best investment ever!!! This is a great gift idea for anybody...works well showing pictures from your phone and playing music a definite buy!!!

Best investment I could have made. I will never watch network TV again. Got rid of cable bill and also bought one for my parents. Picture always sharp and even works when wifi signal is compromised. So happy with this purchase, worth every cent - especially all of the ones being saved not having cable!
Best item we ever bought.  Makes me want to give up cable TV forever.  This provides me with programming I want when I want it.  I love it.
Best part is you can beam anything from an apple product to your TV.  Has had to be reset a few times but works most of the time
best present i got for my daughter. she absolutely loves it. all her friends cant wait to get one for them selfs
Best product of it's kind.
Best thing ever!  No more wii for Netflix, no wires showing, great to connect to my iPhone.  Good variety of standard features
Best thing since TV!!HD movies, download entire TV series. I will never go to another movie theater again. This is perfect for a big HD screen in a home theater.
Best UI. And syncs with you iOS deceives. It's great. Can't wait until the adds more channels.  It'll be great!

Best way to view Netflix! This makes a great replacement for my BluRay player which was streaming, terribly. The ATV is easy to set up & use and absolutely worth the $99.The addition of iTunes radio is fun - I push the signal through my receiver and it's like having a free concert in my living room.
Bottom line is that APPLE TV is nice but it is only as good as your internet service.  If you don't have HIGH speed, don't bother with this.
summary: Make sure you have good internet

reviewText: Bought an Apple TV for myself about 5 years ago and love it. Picture quality is better than a standard DVD. Bought this one for Christmas for my parents.
Bought as a gift and now I want one.  The manual is a bit lacking but once you get the hang of it it's great.

Bought as a gift for my boyfriend and he was stoked.  Needs and HDMI cable to go with it, however you can access Netflix, HBO to go, HULU, and youtube.  I wish I could play my amazon movies from it yet, but maybe they will get the rights later.  Good for playing slideshows of pictures from other apple devices, don't need a DVD player, you can just play the DVD in your computer and play it through the apple TV.  Can easily rent movies from iTunes and play all my music and videos from my computer.  Great for the price, good gift for men who like gadgets and Apple :o)
Bought a second Apple TV when I moved my old TV into the bedroom. Make a dumb TV a smart TV for less $$s.
summary: Second Apple TV for box for bedroom TV.

reviewText: Bought for a gift for my 77 year old mother. Mr. Tech Support had to figure the thing out (actually called on my 28 yr old son to help with AirPlay)Works well, just one regret - I could have had "Geniuses" configure it for me!
Bought it as a gift.  They love it.  You can't go wrong with it.  Will purchase more in the future.
Bought it as an xmas gift for my parents and they love it.  It was easy for them to setup on their own and start using which is a plus.
Bought one when they first cam out with apple tv and loved it.  Now we bought this one and still love it.
Bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter and she is thrilled with it.  Says it offers so many online viewing options that she is cancelling her cable service.
Bought this as a gift for my folks. They didn't know what this was at first but now are in love with their Apple TV and couldn't live without it!
Bought this as a gift.  They love it as they have now replaced all their older devices with Apple products.  Great for pictures, music, and watching streamed shows and movies
Bought this as a gift.  They LOVE it.  :-)

Bought this as a present for my dad who is Apple everything.  I have a Roku but no apple devices.  He loves Apple TV and uses airplay from his macpro to the tv.  Pretty coolProduct arrived on time, packages well.  No issues.

Bought this for Christmas, it's great. Very easy to use, so much fun to use with the iPad home sharing. Only feature "missing" that I'd like to see is the ability to control it remotely using voice commands (have gotten used to this with the Xbox Kinect with the Netflix/Hulu/Amazon Video apps), but that's just a wish, and probably will be included someday.Great buy, especially if you have an iPad or new iPhone that does the home sharing.
Bought this for my boyfriend and he loved it! It was shipped fast with no problems. It is a little confusing for ME of how to get certain apps to show on tv.

Bought this for my daughter and her hubbie for Xmas. They are both apple computer everything in their home. Phones, computers, laptops, iPads, you name it it's an apple product. They love this Apple TV MD 199LL/A. As soon as they got home to their house they had it set up. They use it all the time and love it. They are both artists, graphic designers and teachers. They have made me an apple user now and I  love them.
Bought this for my father for Christmas. He has loved it since he got it. Great product. I'm going to buy one for myself now.
Bought this for my living room, already had one for my bedroom. It's a must for anyone looking to fully take advantage of Apples offerings!

Bought this for my sister last Christmas.  She loves it and uses it regularly.  Install was simple.  The device and remote, of course being an Apple product, has a sleek and simple design to it that makes it blend in and easily hidden from sight.  However, I would have probably bought her the Chromecast had it been available when I was looking at this.

Bought this for my stepson for Christmas.  It is a very neat product as are most Apple products.  He really enjoys it and the neat thing is he can put his computer on the tv so we can all view things together on large screen.

Bought this for my wife for while she was off on maternity leave.  We have Comcast cable with almost all of the channels.  The appletv has easily supplanted that, and is her primary source of tv now.  I like the screensaver feature which does a cool little moving collage of the pictures you have taken with other apple devices, and put on your home network.  Very nice.

Bought this to be able to link my itunes and ipad on to my TV. Excellent little device, with the combination of airplay, itunes and apps such as netflix and crackle, I only watch cable for the live events; NFL, MLB, WWE, etc. With WWE hitting hulu and the mlb app on this device, I see the chord cutting in the near future!*Sadly, you cannot jailbreak this device, this is why the cost of the AppleTV 2 is 150% more than this.The ability to use airplay on this device is what sold me to this instead of the roku, the lack of amazon prime is no big deal with having airplay to link the prime app on the ipad to the TV.

Bought to be able to watch YouTube videos and listen to music purchased on my iPhone and iPad. Because Apple doesn't support Adobe Flash, many video's I've watched on my laptop are not viewable on AppleTv. But I knew that when I purchased, just didn't realize the extent of how much on YouTube uses Adobe Flash Player. So video's are limited.I'm still a novice and learning as far as my AppleTv goes, but it seems that to be able to play my purchased iTunes from my iPhone and iPad, it seems I have to subscribe to iTunes Match to be able to do so? This is at a cost of $25 annually. I was under the impression I'd be able to listen to these like on my other Apple products.The remote is VERY flimsy. I have large hands and when using, I can feel the the thin body of the remote flexing when using.I have doubts about the lifespan of the remote.The Radio app is great though. I listen to hard rock and heavy metal mostly, and there are endless channel's to listen too. Every sub-genre of metal is covered. And International channels too! Excellent!Overall, pretty good device but not great. As I get more familiar with it, maybe my opinion will improve as far as my rating goes. Especially if I don't have to subscribe to another Apple product to listen to my iTunes on my tv. And please Apple, make a more robust remote!!!!
Brilliant product with great functionality. I think it's quite adequate to convert a normal LED to a smart TV at an unbelievable price with this product.

Built-in wifi, and access to all of your itunes media, this is a great media device:  Provides access to hulu, netflix, and other subscription services through a great interface.  Easy access to youtube, and direct access to latest posts from the channels you subscribe to.  Showed the itunes music festival -- easier to navigate than on the computer.Also, a great device for airplay -- letting you see your whole computer, iphone or ipad screen on a large display, or just play a video file at full screen size.By itself, it doesn't do anything (no free TV channels, etc.. - though you do get youtube).  But as a conduit for access to your media library and subscription services or for showing stuff from your other devices on the big screen wirelessly without having to plug anything else in, it excels!Highly recommended.

But has it's limitations. Your computer must be on with ITunes running which is a negative & you can't add aftermarket software which is a major negative. On the other hand it plays well & your movies of reasonable quality will look just fine on even a large TV (I use a 65 inch model) because of the ability it has to step pictures up to hi def.
But I have one as well and I love it, we don't have cable or anything and it's an extremely convenient way to rent new releases, watch netflix, hulu plus, youtube, listen to music and much more.
But it doesn't. Resolution is much higher than streaming services on a laptop. It seems like it's a complete cable system.
but the screen on the tv cuts off part of the end icons for the choices of apps and the shows that are on the end of hulu and netflix.
Buy this product!!!!!!!!! :-) it is amazing I can even stream my Mac to it with airplay for work purposes.

By far the best compared to ROKU and others.  Easy out of the box setup - connect to WiiFi or ethernet - tell it you apple ID and you are off and running.  Best picture, sound coupled with seamless install and interface ..... can't go wrong.
Came as it has been purchased in a retail store. Cables, remote control and instructions came completely. Pretty good conditions.
Can be for him or her!! Very cozy and Bright!! Great beanie would recommend for all ages!!! Made my husbands Xmas!!!
summary: Super warm! My husband Loves it!!

reviewText: Cancel your cable and buy this!!!! We use this product every day...we love it. We can watch all our favorite programs and even some LIVE TV
summary: How did I live without this????

reviewText: Cannot tell you how nice it is to see my iPad mirrored on my Apple TV. Many times I have wanted to share something from my iPad or iphone. This was well worth the money spent. Now my family and I can watch church service, movies, etc from the iPad. I also enjoy Netflix too!
Can say it does as advertised. Good remote catches wi fi easily. Have to reboot (unplug) once in a great while.

can't go wrong with an apple tv. i own a couple of these and a roku to get into my amazon videos.  but some movies come out earlier on these platforms and that is the reason why i have both.  no late fees anymore with movies.  and i get my netflix
Can't say too much on this item except it's just the right size and was exactly what I needed.  Gold Plated and seems rugged.
Christmas Gift for myself :-)Absolutly love it.  I really enjoy being able to control everything from my iPhone or Macbook ProLove the Airplay feature and NetflixGreat gift and very affordable

Combined with iTunes Match all my music I've ever owned is now available on this little box wired into the stereo and tv.  I bought a second one and it shows up on iOS devices as Apple TV 2 automatically.  Love it.  Thinking about ditching cable.  May never buy another movie except on iTunes either as you can purchase and watch instantly whatever isn't already free on the built in Netflix.  Way cool.
summary: Best gadget I've bought in years

reviewText: Come fast and set up fast. Everything works great on all my Apple product. Share your video and photos are so easy now with AirPlay. Must buy for all Apple fan :D
summary: Work great with all my Apple product

reviewText: Compact, low power, simple to operate, with a convenient remote control. A nice product with a surprisingly low price given that it's designed by Apple.
summary: Typical Apple product with elegant design and great functionality

reviewText: complete with remote! I can view netflix anywhere there is wi fi, and all of the free internet TV channels too.
Convert your tv in a media center easily. The instalation and configuration is easy, This is a product very useful for the entertainment.

Couldn't complain about any apple product.This is very good and apps perform much better on this than any others.I have a ROKU box which in under performing already after a year, but apple tv is performing efficiently.
Could use some refreshed hardware but still a great addition to any home theater system.  Perfect for hbo go and netflix
Decent Looking! standard apple appearance.The biggest surprise is that I can stream my video to Apple TV( Only 2011's Mac can use mirroring, mine is 2009.) by using third-party software.

Description and picture are accurate.  Received quickly and it was well packaged.  Not such a technical person so had trouble setting it up at first.  Nothing wrong with the product though.  Read the instructions that came with it and also did some research on- line that had more visual aids which mad it easier for me to connect to my TV and laptop.

Did a bunch of comparisons on media receivers...Purchased both a Roku and this Apple TV.  Both work as expected and meet or exceed my expectations.  The bottom line:Apple TV - Of course it is intuitive and easy to set up.  Works like a charm --- and oh my, what stellar build quality compared to the competition.  Pros: Netflix works great, Airplay is awesome, Ethernet port is HUGE, and the digital audio output is so important depending on your setup.  Cons: No Amazon (no sh#t I understand why...but still a big issue given I'm an Amazon Prime member), who cares about NBA and MLB??  However, the lack of Amazon (for my dollar) makes the difference between buying 3 Apple TVs or 1 Apple TV & 2 Rokus.Roku 2 XD - Very nice interface and easy to set up.  Works like a charm -- but don't drop it or hit it against anything as it is likely to break easily (very, very flimsy build).  Pros - Amazon and other content.  Cons - No Airplay, no Ethernet, and no digital audio output.
Does everything expected - second one I bought for a second TV.  Love looking at all of my photos on the big screen..
Does everything I could imagine, and the ability to send nearly any video on our iPhones and iPad to the TV made this THE streaming device I was interested in. We use it every day.
summary: The streaming device in my house

reviewText: Does everything I expected it to do, the remote control is nice and small with great functions price was right and delivery was great
Does everything I want except Amazon Prime. Well, maybe I'll find the feature in a future update. It does what it's allowed to very well.
summary: An Apple is better in a pie or dipped but this one you will consume as is.

reviewText: Does exactly what it is supposed to do with minimal hook-up. Initial glitches have been resolved with Apple updates during the last year of ownership.
Does exactly what it's supposed to do intuitively and without fuss; cool hockey puck design and minimalist remote are extremely stylish.
summary: It's an Apple product, what else is there to say?

reviewText: Does exactly what it's supposed to do.PROS:- Works out of the box, minimum effort to setup.- Great integration to my Apple ecosystem (iTunes, iPhone, iPad, Macmini, TimeCapsule).- Small, Easy to conceal behind the TV.CONS:- Needs more channels (Crackle, Amazon Instant Video, HBO GO, etc)

Doesn't play amazon prime video, only sound. Works that way with other apps and games. But will mirror most videos and pictures and has apps of its own. Netflix, Hulu, hbo, to name a few. The amazon prime was a real disappointment for me because that's the reason a purchased it but I've grown to love it. It's definitely worth the price.

Does the same thing as my 2012 Samsung smart TV and 2013 Xbox One by playing Netflix, Hulu, etc, but it also offers to AIr Play the iPad or phone so everyone doesn't have to gather around behind you. Make looking at things online easier for a family or group.

Does what it's supposed to do.  Lets me stream a variety of internet programming.  The best app is the Youtube app.  It's the best I've seen so far because of how easy it is to navigate.  It would be nice if the remote was bluetooth so you wouldn't need near line of sight to operate.  It would also be nice if the remote had a plug for a headset like the Roku3 has.  For what it does have like network streaming from your home computers I'm happy with this purchase.
Does what it's supposed to. So far we are very happy with it but we have only used it with movies from the computer
Don't know what took me so long. Easy connect. Easy to use. The remote control is so easy to use.

Don't wait, just buy it.  It is amazing what this little device can do and how simple it is.  The size is great and the quality is incredible.  Between music, video and even mirroring out Macbook Pro's this device handles them all.

Easily integrated into my heavily apple-centric household.  I mainly use it for streaming stuff from my Amazon Prime account on my iPad.  I'm even able to stream the audio separately to my old Airport Express, which is nice.The interface is a bit clunky...works best with an ipad or iphone as the remote, IMO.I wish Apple had a comparable service to Prime, but let's be honest, it just isn't there yet.  The built in streaming channels are OK for an occasional diversion, but not much more than that.  I'm hoping the next software revision includes something new, content-wise.
summary: another step toward cutting the cord.

reviewText: Easy hook up, works like a charm.  Have watched MLB baseball, movies, photos, YouTube, and mirrored the iPad for room viewing of web browsing.  Nice gadget.  Also bought a 6' HDMI and it all came in the same package so I was ready to go.
summary: Apple TV Works Like a Charm

reviewText: Easy interface and complete integration with iTunes, Netflix, Pandor and your computer.  It's also fun to 'project' from your iPad or iPhone. Not sure I can tell the difference between the 720 dpi and the 1080 dpi versions (I have both) but my largest TV is only 42".I have two Apple TVs (one upstairs and one down) and am a huge fan. I just wish they would add Amazon VOD, but won't likely happen since they compete, so I have to switch to my Blu-Ray or Xbox to watch Amazon VOD.  Still searching for one device to rule them all...
easy set up and works great with my new apple macbook..  pic quality is great and streaming, pics and remote desk top from my laptop is really cool..
Easy set up. Directions were easy to follow and works beautifully. Price is less or comparable to all that I searched. Came on time. Would buy from them in the future.
Easy setupLet's you connect to iTunes and pull content over to your TV and StereoMust have for multiple Apple device owners

Easy setup.  Only had it a couple of months and already has new programming available.  If you have an iphone, looking at your pics and videos on the TV is super easy.  Works great with netflix and hulu+.  I don't miss cable at all.
Easy set up. Works great with our home theater and tv. Another product from Apple that just works. Highly recommended.
Easy to be anywhere around the house and control the stereo plus it gives us access to radio stations we didn't have before.
Easy to connect. Movies, music and other apps all work well. I have one and my daughter has one. 1080P video and 5.1  sound HDMI who could ask for more.
summary: If you are a Apple person this is for you.

reviewText: Easy to hook up and use.  If you desire something to display your Ipad or iPod fun, then this is it.  It also allows us to play iTunes movies stored on computer...wicked...
Easy to hook up and use.  Some difficulty finding the right setting on the TV to get it to come up, but all go after that.
Easy to instal and use. A must for IPAD users. a a a a a a a a a a
Easy to install and set up.  Only drawback is our older TV without the HDMI ports.  Using it on a newer TV in a bedroom.

easy to install.  easy to set up!  easy to use!  what more could i ask for.  it took a good five minutes to open it up and find the parts, figure out the instructions, hook it it up and set it on the back of the set!  the hardest part was throwing out the box.  setting it up was with my computer was soooooo, easy.  it was connecting to my my mac mini and as the they say...,. easy as pie.  the hardest part of pie is washing the plate and the fork!

Easy to install, easy to use, makes an older tv like new and more. Get you one!Has a slender remote control, down side is the range is very poor, should be fine from the couch, but from more than 10ft your out of luck.
summary: This is simply a cool item for a "not so smart tv"

reviewText: Easy to install (just a cable attachment).  We use it all the time! Enhanced the use of both Netflix and iPad for us, and we're not very tech savvy!
Easy to operate after initial setup with home computer equipped with WiFi.  Viewing choices are good although Netflix is somewhat stale.
Easy to set-up and easy to use, I like my Apple TV. Best of all, I can now watch Netflix Streaming movies from my bed.
Easy to set up and great product. Small in size so it is not an eye sore. Love this product.Great packaging also.
Easy to set-up and use for any current Apple customer.  Makes it simple to watch all of your iTunes movies and listen to your music through your TV.
Easy to set up and use. Using an optic cord for sound through my receiver. I just had to ensues my tv speakers were turned off for sound to work on optic. So worth getting.
Easy to set up, but at times it if difficult to get the link started between the iPad and Apple TV device.  Once it gets going it is very good.
summary: Easy set up but some start up problem with iPad link

reviewText: Easy to set up, easy to use, great HD display.Apple has done a great job with this Apple TV
Easy to set-up. Even easier to use. Love this product. I continue to find new ways to use it. Very satisfied.

Easy to set-up, works great out of the box. Must sync device to pc, follow instructions or find tutorials on U-tube. Remote starts tube randomly....? Speeds seem fine for streaming online content. Haven't used Netflix or Zulu yet.

easy to start and operate, but it is not always easy to connect mobile devices and stream a video on it, gives a lot of errors, slow, they have to find an other way for the search may be voice command like the Amazon TV. no a great buy, overpriced
Easy to use, breeze to set up and navigation is idiot  proof. Delivers as it is supposed to when used.
Easy to use, Great apps, I love to stream from ipad to Apple TV using airplay. This is a must have home entertainment item.
Easy to use. Great product for any room in the house.  Multiple apps to stream video. AirPlay is fantastic to watch my iTunes U videos for class.

Edit:  The Hulu Plus issue detailed below has been fixed with a system update ... I'm bumping this up to four stars but I'm leaving my original comments online so that people can see that this product has historically not gotten the support it needs from Apple.Original Review: 2 Stars:Considering the Apple name and the price, I expect a premium product - this doesn't cut it.  Hulu Plus only works if the device is set to Wifi, even after a firmware update.  This is a known issue that Apple can't or won't straighten out with Hulu.  I can cope because the wireless streaming is reasonably fast and reliable ... BUT .... tonight I rent a movie on iTunes and it won't load unless I hard-wire the internet.  Tedious.If you're expecting the same quality you find in iPhones and MacBooks, then no, this isn't the same level of quality usually found in Apple products.  I expect to tinker with cheap, also-ran products but not slick, expensive Apple products.  Just under the surface is a 5-star product waiting to bust out here, but this device is the red-headed step-child of the Apple line.  It's basically a beta-test for the TV Apple is going to make anyway, and it feels like it.
En cuanto vi el producto en casa de un amigo me quedé impresionado e inmediatamente lo compré.Excelente equipo para transmitir desde el iphone, ipad y macbook hacia el TV
enjoying the apple tv.....the main advantage of this is, it allows for airplay.......which doesn't require any cables.....and also has build in some apps.......loving it..
Even though it's under $100, it's still has the great Apple quality.It's very easy to use. It looks cool no matter where you put it.The picture quality is great as well.

Ever since the upgrade that added Hulu, this is all that I need for TV.  It would be amazing if Apple or someone else could figure out how to get live sports added to the features but until then this does 90% of what you need to get rid of cable.The interface is very intuitive and quick to get around.  Setup was very easy and adding photos through iPhoto worked great.  I would have liked for the AppleTV to keep the component outputs or RCA audio outputs for those TVs that haven't been upgraded yet to HD.  But I understand the size and overall technology is moving towards HDMI for everything so eventually I would have this problem with any new device.
ever watch youtube on your iphone at home? well, with this you can just throw it up on the TV and enjoy watching it on the big screen.
summary: handy to have in the house

reviewText: Every household should have one. The ONLY way to stream Netflix- It does a great job! Bought another for my boyfriend as a gift,

Every single TV in the house should have an Apple TV connected to it. It is the most useful and user friendly device of all. Stream from iTunes, Netflix, etc without glitch. Most of mine are wireless, one wired. Running wired clearly helps but the experience is not poor on wireless. Radio pairs great with Airport Extreme/Extreme.
Everything was delivered on time no issues. Device works great still figuring out new ways to use it. It came in real handy to show off vacation pictures and videos wirelessly.
everything was good as expected.just good old Apple product that works, right out of the box.  Nothing negative about it.
Everything was OK and no complaints and happy with the products that were in the order made. No more comments
Everything works as I was expecting, and is smooth.Tons of free radio stations with all kinds of music.Good quality choices.
Everything works as they say it would! Super simple set up. Easy integration to our laptops and iPhones. I would recommend to anyone with kids!
Everything works great. I love watching Netflix on it and listening to music from my computer. Works just as advertised
Every time we have people over and I have my itunes playing through it people freak out when they see me changing songs and volume and such from my phone through the surround sound system.
Exceded my expectations, serves the purpose I wanted it to while discovred features I did not know Apple TV had.
Excellent choice for not smart tv with FHD support, the airplay mirroring is good, but when displaying the pics and videos from iphone it takes quite a lot to load. More apps needed.
Excellent device. Connection ease makes it a very versatile device. my daughter just 3.5 years, connect your ipad 4 and relayed their videos and cartoons. It is very easy to use and install
Excellent performance with purchase price. I will recommended to buy.Speed and quality of picture is good. I will satisfy with this product.

Excellent product.  All work as it should on my iPhone 4s.  Same with my MacBook Air.  In both music pause during a call and resume when the call finish. Easy bluetooth connection and reconnection, each control working when needed.
Excellent product and works out of the box, minimum effort to setup, really easy to use interface + wifi. I recommend it

Excellent product - another great one from Apple.Excellent streaming from Netflix etc.Airplay works seamlessly - so you can stream stuff from your other Apple devices.Remote has a great modern design.
Excellent product.  Easy to use and easy to install on a TV. .  Meets all expectations as promised in advertising.
EXCELLENT PRODUCT !!!Especially when looking up movies/shows by the actor-lookup !I used pretty much most TV-box devices, and this one has the best user interface to make movie-rental decisions
Excellent product!!!It works perfect and is easy to install. I syn mi mac, Ipad and Iphone without any problem.I love it!!

Excellent product, work as you expect , ease to handle and follow instructions, clear images and the most easy to read CC, the only subject that don't let me give the 5 start is because do not take Amazon in his program, should be there as other divice.

Excellent quality, easy of use, i love these, taking itunes, ipad, or iphones an ipods movies and music on your tv is easy, you can share almost everything, see pictures, netflix and a lot more, these is and excellent apple device
summary: I love it, if you have ipod, iphone or ipad its an excellent choice for getting videos and music on your tv or home audio device

reviewText: Excellent, Very good, is highly recommended, as is the product is as described. is of good quality, providing the service that is offered.
Excellent! Very satisfied with the product. Would recommend it to anyone out there who wants to buy it. Happy happy
Excent

Except for not having a dedicated app for Amazon (they gave theirs to Roku) it is a super addition to your tv.  The device is sleek and the remote is simple.  It is a job apple does well - and roku does not.  The apple tv does not ask for any personal information and works perfectly every time all the time.  Upgrades can be made on the TV to the original apple tv.No complaints at all
Exellent i love it my actually thinking of getting rid of my cable company cuz i have everything i need
Exellent product, great value. i would recommend this product. Easy to use and install. A big asset to HD TV.
summary: My son in law loves it!

reviewText: Ez to install works great.  Now Hulu iTunes and Netflix YouTube all in one place no more switching between devices to use them all in 1080p.
Fairly easy to use little box here from Apple. Great interface, highly recommended for those people who likes to spice up their TV sets.
Fantastic! Only problem is that you get addicted and you want one for every TV & you then have to buy the additional accesories like the optics cable for sound & the HDMI cable for video.
Fantastic product. Some small issues with wireless connection to iTunes at times but overall great. I recommend this item to anyone.
Fast delivery, good product! I am really enjoying the Apple TV. I don't even need to have cable to watch my favorite shows!

Fast, easy setup.  I also have a Roku LT.  The Netflix app on the Apple TV is much nicer than the Roku.  Interestingly, the 2 devices don't list identical offerings in their respective PBS apps/channels.  I do wish Apple wouldn't assume that their devices are so simple that decent instructions aren't necessary -- although setup was simple, figuring out how to get closed captions to display required a web search.  Easy enough to find online but that type of info should be in the brief guide they provide in print.
finally 1080 so that is a plus and it does the job.  I like this a lot and i use it for streaming music mostly.
Finally, I'm able to take advantage of my iTunes library without having to plug in my iPod, iPhone or iPad. Streaming, AirPlay, etc., etc., I'm just happy.
Finally something that can be used out of the box. There is one flaw in that the remote quite small and is easily lost, which means no operation. However a minor issue..

First issue was that Apple TV seems to have quite a few compatibility issues with routers and this certainly was the case for me on my actiontec fios router. Tool ages to find workaround in some obscure forum which I am not convinced will hold long term.Second was that I purchased this to watch amazon instant video from my iPad. Seems logical route, buy an apple product from amazon to watch amazon on an apple. Nothing in the information leads you to suspect this limitation which I think is a major oversight on amazons part.

First my profile is home with 2 teenagers so the youtube features are  a big hit.  We now look here for "on demand" movies as the kids get itunes gift cards all the time. All you have to do is share your library in itunes ( PC of Mac) and you can display it on your TV in HD.Next I need better audio on the TV to replace the stereo!

reviewText: First off, if you own multiple Apple products such as iPhone, iPad and etc, this is the perfect compliment to your i products. The airplay works great and you can stream music / photos and video to your TV (even though at a compressed format for high quality videos). It's a great way to share media with friends and family at home.If you are getting a streaming box to watch movies from the internet such as Hulu and Netflix, this is also the device to get. I think it has the most user-friendly interface out there for the most popular apps (but the lack of back button on the remote was confusing initially). Unfortunately, it doesn't have the Amazon Instant Video app, so it might be a deal breaker if you are a Amazon Prime user. Everything you buys from iTunes is also available to stream from Apple TV. And it also streams everything you have on your iTunes library.The only people I would not recommend to get this are the PC users looking to stream stuffs from their PC without going through iTunes. Since iTunes does not play a lot of video format that are popular on PC such as MKV, AVI, WMV, you would need to convert your video library to iTunes compatible format e.g. mp4. It may not be your best use of time. Some people had success jailbreaking an older generation of Apple TV that allows them to stream media without iTunes but as of the date of this review, it does not look like this Apple TV is jailbreakable. I would recommend getting the Roku 2 XD or XS for such users. They are available at Amazon at similar, if not lower, price.So if you are invested in iTunes and Apple hardware, definitely get this. If not, look for alternatives mentioned.

First world problem: all hell breaks loose when Wi-Fi stops working! So I try to create a reliable set up.Comcast Xfinity Internet Plus 25 Mbps download speed with local HD channels plus HBO Go $79/month.$80 Motorola Surfboard SB6141 (Download Speeds up to 343 Mbps) ($70 SB6121 is slower 172 Mbps)$90 Apple AirPort Express (My only router in a 2 floor 1300 sq ft townhouse) $190 AirPort Extreme (Not needed)$90 Apple TV (Stream Netflix HD and browse Wi-Fi with my iPhone 5 at the same time without any lagging)Speedtest.net I consistently get 18 Ping 28 Mb (I only have the Xfinity 25 Mb package) on my iPhone 5 over Wi-Fi.My parents house have 50 Mb Blast Plus package with the same Motorola SB6141 Modem (Speedtest shows 51 Mb!)

For 99 bucks this this is a steal. It totally integrates all of my Apple products (Mac, iPhone, iPad) wirelessly and seemlessly using Airplay to stereo and TV. Great for renting movies from the iTunes store and streaming Netflix movies and series

For $99 you can't beat this purchase, especially if you have other Apple products to take advantage of Airplay.  One of the most unexpected side affects of owning hit is my increased usage of Youtube.  I really didn't watch Youtube much because of the small size on my MacBook Air. With the Apple TV the full screen Youtube app is excellent. There are so many episodes of older TV shows, movies etc that I can now watch!
For a better reviewCheck out this video on YouTube:http://youtu.be/kkJFPV2X6BsFor a better reviewCheck out this video on YouTube:http://youtu.be/kkJFPV2X6Bs
For a hundred bucks this item is great.  It seamlessly integrates with other Apple products, including the Cloud.  The new Apple TV is a brilliant device and a no brainer purchase.
For a little less than $100, I can view TV shows from overseas via youtube with very good result. That alone is worth the money for me.

Forget about buying this version of the Apple TV now that a newer version will be coming up soon.  Hardware is definitely outdated.  My Roku 2 operates smoothly, but ATV hangs every so often.  It's comparable to Roku 1 at best so definitely should not be considered at this time.

For me, it was between this and the latest greatest Roku. I have gotten two of these for family members who use other apple products, and it's great. The Airplay on Apple TV is a HUGE advantage. But it is sorely missing Amazon. Why can't you play nice, Apple?For myself, I got the Roku. Having Amazon Prime instant video is just too important.Overall, I like the interface better on the Apple TV. But the greater freedom in terms of channels/apps on the Roku was a clear victory in my book. Both are excellent.

For some reason my music is not being "shared" to my Apple TV. My only remedy seems to be to stop the "sharing" on my five devices. I think that will mess up a whole lot of things. Plus EVERYTHING else is available through my iTunes account (videos, photos, tv shows) except songs! Ugh...

For the $100 price tag, it seems an easy choice between this and a Roku.The Netflix interface via Apple Tv is also very good (have never used a Roku). You get access to iTunes, Netflix, Hulu MLB, NHL and NBA with the Apple Tv (assuming you subscribed to these).You can also kick anything from an iDevice or Mac to your TV (assuming the hardware meets the version requirements).Your iPhone can also be the remote.

For the price that this is, it can not be beat. The hand hold for when using it is great and the stylus works fine.  After several months of use on the other case I bought exactly the same, the strap that holds it closed gets a little stretched, but it still does the job.

reviewText: For the price, this is great, but the price for episodes of most shows is still a little high. Cable is still a better deal, but not for long, I imagine.

For those of us that like to keep it simple, this is the streaming device to own.Since we got the Apple TV, we haven't looked back. Its tiny size means no hard drive. This turns out to be a good thing, as it means one less hard drive to manage. The Apple TV can stream from any Mac's publicly shared files or iTunes library, or you can access Netflix, Hulu, Youtube, Vimeo, and more from the built-in apps on the main screen.We love the remote: it's small and to-the-point. There are two buttons and a navigation circle with four buttons. It may sound too simple to function well, but that's not the case at all. We've found that when we have guests over, they instinctively know how to use it when they first pick it up.There is a downside: You can't stream every format, so Apple TV may not be a good fit for some people with large movie libraries on their computers. This is minor, though, since the average user will just want to watch movies without hassle, which the Apple TV does perfectly. And simply.
summary: The only device we need in the living room

Got this as a birthday present for my sister.  She has numerous Apple products and I thought this would be a good way for her to access Netflix.  I heard her mention once about Airplay and how it let you "stream" content (a bit embarrassing that she heard about it before me, seeing as I'm the resident tech in the family), so I thought it would be nice for her...Once she received the gift and started using it, I was VERY impressed at the capabilities! Not only does she finally have Netflix access on the TV, but that Airplay...wow!  Anything from you ipad, ipod, iphone, macbook, imac.... all can stream straight to your tv!  No delay or anything!Wanna hear your playlist while cleaning a room on the opposite side of the house from your computer? No problem, stream it!Tired of playing the Sims on that small macbook screen? No problem, mirror your desktop on the 40" TV!I would've given it 5 stars if.... well you know what, I can't think of anything so it gets the 5!  The only gripe I WOULD have is that the Airplay doesn't work with any OS before Lion, and I haven't upgraded and don't want to.. but hey, it's not for me and all her computers are fully upgraded! She loves it.  This gift was so good, I could probably skip a year or two of presents haha.

Great little box!  One word:  AirPlay!  If you have an iPhone or iPad, it is worth it solely for this feature.  You can 'mirror' what is on your display, and also stream audio/video via AirPlay.I have two of these at home, one is connected to my 50 inch plasma for video/streaming.  Mostly Hulu/Netflix/YouTube.Another is in a different room connected via HDMI to my AV Receiver for audio only.  I listen to music and podcasts on this one.  Apps that support AirPlay that I have used and work (there are probably lots more than this):  Downcast, Pandora, Spotify, built in Music app, NPR News, NPR Music, TuneIn Radio, and Amazon Cloud Player.PROS:--AirPlay, AirPlay, AirPlay!--Great Netflix/Hulu interfaces--YouTube (go to "most watched" today or this week to see the latest viral videos)--1080p video looks fantastic--More content available with the latest software update (v5.3), including HBOGO, WatchESPN, and Sky News.--Draws less than 1 watt of power for the 3rd gen, rev2 model -- A1469.  This is according to an analysis done by AnandTech in March 2013--Small:  about the size of a hockey puck!  Speaking of hockey pucks, there's a great built in app for watching NHL highlights (free)!CONS:--Apple has not opened up the Apple TV platform for app development, but this is not as important with the AirPlay feature.TIPS AND TRICKS:--With the latest software update (v5.3), there are now many apps on the home screen.  You can clean this up a bit and hide the ones you are not using by going to Settings-->General-->Parental Controls.  Scroll to the bottom, and you can toggle show/hide for each app.--To move apps around on the home screen, hold down the 'select' button and then you will be able to move it to wherever you like.--To go back to the home screen at any time, hold down the 'menu' button for a second or so.--Remote control:  You can pair the Apple TV with a universal remote (go to settings to set this up).  You can also control via the 'Remote' app in Apple's App Store, or even pair it with a Bluetooth keyboard (I have not tried the latter).--The Apple TV drives both the HDMI output and optical audio output at the same time.All in all, if you have an iPad/iPhone, I would say get this and enjoy!If you don't have an iPad/iPhone, it is still one of the best streaming boxes out there -- the Netflix and Hulu interfaces are the best I have seen.
summary: Great little box!  Almost essential if you have an iPad or iPhone!

Had Netflix (got rid of it bc I got AmazonPrime now) and had to manually plug in my MacBook Pro with a video/hdmi cord to my TV to watch anything. It got annoying after a while so decided to give the Apple TV a try. First off, Amazon has the best price. Now no need of cords! I can use my MacBook Pro, iPad Air, and iPhone to watch Amazon Instant right from my couch! The Apple TV has worked great for my home. I have Comcast and get about 28mbps down and about 6mbps up. I have noticed that on occasion there will be a slight video stutter (never sound though). But nothing major or unbearable. Actually, I noticed my Apple TV software was 6.0 and I had to upgrade it. Now I don't notice a video stutter/lag at all. But I have heard that many people have had problems with this so beware...Other than that it has worked great. If you are thinking about getting an Apple TV, I recommend looking into upgrading your internet speeds if you aren't in the 20mbps range. And maybe to save cost/cancel out cost, look into getting rid of your cable and get AmazonPrime and get their AmazonInstant Videos.

reviewText: Have one attached to my tv in the family room and works wonders. I enjoy watching things from several selections from Netflix and Hulu-plus  and from my itunes library.
Having already installed one appleTV in my home, purchasing a second for a family member was a no-brainer. Easy decision.

Having an AppleTV is just awesome.The viewing quality through some apps is often better than viewing programs through regular TV.Combine your AppleTV with a HD SmartTV, and the experience is even better.Setup of an AppleTV is very easy and streaming content from the computer, tablet or phone is just by a single tap of an icon.Would recommend an AppleTV purchase for anyone.

Having had a Samsung Bluray player with apps, a Sharp Smart TV, and a Roku, I bought an apple tv for the office and realized how much more of an exceptional experience it is.  We moved to Apple TVs for our house after that and we love it.
summary: Apple TVs are an exceptional experience

reviewText: Having satellite TV and not wanting to pay for receivers in each room, we were relying on rabbit ears to pull in channels in our bedroom.  With AppleTV we can add the lineup of Netflix and Hulu as well. It is easy to hook up and portable so if we want those streaming channels on our main TV, it only rakes a minute to swap.  We plan on trying it the next time we vacation to see if it will work with the hotel's wifi.

Having used a couple of other streaming products over the years (Roku, internet TVs), and admittedly being a bit of an Apple fanboy, The Apple TV is where it's at. No, it's not your cheapest option, and yes I'd love for them to update the software (perhaps to match with iOS 7), it's really the best option for someone who uses Apple products. The quality is fantastic, it has all the streaming channels you'd want (those that it might not have, you can easily connect from your phone), and it seamlessly integrates with all of my other iDevices (iMac, Airport, iPhone, iPad).There are a couple of things that bother me, but nothing that makes me not want to use it. For example, the YouTube App is kind of frustrating in the Apple TV, but I find it's just as easy to search on my iPhone YouTube App, then just send it to my TV. Similarly, there is no Amazon Instant App, but I do the same: find it on my iPhone and send it to the TV. And yes, I am ready for them to upgrade the software/interface. It's been a while.As for things I LOVE: It's great for parties, in that I can put my iPad out and open, for anyone to access Spotify and have it streaming through my TV and speakers. Before the Apple TV, I would have had to let people use my computer, which is less appealing. Also, if I've got a group of people over and we are sharing YouTube videos, it's easy for the next person to queue up their video and send it to the TV when it's their turn.All in all, it works like it's supposed to, the hallmark of all Apple products, and the Apple TV is no different.

HD resolution - great interface (much better than the web browser -readable) - take it out of the box follow the very short manual and it works instantly or take it out of the box don't read the manual and it still works instantly - the remote is an elegant dream to use - streams beautifully! ~:0)
he wanted this so i got it for christmas he likes it  not sure if i would but hes know more about  computer s then i do

Hi All, I got this as a bday gift for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it. Although he initially had problems syncing it to his macbook, he figured it out and now all products-ipad, uphone, etc are synced.
summary: Great gift item for apple lovers

reviewText: Highly recommend this! Haven't got cable this is all we use!! Love photo streamingon large screen!! Might want to add another to my second TV

High quality packaging, high quality product. Remote is small, feels great in your hand and works well. Was a breeze to set up, the only real question I answered was the language of choice! I did not even have to enter Wireless credentials, since I chose the Ethernet connection option. I have tried AirPlay, Netflix and Youtube so far, and the experience is great. Like the Netflix interface much better than the old clunky one my previous Vizio Blue Ray player had. I wish this supported Amazon Instant Video also.

reviewText: Honestly, there is not much I can say about this product that doesnt speak for itself. Living overseas I do not have access to the shows I like to watch back in the United States. This has given me a legal way of watching the shows I like to watch as well as watching movies and listening to music and then it airplays my MBP and my iDevices as well. Great buy overall.
hook it up, plug it in and watch your shows.  so easy even a caveman can do it.  worth the money

I absolutely LOVE IT!!!! So much to Watch on it and do!!! I'm thinking of canceling cable now!!!! Wouldn't trade it ever!!!!! It's awesome I love apple products!!!! Can't talk enough with this product!!

I absolutely LOVE my Apple TV.  Makes it super simple for Airplay from my Ipad and Iphone.  Love the access to NefFlix and Crackle.  Super easy to set up. No technical skills required.  Worth the money.

I absolutely love my new Apple TV, it is definitely worth the money that I paid. It came as expected, and in the time frame expected with my Prime membership. I absolutely love the Apple TV.  I have one in every room of my house.  Great way to watch a lot of great shows and its very easy to use

I absolutely love this Apple TV, it's awesome, you will love this to. I can get any movie I want, steaming from my ipad is flawless as is any movie purchased or rented, get this you'll love it to. It's very easy to set up, ten or fifteen minutes is all it takes.

I actually have to of these boxes at home and the most recent purchases were as gifts to friends for Christmas.That being said, the AppleTv is worth the purchase and used quite regularly at home and at times for work.i've reviewed them before and can only say that I have enjoyed using.

reviewText: I added this one as a second Apple TV for my home. I really like how these work and how easy they are to install into my system.
I AirPlay my videos and photos from my Mac and iPhone without having to connect them to the TV. Expecting more content on the Apple TV soon :). I use it to also play Netflix and youtube videos.

I already have one, but bought one for a gift. If you have any apple products, this is fabulous. If you want things such as hulu and netflix, but do NOT have any apple products, you are probably better off with a Roku box (for half the price). The appletv really comes into play when you have other apple products that you can airplay to, or pull up photos on. Overall great buy for apple people!

I am a big fan of the Roku and Chromecast. I have several of each in my house. For Christmas, I was thinking about getting one of those for my sister, but decided to give Apple TV a shot since she is pretty invested in the Apple ecosystem.The design and build of the Apple TV is great. Though it's not something you'll be handling much, it is very solidly built and looks great as a little set top box.Setup was simple, the little remote is also solid and well built and the system is responsive. Got it connected to WiFi and started showing my sister how to use it. The app selection is smaller than Roku, but I figured that could be made up for with AirPlay.AirPlay worked just like I imagined it would. Easy. I love features that don't take much training since it makes showing family members what to do very simple.Overall I am happy that I chose this for my sister. I still think that other devices may be more versatile for people who do not purchase media through iTunes, but there are many people that do just that; for them, I think this is the device to go with.I docked a star only for the app selection compared to other competitors.
summary: Picked this over Roku for a family member invested in Apple

reviewText: I am a cord cutter, meaning that i get all my video and tv entertainment from the internet instead of regular cable TV.with my brother, we share a netflix and HULUplus accounts, as well as amazon prime. I have been using my playstation as my entertain center, connecting to the TV and nflx/hulu/amzn accounts. i have tried the boxee and roku but the Apple TV is the only one worthy enough to cause me to switch over.Apple TV is now great with airplay, when you view something on phone or computer, you can quickly pop it over to your TV! its magical and has worked really well.As more and more independent film-makers put movies on youtube and vimeo, this will be better and better!I still dislike the netflix viewer on appleTV.If anyone has any questions, definitely let me know! My question that i haven't figured out yet is can i use this to create a 2nd monitor from my laptop? so i want my laptop to be monitor 1 and tv to be monitor 2 through my apple TV... if anyone knows, would be fun.
summary: Apple TV changed my viewing habits

reviewText: I am a huge fan of all Apple Products.  This one is great for streaming netflix, hulu, as well as any of your itunes.

I am a huge fan of Apple.  And the Apple TV is just like their other products.  They just work.  I mostly use it for my Netflex account and to watch Youtube.  I would love to be able to get a bluetooth connection with my keyboard so I wouldn't have to peck through all the letters to find things when I'm searching but think on the future upgrade that will happen.  Overall a very neat simple product that just works.
I am a i-Tunes junky.  Instead of having dvds and blu-rays litter the house, I like the digital version of things.  This is my second Apple TV.  It's been a great addition to our tv viewing options.
I am a Mac House and love the features this unit has to offer. Liked the packaging and I am enjoying the Apple!

I am an Apple fan and wanted to love this product but it seems  this product needs more improvement. I have a MacBook Pro late 2012 that I am using with Apple TV and sometimes for no reason Apple TV drops its wireless connection to the laptop. Although I have pretty good download speed for Utube video streaming (35 mb/s) and my computer plays it perfectly but sometimes Apple TV can not keep up and there are some annoying interruptions.I am only connecting to Apple TV & Utube @ 740p.The interesting part is when I don't use Utube and use videos from my computer to Apple TV those interruptions becomes much less frequent. Hopefully future firmware updates will improve the connectivity.

I am an apple fan boy. I have mainly macs at home so I thought this is the obvious choice of media player to go with.Problem #1, for some reason it starts playing music at will consuming bandwidth.Problem #2, I had to type in my apple ID in 5 different places, I would like to just manage it from a mac on the network like I can do with my Roku.Problem #3 airplay doesn't work seamlessly with older macs.Problem #4 the sound some times plays on the mac and sometimes on the TV, I have yet to understand whyFor all fairness, I have also a chromecast and a 2 Rokus. From those three, I have to say that now that the Roku supports youtube, I think it is probably the best value for this cost.So what is good about it:1) The quality of streaming is probably the best of the three2) Airplay when it works is great for showing pictures, playing music and viewing content of your other apple devices.3) Ethernet and optical connections are very important for stream high quality to make best use of HD TVs
I am an apple fan.Ok I said it.Toys like this are brand centric, I know.Since I like apple and have a ton of apple tech,This thing connects so well.Love it.

I am an Apple guy so I am probably a little biased on this but this works great. high def and awesome sound, just cant be beat. I'm using a Bose surround sound system so I can play all of my iTunes and watch movies with great sound and great picture along with all of the internet extras with Apple TV. who needs a movie theatre anymore
I am an Apple person so it made sense to finally purchase Apple TV. It works great and I'm glad I added it to my collection of Apple products. It makes my movie watching experience effortless.

reviewText: I am a part of the Apple ecosystem and this works great for me and my daughter! Streaming is not glitchy and as more apps. become Airplay compatible and/or Apple adds mor apps. to Apple TV it will get better and better!!

I am becoming more of an Apple fanboy as time passes.  It all started with an 30 gig iPod video, then later an iPod Touch, then iPhone, then MacBook Air, and now I've added the AppleTV to the list.I really do like this little box.  It streams video better than my media center extenders and has other neat features like being able to play content off other computers on my network.  You can also send content to the Apple TV from iDevices, such as an iPhone or iPad.  This is neat because you can display recorded videos on your TV.I'm going to probably end up putting one of these on each TV in my house other than the main TV where my Windows Media Center resides.I am waiting for the ability to stream live TV from my windows media center pc, but that will come later once a certain group of developers release the tool that enables you to install such a feature.For now I'm happy streaming recorded TV and movies to the Apple TVs.  Apple does make great products, even if the may fall slightly short of all my desired features (live tv control & streaming).
summary: Very nice, better than media center extender

reviewText: I am enjoying my Apple TV. I've had it about 4 months and my kids 5 & 3 can use this much easier than the Roku. Since we already have other Apple products, this seemed very intuitive to all of us. Love that I can listen to my music and see my pics on my TV at the same time.

I am finally watching some programs and seeing movies that I have been wanting to see! Watched a whole season of House of Cards on one rainy day!
I am glad that I got this.  It was able to keep the office nice and with the minimal amount of cables.
i am in love with apple productit is my dream and when i used  i love it so muchsmall box with wonderful servicehelp me to show my mac in tvthanks for apple lool
i am in love with this thing. iOS 7 is about to come out so im hoping the back ground will be able to change like on the leaked pictures.

I am locked into the Apple Ecosystem and like it. Therefore this is an indispensable accessory. LOVE IT. Air Play Technology is awesome. I only wish that the Amazon Instant Video App  was not BLOCKED FORM USING AIRPLAY TO THE APPLE TV!! But Vimeo, Youtube, Netflix, iTunes movies all look great.

I am not a big tech person, but this little Apple TV really impressed me, it's very easy to use and to connect, all you need is a HDMI cable, which does not come with the device, and connect it to any Hi-def. TV or component, and pair it up to your WiFi, and your ready to go, it also connects directly into your computer modem if you don't have WiFi, or wireless, the Apple TV only works on Hi-def. Tv's.

I am not a technophile, but this was easy to install and so far I have found it pretty easy to use. I have not yet tried to replace my cable TV with this, as so many are now doing, but it looks as though it won't be too hard to figure out. In the meantime, watching You Tube on the 50" screen is a much more satisfying experience than watching it on my laptop, and iTunes movies are a breeze to pull up. I think I will eventually use this in place of my cable. I look forward to denying my local cable company the pleasure of cashing my monthly check.

reviewText: I am not one for lengthy reviews so I will keep it short and to the point. The Apple TV works very easy right out of the box and looks great. reviewText: I am not usually a gadget person, so the ability to transfer so easily the content of the iPad and the computer to the TV screen was quite amazing to me.

The remote application on smartphones works only AFTER you have set up your apple TV with the original remote.I tried to set it up with a friend's remote and didnt work, but you have to buy a new one (at a steep Apple price) to set it up.Apart from that, it's a great product and if you have a fast wifi connection it's really fast/no lag between your laptop/phone and the TV.
