I thought at first too, that it wouldn't automatically play the next video in my iTunes playlist, but again, that was my slip, not the unit.It earns a 5 star rating from me, as it is a simple yet elegant solution to accessing my media library remotely. We may have to get a couple more for other rooms in the near future.
summary: Does what I expected and more!

reviewText: My only issue is Airplay.  I understand the different screen dimensions but find it frustrating Apple can't maximize the display on a High Definition TV when your iPad is horizontal.  No one likes black bars

My only regret is that I didn't buy this sooner. I had seen it in stores and online. Finally one day at apple, I played around with it, and I love it!! I have a lot of apple products, and really enjoy them. The setup wasn't bad. I usually mess around with stuff rather than read the instructions. It probably took me 10 or so minutes. You have to enable the home sharing on your computer, so that took a couple of minutes, which I include in that 10 minutes. You don't need to have an apple computer, just iTunes. You will need a hdmi cord, so if you don't have one, order one or pick one up at walmart. I then had to figure out which input to use on my remote, which turned out to be hdmi2. Then sign into Netflix, watch channels that are included, rent movies, listen to tons of music, ect. I love this device!!

My Samsung Blu ray would drop the wi fy signal every time I tried using apps. This Apple TV box is super fast. has an excellent easy to use menu and never drops signal. Apple has done it againA must buy!!!
summary: Very fast and doesnt drop signal

reviewText: My second Apple TV.  Great product, great price.  Most every other place I tried to purchase from wanted 20% more for the product.

My sister told me about this item.  I was use to bringing in Netflix via my WII, but I hate that shaky remote on WII.  This is so convenient to just set up and turn on.  I have purchased two more of these to give as gifts.  Love it.
My son asked if we would give these to our grandchildren.  They live on a boat and this item works get from them.

My son-in-law recommended this so I had him install it but that seemed pretty simple if you have the hdmi cord to connect it to the television set.  The unit itself is small and inconspicuous, with a small remote which controls it.
summary: One step closer to ditching my cable bill

reviewText: My son just absolutely loved his Apple TV.  He also got an iPAD and is able to connect both to his TV.
My son loooooves the Apple TV! He watches everything on there now. I love that we can get Netflix on there too. It shows really clear and works so great with my internet speed.
My son loves it....so I love it. Can't really tell much about it but apparently it works very well. It made a great gift for my 30+ old son.
My son ordered this for my husband and me and we are so thankful! It has made life watching TV so much easier.
My son recommended this device to me so I could watch, from my iphone, on my TV. I was so impressed with the results that I ordered one for my daughter and her family for Christmas.
summary: One of the best decisons I ever made.

reviewText: My son uses all Apple products (iMac, iPad, etc.)  This integrates perfectly and was easy to set up.Received it the day after I order it!
My son wanted this Apple TV for his birthday.  He tells me it works as advertised and really likes it.  Easy to install as well.  So, I just might get one!
summary: THIS WAS A GIFT AND HE LOVES IT

reviewText: my son wanted this for christmas, he said it was well worth the money, he stated  would recommend it to everyone
My wife and I like to click around on our iPads.  We often are doing the same thing and would like to view it together.  We also like the ability to use movie apps.  This is a very cool thing.
My wife love it without connect cable from her iphone, she really enjoy it and will tell her friends too
My wife loves this product, makes the connection between ipad and TV simple. It seems if Apple TV is too far from the ipad, then the connection isn't as good.

My wife purchased this as a Christmas gift and soon became the family gift. No more moving the Wii or Xbox as an extra source of online streaming. It is great to pull out one of our IPads and stream family photos or video to everyone in the home on our TV set. I love the screen saving feature that scrolls thru my IPad photos and passes them along the screen.We are big Netflix fans and use this unit often to view films, videos from YouTube etc.  a great buy for Apple Fans!
summary: Comes in handy for our whole family

reviewText: My wife really liked these shoes and was very proud of me for making the purchase all on my own.  Santa has been good to me this year...
summary: I scored some big points with this buy!!!

reviewText: My young kids love it....and my wife and I use it for Netflix among other things.  I wish these guys would pick up some key cable channels so I could dump my cable provider.
summary: Another Apple device to have fun with

reviewText: Needed one for my office and since I have already 2, one for my big tv and another one for my wife's tv in her sewing room, I got another one. It works great.
Need I say more?  The usability is great and everything, but they need to expand on the Apps so you can watch more without a cable subscription.
Needs more content, besides YouTube there is not whole lot worth watching. It does connect all other apple products together. Unless they add more content I think one can live without it.
Netflix app is not as good as PS3. No continuous play option. Apple TV remote works on same frequency as iMac so I have to have my computer in sleep mode to use the remote.
Netflix has rather limited online content.  Apple has all the latest releases on iTunes.  When or when can we have an iTunes subscription service?
Netflix, Hulu, 1080p, AirDisplayenough said...I would love to see a dedicated player so you can insert an external HD an reproduce or even stream it with an HD on your Airport Extreme.
Netflix, Hulu+, and iTunes is all really need to have all the content you want at your figure tips with this awesome device!
Netflix streaming sound is off a fair amount, other than that it is an excellent device, especially in combination with AirPlay on iPhones/iPads.
Never seen it for less than MSRP before, great price and of course great product- but it's an apple product so you knew that!
New Apple tv works like a charm.  Easy to hook up.  Great video quality.  'Like the new screen layout, too.  Highly recommend it.

Nice for people who have apple ecosystem (like my girlfriends family) and you get netflix and your libraries on your TV.Wish there were more apps supporting it.Also im not sure if there is a work around, but while airplaying certain apps, picture would not full screen.  I know the screen ratio of my GF's IP4 is different from a widescreen, however it was basically a 4:3 inside a 16:9 inside a 4:3 as their was space all around the picture.  Tried adjusting all the settings, but it wouldn't atleast match up the height or the width.
Nice interface, very easy to setup and connect with other apple devices and services.  Only con is limited content -- no hbo go, no amazon prime, etc
Nice product. Be careful when doing the update to the new version. After the upgrade product crashes. You must have a micro-usb cable to do a restore in iTunes.
No comparisson with other similars ... extremally powerful and high quality. If you are looking for a good equipment...here it is!
No issues at this time...  Seems to be doing the job that it is required to do...  Will definitely help with foreign language instruction in the classroom.
No problem hooking the Apple TV up...streams my iTunes to my TV with no problems...I would recommend it to everyone.
No surprises here folks! Great for Netflix and streaming videos from your apple products to your TV. Yup pretty much a must have
summary: It's apple tv and works just as described

reviewText: No surprises, its gorgeous, its wonderful, its amazing, its Apple TV. Easy to setup (a child could do it without reading a single instruction manual because it walks you through everything), easy to navigate, beautiful interface. Glad the price has come down in recent years but I'd still probably pay what it used cost. I'm in love.

Not a lot of instructions for connecting to the I pad. Or phone.  Just the Mac.  Very little info on cables you need.  Even TV show reruns cost.  Using this could become expensive.  But it is great for showing what is on you I pad.  Controller is simple to use!

Not being a techie, I am unable to understand how to use the box.  The instructions that came with it are anything but helpful. One could put the directons on a 4x5 file card!  When I stream movies from my MacbookPro, the go to my big screen over a wire and I don't have to go through the "enter password" process every time I use it.Save yourself a $100.00 and get a wire from  your computer and enjoy the same experience the box might provide, if you knew how to use it.
summary: I found out I can do the same thing the box does, with my Macbook Pro and a cord!

reviewText: nothing around as good as this. I like it and recomend to anybody. buy it you will love it also is easy to install.

Nothing has really changed since the old apple tv. The box is smaller yes, and stilll does what it used to. The issue I had was airplay mirroring. Its laggy, so in order to stream from your ipad and so forth it wasnt the greatest solution. I am sure apple will perfect as they always do, but in my opinion this is just not quite ready.

Nothing on this thing is free except if you have any movies of your own (and you have to convert them into a special aTV format you cant watch .avi) 1080p is great, it even has that extra clarity that apple products have these days, Once this thing can be jailbroken it will be unstoppable.
summary: Awesome product - just waiting for a jailbrake

reviewText: Not many channels, and more than a few, like ABC, HBO, ESPN, MLB, etc require a cable subscription.  I'm gueesing even ROKU has this problem with sports and other premiium content.
Not much you can really say about an Apple product I guess. It does what they say it's supposed to do, does it well, didn't cost an arm and a leg, hasn't broken or crashed, so I'm good with it.
summary: Does what it's supposed to do.

reviewText: Now I can watch what ever TV show or downloaded movies I like anytime I want. Or pictures,music...Is there a way to type words faster?!

Now I have all in one access to my netflix, hulu plus, iphone music library etc etc. It doesnt stream video from devices very well for some reason but for everything else its great. Plus I can use my iphone as a remote! Sweet!
Now she can hook up her IPOD to the TV.Yes we would recommend this product to other people.  Cuz its awesome.
summary: my daughter is so happy to receive this item.

reviewText: Now that it has HBOGo, it has MOST of what I use (Netflix, Hulu, HBOGo, and WatchESPN).  It also is an easy interface to our iPhones and iPad.  Typical Apple mentality - I didn't take any thought to start streaming music and videos from our other Apple products.  I'd like them to sign on to the Amazon App next so i can stream Prime content.  Also, I wouldn't order movies off of it as they are several dollars more than through Amazon (which we stream through a PS3).  The remote is typical Apple - small, simple, and just works.  I got this before Google ChromeCast came out.  I would say there are regrets, but CC doesn't yet have the Apps, and the AppleTV interface (assuming you have apple products) works seamlessly.
Obviously this is a great device to possess...it's Apple. However, on top of being able to conveniently purchase this product, I also got it at a discounted rate....I'm Loving this!

Okay, my initial plan was to save up and just buy a mac mini and hook up an external hard drive to play all my iTunes library, but that's going to take a while, and in the meantime, I had 4TB of iTunes videos (sad, I know) that had no way to get to my TV...so I picked this up. (Thank you, refund fairy!)It was a nice surprise that it didn't make me authorize it, since I've maxed out the number of devices I can authorize, and I didn't know who was going to get cut from the lineup (again, weep for me and my troubles!) and that made life nice.The downside was that the apple remote was operating my laptop and the apple TV at the same time, so while I got it on the network I think I watch/paused about five movies on my computer.I had to turn the home sharing feature off, then on again on my laptop to get the streaming effect going (not airplay, I think my computer is too old for that to work without airparrots assistance, but I hooked this up yesterday so haven't tried too hard yet) and then later when I went to change videos I had to do the same thing. Minor issue for me, but if you're operating a desktop in another room you might be led into temptation to use bad words after that goes on for a while. Also if the computer you're streaming from goes to sleep, that may or may not affect whether the movie continues (I just muted a really long music playlist)So I love this thing, but I also have months of iTunes exclusive video to play with...if you primarily watch other kinds of videos, I don't know that this will bring you nearly the skeeky joy it brought me. Best of luck though!Also I used a mediabridge HDMI 3D quality cable, and the picture is gorgeous, even the SD stuff I tried.

Okay, so my daughter wanted something to stream NetFlix on so she could watch Finding Bigfoot (don't get me started!).  I was torn between AppleTV and the Roku 3, but since everything she has is Apple I opted for the AppleTV.Installation was very simple.Operation is smooth and simple.The only ding I would give it would be that it doesn't do Amazon Instant.Overall, my daughter loves it so I'm happy.  Now she has moved from Finding Bigfoot to Duck Dynasty.  Have I failed as a parent???
Ok, I bought into the Apple infrastructure.  I and my wife have iPhones, iPads and Macbooks.  This is the ideal supplement to these products.  It installs easily and operates seamlessly.
Once we saw how much we used and enjoyed our Apple TV in our Media Center, we just had to buy another for our bedroom.

One for my shop, Bought one for my parents and one for my LR Bedroom. Some people want the Apple TV 2 because of Jail breaking. I don't know. This is 1080P the 2 is 720. Only other channel I wanted to watch was HBO GO so I got a ROKU XS. Same thing as Jail-breaking an Apple 2 but its 1080P so is the Apple 3 and a lot less money that a Jail broke Apple TV 2 Plus,if you screw up and get your Apple TV 2 updated, you lose your Jail Break. This is a great product. Oh the updating over wifi would not work. Failed on all three. Found a Mini USB from an old cell phone and plugged it into my computer, Opened iTunes, update screen popped up and in 5 minutes had the latest firmware.I would buy this over the Apple V 2 even if they were the same price. Great picture! Great audio, Air play, Blue Tooth, everything I need!
summary: I have 3 of these baby's now!

reviewText: ONE OF THE BEST APPLE DEVICES OUT THERE. Cant stop using it. LOVE APPLE FOR LIFE. YOU CANT GO WRONG WITH IT
One of the best bang for the buck ... I wished all of Apple products were more in the general price range as this product.
One of the best purchases I have ever made.  Life without a cable bill is one of the best choices i have ever made.

One of the cheapest prices I found for a new Apple TV. My only issue is my router, make sure you have a good router that supports all the devices you use or you might find you need to reset your router often. Hopefully Apple will update the device so you can change the apps that are installed and you can add apps you want.
summary: Good price and love the features!

reviewText: One of the nicest, most productive  purchases I've made.  It has made my life much easier.  Don't have to leave the house to watch movies.

one of the people on my list has been asking for this but I did not know it did not come with the cord to hook it up..but delivery was fast and no problem in ordering..thanks for the offer...Merry Christmas

one word... Awesome. It's got Hulu and Netflix pre loaded, all you need is an internet connection (faster internet prefered, above 3mbps) for streaming from Hulu or Netflix. I love the fact that you can stream the movies right from your iTunes account to the TV.The CONS: If you want to stream movies from your computer, you must have iTunes running in the background and be able to connect to it, otherwise you cannot watch them. If the program is closed, you lose the connection and the movie turns off.
summary: A TV system that talks to your computer?

reviewText: One word describes this device.  AWESOME!  I love all Apple products and would not change.  I would definitely recommend this product to everyone
One word that resumes my reason for buying this: Airplay. I can stream music and videos from my iPhone and iPad.

On home videos, the WiFi has no problems streaming 720p from my server, computers, and iPad & iPhone but 1080p is too high bitrate.  Need to connect the cat5e to eliminate the intermittent buffering.  Other than that, works just fine.
Only complaint - wist it came with an HDMI cable so I didn't have to make a separate purchase. Other than that, the wifi is very good. I like the user interface.
Only sad part is even national channels like ABC want a cable network to play those channels… at least PBS is available...
only thing missing is HBO Go.  other than that love it.  The mirroring from my MBA and Iphone5 is pretty good, gets a little choppy.
only works through my iPad and screen share. Wish that the app would work on here too. Annoying that I pay for a subscription and I am limited to the devices I can use it on.
Opened up a new world of entertainment for us. Saw 4 years of "Breaking Bad" in 10 Days. Canceled all our premium channels.Make sure you have an available HDMI outlet on your TV.
Ordered this for a Christmas present, it arrived in a few days, great product, great price & I didn't have to deal with the crowds in the stores!  How can I complain?
Other products do steaming but dont give access to AirPlay as does Apple. Super simple to install and use.. Great product..

Our Apple TVs extends our TVs to include experiencing more of our content - pics and vids - and adds to our options for viewing downloaded / streamed content. And it is controllable from from iOS devices.
Our church uses this for projection of songs and Bible verses. I imagine we will also use to show movies in the future

Our family has bought into the Apple ecosystem, particularly with many iTunes movies and such, so the Apple TV is a no-brainer for us.  We actually have four of them across the various generations.  The Apple TV is one of many largely comparable products.  If you have any recent Apple products (iPhones, iPad, iTunes movies, etc.) and are looking for a fan free (i.e., absolutely silent), energy efficient box to plug into your TV to see a diversity of media, then this might be the purchase you are looking for.  If you are not invested much or at all into the Apple ecosystem, The Roku 3 is better.  In some ways, the Roku 3 is better (e.g., it has more channels, particularly Amazon Instant Videos), but the two are largely comparable.  To some degree, the real question is whether you want access to iTunes and airplay on the AppleTv or Amazon videos and more channels on the Roku 3.  Trust your gut on which you should buy, but buy own of them.  You won't regret it...

Our grandson wanted this for Christmas so we ordered it for him.  He is 16 and into technology gadgets.  With this he can hook up to his I phone and his Apple laptop and watch videos and movies on his TV.  I asked him if it was working okay and he said "it's great".  I gave it 5 stars because he is happy and the order was received in a timely manner and I was happy to find something he really wanted.

Our in-laws got us hooked on a series on Netflix.  A little investigation showed that the best way (not the cheapest) was to buy an Apple TV.  I like it because, in addition to the wide selection of alternate programs, I can mirror my iPad to the TV.  I have really enjoyed exploring all the unusual show available on some of the channels available on Apple TV.
summary: Apple TV Gives Us More Choices To Watch

reviewText: Our ISP is slow and we were unable to use netflix  at all. We got the Apple tv and so far it has never failed to play whatever program we choose.Now we have used the Apple TV for several weeks longer and it has still not failed to load and play without interruption.

Our previous experience has been with an LG Blu-Ray player that had online connectivity. We thought that was great until someone shared their positive experiences using Apple TV.  We immediately ordered ourselves one and 2 days later (love Amazon Prime!), we were in business.  It is so much easier to navigate than our Blu-Ray player and quickly became our device of choice. We particularly like Air Play and use our iPhones and iPad with it often. It's great for playing YouTube videos and watching Netflix/Amazon Prime movies. Another bonus is the ability to project your iPhone/iPad photos onto the TV, particularly nice if you have company over and don't want to pass around phones. Loved it so much I ordered one for my parents too. If you have an iPhone or iPad, it's definitely worth getting one!

Our son got us interested in purchasing the apple tv.  It is user friendly and we have used it many times.  The cable networks aren't putting out many good movies to choose from so this is an answer to being able to select good movies.  I would recommend it to everyone.
Out of the box, this version of appletv is pretty basic but runs great. The real treat is when the jailbreak is found and you can put XBMC on it. At that point, you can rate this thing 8 stars.
Outstanding, great quality and great picture vs. using my television applications.
summary: Apple product and quality - need I say more!

reviewText: Particularly like Airplay mirroring capability from iPhone and iPad.  However, it takes some effort to fully understand how to take advantage of its features.
Perfect condition love the Apple tv, no problems.  Great product I use it to stream videos and music. Thank you.
Perfect for the home that has apple devices, and kids. New channel/apps appear that provide more content. No need to waste money on a smart tv.
Perfect gift to a lover of technology, easy to use for a non-techy too! :) Would definitely recommend to a friend!
perfect product, air play an amazing feature. Totally loved it and if you have any other apple product at home (ipad, iphone, mac book) then just buy it. Worth every penny!!

Perfect product to make my Bose Lifestyle V35 system wireless enabled. Dont have to worry about anything to keep pace with latest Apple technologies (read lightning vs. 30 pin iPod dock) and offers so many features to you like airplay, mirroring etc. My main objective was to supplement and enhance my bose HTIB and advance its connectivity....does more than what i intended.
Performs as one would expect from an Apple product. Easy hookup out of box and very easy set-up. No HDMI cable included, so make sure you have one.

Personally, i use this thing all the time. If you have an ipod or ipad and use youtube non-stop, I feel this is a must buy. I use it to watch youtube vids from my ipod to my hd tv everynight before bed. I love it, is compact and easy to use.

Per usual, top quality product by Apple. Works exactly as expected.One note since the solution is not in the manual: if you have a router that has dual-band frequency ability (both 5Ghz and 2.4Ghz) and you connect your Apple TV to the Internet via Wifi, sometimes you may get a blank screen when attempting AirPlay. I was able to get around this by plugging AppleTV in to my router directly via Ethernet cable. Hopefully this is an option for you if you run into this issue.
Picture & sound quality Awesome! Available programs? Awesome! Like it for NetFlix & a few others better then TiVo! Thank  you!@
summary: So much better then TiVo for:

reviewText: Playing music and view videos through the AppleTv wireless. Great to having a good time sharing your music, video, podcast, etc.
Plug and play for Netflix, I tunes, home sharing ect. Love the ease of use and great set up. Highly recommend.

Plug in this simple little device and it will not only transform your television into a streaming video device, but may change the way you watch TV!Apple has changed the way we acquire and listen to music, and with the help of Netflix, iTunes, and Youtube, your viewing possibilities are endless!ProsStupid simple setup.Small form factor.Ethernet/Wifi connectivity.HDMI/Optical audio out.Low power consumption.A remote your parents will appreciate.Built-in Movie rental/store.Easily associate your iTunes Match account and listen to your music library.New features and functionality through firmware updates.Price.ConsLimited to iTunes and Netflix (for now).ReviewWith competing Roku, Sony, WD, and others breathing down their neck, Apple's Apple TV stands tall against the competition. With a rock solid interface, intuitive interface, and access to your purchased iTunes movies and music; if you are okay investing in the Apple ecosystem, this is a winner!Setup of the Apple TV is a snap. Plug in the unit, and simply enter your iTunes credentials to unlock all of your purchases and transforms your television into a modern streaming device.The remote has four (4) buttons! The simplicity of your interaction with the Apple TV compliments the simplicity of the interface. The interface may lack the bells and wistles that other systems may include, but ultimately promotes searching for and enjoying content.With rentals hovering in the $3 - $7 range, and HD or Standard movies starting around $10, some may be able to ditch their expensive cable service. Very happy with my Apple TVs! Highly recommend!
Plug it into the wall, plug it into the TV, walk through the setup and you're cooking with gas. The interface to Netflix is the best out there. Be sure to get the Remote app if you have an iPhone.
Plug it up and it works the way is says. I use this for music streaming with a DAC. Well made, but its apple.
Poor streaming and caching performance otherwise ok, however most of my media is purchased on amazon so not used much as pushing from android to other compatible devices.
Pretty awesome device, couple things I with I could do differently but Im still learning. Can't really go wrong buying an Apple product .

Pretty lame that it doesn't have Pandora, but otherwise, everything works. The apple version of Pandora (Apple Radio or something) sucks because it forces you to WATCH commercials and no matter what you do, the sound will keep playing even if you try to go to the home screen. Very annoying.
summary: works great, but doesn't have Pandora

reviewText: Primarily purchased it because I was having streaming issues with my Blue-Ray disc player accessing Netscape. The Apple TV is working much better (faster) with very few streaming hesitations. Much improved menu system not only with Netscape but also many of the other Apps available from AppleTV. Also like the ability to play my iTunes, display my iPhoto library and mirror my iPad to the TV.
Probably but this thing is pretty nice.  I kind of hate giving Apple all my money, but they make a darn good product.
Prob best to wait til the new apple tv comes out but i bought this anyway and use it for airplay.  Works perfectly.
Product is as advertised, enjoy music, video from your computer . You tube on big screen is great, very simple setup. I love the airplay feature.
summary: Great addition to your home network

reviewText: Product is exactly as advertised. Great for Netflix or streaming anything from your laptop. Just wish it had NFL streaming and I wouldn't need my cable anymore.
Prompt, as Stated, PleasedGood quality.  Good Price, I have bough three of these.It was a real convenience to be able to purchase this item on line.  Thank you.

PROs:* Easy integration with a house-full of Apple products* Simple, pleasing menus* I like the ability to watch movie previews, in which hope springs (albeit fleetingly) that a given flick won't suckCONs:* I would have liked to have had greater connectivity with the internet at large, like Google Chromecast

PROS: easy to setup, easy to navigate, works consistentlyCONS: No App Store, on smaller TVs it's difficult to read text on the screen and no way to update it.My wife and I love our Apple TV... it works wonderfully and we have not had any issues with streaming at all. We gave up Cable and have been using this exclusively for a month with no issues. The only real issues we are having is reading some of the text descriptions of Movies or Shows on the NetFlix or iTunes Movies apps. We think with a bigger TV this shouldn't be a problem.

Pros:If you have an Apple products like iPad, iPhone you can play or mirror content from your ipad and iphone on your LCD/LED TV .It also plays content from your iTunes on your PC/Mac.It also has optical output that you can connect to your old receiver to have 5.1 audio from Netflix.Cons:When compared to Roku 2 it has very less content. Roku 2 has way more channels to offer that Apple TV.

Pros- It is as good as the ROKU just a different format layout of displays etc..I have both the Apple TV and the ROKU and don't regret the Apple TV- It give you options to watch TV. For example I use Apple TV to watch Youtube/ ROKU to my knowledge does not have the icon for Youtube.Cons- Remote is too small and easy to hit the center point when you want to hit the sides. Also my version of iPhoto is not current and will not work with the Apple TV.  The Apple TV recognizes this and instructs you to buy the latest iPhoto app at the iTunes store.For $89 and free prime shipping: I would recommend it and I would buy it again because it gives me options away from my basic cable source.Update Dec-30th 2013: I asked my teen daughter which see likes better the Apple TV or ROKU and she said Apple TV because it was much faster than ROKU to access programs.  I'd never considered this point so keep that in mind when considering one or the other.
summary: ROKU Vs. Apple TV are the same with the added bonus of it working with your other apple products and iTunes

reviewText: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my daughter.  Works great, we were able to use it over the holidays before she returned back to school.  Great price and quick delivery.

Purchased as a christmas gift for my parents to use with their ipads.  They love it! Simple to use, but also extremely feature-rich, they stream facebook/youtube from their ipads in addition to using netflix and purchasing movies.
Purchased a second one for the den.  Have issues with losing audio when going to mirroring mode  Not sure whether problem is with AppleTV, HDMI cable or operating system updates.
purchased for myself and my mom and we both enjoy it  itunes and netflix  can be used with this and you tube is great  just make sure what cables are needed

Purchased the Apple TV with the hopes of ditching high priced cable.  Unfortunately that has not come to fruition yet but still trying.SImple to hook up, just need the HDMI Cable purchased in addition to the Apple TV.Enjoy the 'Sync" features that can be used along with an iphone or android phone.Overall price is very reasonable.

Put in my master bed room  and have used it for TVs outside on patio and even in the garage without cable and can watch in HD.Downside, I have COX cable and at the moment they do not let you mirror live TV from my iPad to TV, but my buddy has Dish and said it works from the Dish app.  All in all great product and use a lot.

Quality of this product met my expectations. It arrived on time, new, and in the original packaging. The product is easy to setup and easy to use. Perfect for anyone wanting to access internet on their tv. It's perfect and anyone can handle this technology!If mine were to ever break, get stolen, or lost in a move.. I'd definitely purchase it again!
summary: Brand New, packaging perfect & delivered as promised!

reviewText: Read a lot about the AppleTV and wasn't sure if it was worth purchasing.  Decided to buy one for home and one for the office.  If you have any wifi products (tv, bluray, PS3) then there is no need for AppleTV.  The Air Play feature is nice but it only works for a few things.  I have DirecTV but that cannot be shown via Air Play.  So if you have any wifi products or are thinking this will be great for the air play feature, I would do some investigating before purchasing.  At $40 it would be ok.

Really glad I purchased this streamer. I had an iPhone already so it just felt right to get! I wanted to cut my cable bill a get into video streaming and it was well worth it. I would have like more channels like the Roku 3, but I am more than satisfied with the features. I especially like the air play feature where anything that is played on your apple device, it can be streamed straight to your tv through the Apple TV.
summary: Great purchase for a great price!

reviewText: Really great item.  I enjoy watching prime with this.  Very easy to install and use.  Waiting on prime to get a few more of my favorite movies
Really like my Apple TV. I end up spending more time using it than regular TV. It's nice playing my iTunes content on my home stereo. I only wish it came with Pandora.
really love this!!!! have one in every room in the hose and connects with all my other apple electronics.......quick delivery also...

Really pleased with the purchase, mostly use if for access to Netflix and Hulu but it also has some great other apps Im starting to use. It needs a decent internet connection. Like all Apple products it looks pretty smart, is extremely small and the home screen is easy to navigate and smart. Used to use Xbox to do some of the functions this performs, this is much easier and well worth the price.
Received it on time in good shapeEasy to install and useMakes it easy to connect your computer to your tvAccessing variety of stuff such as Netflix ,Hulu plus, YouTube, etcThanks
Received overnight, sets up easily, great performance,slick remote control, can hoop up iPhone and stream right from it. Typical apple product. Gotta love it

Received the Apple TV on time and excellent condition, I love the way you can mirror your IPad or ITouch to the Apple TV, reason given 4 stars, will not play Amazon Prime movies thru it, can't understand if you can get and watch Amazon Prime on the IPad and ITouch why it won't play thru a third device (Apple TV) does not make any sense?

Recently I purchased this unit to be able to use the share function between the new devices.  I currently have the older 160GB Apple TV with the hard drive.  This one is small and sleek and doesn't seem to use as much energy as the prior one.  I did notice when using uTube and watching trailers that it was a bit sluggish compared to the older one I have.  I'm going to give it a few more try's and update.  I only took away one star due to the sluggishness and having to sometime wait for a Trailer to download.  in the past, I didn't have to wait as long.
summary: The unit works very well with iPhone5, Ipad Mini, iPad, but a bit sluggish

reviewText: Remember to purchase your cords when you order your AppleTV as it doesn't come with them.  It works great with my netflix acccount.  Amazon needs to open Prime Streaming up for use on AppleTV.
Remote fail! Remote will not work had to buy a new one at the store. Other than that it works well

Remote stopped working the 2nd day.  Replaced the battery to no help.  Instead of being able to charge my ipad at night, now I have to take it to bed in order to use it as the remote.  (Not that smooth to use really.)I wish I would have tried other options to see if this is the best option or if the slow and delayed response is normal for this type of tv option.edit:  I Changed from 3 to 4 stars knowing that my issues could possibly have been my own.  I will give it the benefit of the doubt.  I will say that I really like having apple TV most of the time.edit 2:  Make sure to mount the apple TV to where the remote can "see" it.
summary: Remote quit working almost immediately. Self-induced.

reviewText: Save a lot of money by getting rid of cable. Instead, get one of this streaming gadgets (Apple TV, Roku, etc.) to watch your favorite shows and movies on Hulu, Netflix, Redbox, etc.
Saw my son's and loved it.  Like It because it is so easy to set up and use.I have already shown it to two people and they bought one the next day.

Screw cable!  We love our Apple TV.  We have one for our bedroom and living room televisions.  We subscribe to Hulu and Netflix, and we use the YouTube and SkyNews channels often.  I just wish Apple TV would allow use of Amazon Prime Streaming on their device.  I'm sure they feel that it competes with iTunes, but I am both an iTunes and an Amazon customer.  I don't use one more than the other.
Seamlessly air plays ipad right onto the tvMany other apps really converts any tv into a smart tv, but  with Apple standards
summary: A must own for any ipad owner

reviewText: Second Apple TV I've bought.  This one was a gift for my daughter and son-in-law.  They love it.  Works great.

Serves the purpose and now that we are accustomed to using... we don't use TV or BluRay apps. Being able to stream video and images from Mac laptop has done wonders for my neck and enjoyment level when wife shares schtuff. Apple should include the plastic mounting bracket and loosen the purse strings...because of that, I give it a 4.

Set up is easy.  Makes my Net Flix render very nice and fast with great audio compared to my smart tv.  Was disappointed with available apps.  If I were not an Apple person would definitely go for Roku 3 instead.  May anyway if Apple TV requires jailbreaking to add content.  Love how it mirrors in my laptop or iphone or ipad so easily.  Starting to get a little weary with Apple's revenue ideas by limiting content to PAY only.
Setup & navigation couldn't be easier. Features are phenomenal. Airplay does more than I had hoped.  They've yet to disappoint me.

Setup: The setup on the box was very easy. Apple TV saw my wireless internet right away and after some tweaking I was watching movies in no time. Just remember that you do need a HDMI cable.Pros: The usability was truly was better than what I expected. It allowed me to watch movies and listen to music from iTunes. I could also use my TV as an extension of my I-Pad which was an added bonus. This device will continue my use of Apple products for the time being.Cons: I think the only con for me is I live in an area where the internet is not that speedy. So by the time I am using wireless the Apple TV system can be slow. AKA: slow buffering and everything taking longer than it should. This is no fault of Apple TV just something to consider if you don’t have fast internet.
summary: A great add-on to the plethora of Apple products you own

reviewText: Setup was easy, it doesn't take up much room and I love being able to play movies from my iTunes account on my TV.  I wish Apple would make an "all in one" device that would both play movies/content as well as render the laptop display on the screen that would be ideal but, sadly, the AppleTV unit only plays iTunes content (an "Airplay" unit is required to show the computer desktop on the TV).
summary: Good device, easy setup, wish it would include desktop rendering on the tv

reviewText: She loves it. It is convenient and you can stream and mirror your apple product to your TV through it. I have one myself.
Shipping was fast, everything works fine and the price was very reasonable. Thanks for the easy transaction. There are cheaper alternatives but it is nice to have the easy to use apple interface
Should come with HDMI cord, hard to find we still have not been able to set it up, hope it works
Should only add the option to access your local downloaded files as well. Pelple should have the option of having other resources besides Apple to buy Media.
Simple and easy to set-up and use. I mainly bought it to watch my Netflix on a larger screen than my laptop. Thank you Apple as usual.

Simple and easy to use, the AirPlay integration with iPad/iPhone works very well.  Selection of "channels" somewhat limited, you would get a lot more on the Roku.  But it was the AirPlay feature that had me get the AppleTV.
summary: Simple to use works well AirPlay great feature with iPAD

reviewText: Simple to set up, effective and enjoyable to use. And it pays for itself in replacing our bill for cable tv.
Simple to use! Very simple to use. Love the airplay from iPhone/iPad. Setup took only few minutes - work flawlessly
summary: Great product - you love its simplicity and features  and works great

reviewText: Simply awesome. Crystal clear HD picture. Only gripe is no amazon app. Idiot proof setup, nice clean interface, and love the mirroring functionality. Turned in a cable box to save $ after getting my second Apple TV.
Simply great, it works great in india.The quality of the movie or image are great.But some time airplay is getting crashed
Simply take it out of the box, plug it in and connect it to your wifi.  Then start enjoying the ability to watch anything you have on iTunes right on your TV.  You can also use Netflix, etc.
Simply the best ever for movies, shows and integrated with my laptop, iPad, iPhone and best of all can photo stream.

Since Apple goods never update until 6 months at a time, I suppose their company can invest in long term goods that work well, like this AirTV device.  I hate those cords such as for the S4 or iPod Touch; they either mess up my phone or are too frustratingly short.  The AirTV is a logical, contemporary upscale alternative.
summary: Hard to find for Android goods

reviewText: Since getting this device my eyes have opened up to all it can do.Gameplay with up to 3 others so far.Just need iphone to stream video and music.It has taken over my living room.Easy to hook up.Kids look at me lovingly.Sure that won't last long but my new found toy is here for good!
Since I don't have a Smart TV, this is the next best thing.  Works great.  Love it.  Love watching all the PBS Masterpiece Theatre shows on Amazon Prime.

Since we bought this quite a while ago I feel that I have a good idea as to the pros and cons.  First, we cut the cable cord and really haven't missed it.  Have Netflix and Hulu Plus which, mostly, fill in the gaps.  I miss AMC (The Walking Dead) and the Food Network but can live without them.  More channels have been added to Apple TV which has made it that much better.My one frustration is how well it plays (or doesn't play) with our other apple products.  One of the selling points is that you can mirror a show from your laptop, iPad, phone etc and it will be a seamless transition. I've found it to be not as pleasant a viewing experience as more times than not the video is skippy. It is a broadband hog. If someone is online playing video games then the mirroring is worse and it interferes with the gaming experience as well.It would get 5 stars if it played better with the other apple products and if it had amazon on there so we could use Prime to view TV and movies
Sleek easy to setup and use, first time user, like the way you can connect with other i stuff iPad phone, haven't figured out how to connect to PC yet
Small and easy to use.  The remote is very small and does lip into couch easily.  But we love it.

Small, compact and extremely easy to install. This is my first venture into the MAC world and, so far, I'm impressed.  Tons of choices -- movies, TV shows, podcasts, iTUNES. The only downside (and I'll 'master' it) is that the remote is SO small. Easy to lose. I'm going to velcro it to a block of wood the size of my TV and cable remotes.  I've already recommended it to friends and bought one for my grown sons.  Oh, and I'm catching up on Seasons 1 and 2 of "Downton Abbey."

Small, elegant, and simple to use.  Perfect for Netflix, hulu, youtube, HBO Go etc.  If you can't use the apps directly it is super simple to stream your laptop or desktop to your tv.  I think that feature is worth the price in itself.  No more cord problems.I use it all the time because I don't pay for cable anymore.

Smaller than the original which I already had.  Put my old one in another room but this new version lets me view and listen to my iPhone and iPad movies and music.  Saves time putting everything on my computer.  Only problem is there is a bug getting it to work initially only because of Apple software.  Unfortunately you need to unplug everything then re attach cables to everything for this to finally work.  After that have not had any problem once I did a restart. Took me hours to find this fix online.  Now I love it!
So cool to now be able to watch Netflix and Hulu on my big screen TV, wirelessly no less!  Transmission so far has been excellent.  Have fun.
summary: a piece of cake made of Apple

reviewText: So easy to install and if you need guidance AppleCare is there for you to guide you step by step.Will certainly recommend it , so much easier to use than streaming through other devices.
So easy to install. Up and running in no time. Great for Netflix. Easy interface and availability of programming. Super easy to use with iPhone and MacBook.

So easy to setup and has so many features. We got one for all members of our family as gifts. We stream movies, listen to music and the best part for us is viewing all our iPhone pictures and videos right on the TV. We set up a family photo stream and every member of our family can now share their photos at any time. Now when we turn ours on we go to the photo stream and get to see all the photos the family posted and they get to see our photos. Grandma and grandpa just love it as it's so easy and they get to see new photos of their grand kids as soon as we post them. They love getting new photos almost everyday. The feature I personally like is the ability to mirror the iPhone so when I'm trying to show someone how to do something on their iPhone I can simply turn on the Apple TV, set up mirroring on my phone and then what I do on my iPhone is shown right on the TV screen. For the price you can't go wrong.
summary: If you have an iPhone or iPad  you should get an Apple TV

reviewText: So easy to set up. Simply plugged in 2 cords (had to purchase HDMI cord separately), did the software update and it was up and going in about 5 minutes. I am a photographer and I love being able to see my photos on a big screen. I also enjoy being able to see my videos and movies that I purchased from iTunes on the big screen.  It does so much more, like being able to rent new lelease movies for about $4.99.  I can't wait till my kids get home from school, they are going to love it. I may purchase a coupe more of these for my kids rooms as well. They will love watching Netflix and utube videos on their tvs. Thumbs up Apple you've made another great product. I should have bought this long ago.
So easy to use and fun to play with! Def a must for apple users. We love it! Thanks apple!
So easy to use, a really great product. One thing to note is that if you do not own an HDMI cable you will need one to hook this up to your TV. The one Amazon has is inexpensive and works perfectly.
So far everyday is an adventure using it. Works very well, not to hard to figure out and I have moved it to 3 different TVs with no problems.

So far so good.  The problems I had with it was that I live in a town house so I had to hard wire the system, now it works fine.  At the time I was also having issues with my MAC so I took them both to a MAC diagnostic shop....glad it was not only me, the battery in the remote for the MAC TV was dead....there goes the money I saved on S&H and taxes.
summary: Works for what I wanted it to do.

reviewText: So far we are using it for Netflix and viewing our own photos and movies as well as others that are sent to us or are on-line.  We have our high speed DSL cable connected directly to it and have not tried our WIFI as we did not need to and wanted to avoid any potential problems.  All of our computers are Apples as well as our iPhones so we know and like the platform.There has not been one blip or problem of any kind in the month we have been using it.  The quality of the image is outstanding.  Our only fear is that of losing the beautiful, but very tiny remote that came with it.  I have been using my iPhone as the remote with the ap for that and it works perfect.
So far, works ok.  Sometimes I get disconnects when AirPlay, but not sure why.  Didn't have this problem with my apple tv 2.  Will try it for a bit longer before I deem it defective
So happy with this purchase, I'm in the process of getting 2 more for my nephew and sis. Thanks apple!
summary: Best purchase in a long time!!!

reviewText: So I had heard about the magnificence of Apple TV, but now, now I am experiencing it for my self. I love it, it connects all of my apple devices and I can plug it in and watch what I want, when I want, where I want, Apple TV is great! It is inexpensive and you just have to take it out of the box, plug it in and you are ready to go! SO GREAT!

So, it isn't quite the Swiss army knife that a Roku media player is.  It's really locked into the iTunes eco-system.  But if you're already invested in it, especially if you're using an all-Mac, all-iOS setup, this is probably the most value-driven thing that Apple has ever put out there to make your devices even more cool.  I love that I can be commuting home, watching a video on my iPhone, then as soon as I walk in the door, throw the video over AirPlay to the Apple TV and keep watching on my television.  Seamless.  And I love being able to mirror my iPad on my TV.  And tied to my Mac's iTunes library, I can listen to whatever music I want over my TV's speakers, instead of using a separate speaker system for my laptop.  I also love that I never need to go to another clunky appliance to watch Netflix -- the Apple TV's interface for it may be the most elegant out there.  Yes, I wish it did a bit more -- like play files from non iTunes folders -- but it's still pretty great.

So I've had the original Apple TV with the 150gb hard drive since it came out.  Great device, only most recently I was getting more and more irritated by the effort necessary to sync the device with my library.  The latest TV model is awesome with the streaming ability.  That aspect along makes it worth the price.  Couple it with the Airplay functionality and its an amazing deal.

Solid device. AirPlay audio is great and is not compressed like Bluetooth.Apple TV does not have all the channels of Roku but most of those extra Roku channels are junk! I also have two Roku boxes and the main plus is access to Amazon Prime videos. But that (small) addition is about it.Regardless, I'd recommend owning both devices as both are useful. For now. But Internet TV is undergoing some big changes in Fall of 2013 and, as expected, Apple seems set to lead the changes.

Solid performer. Easy to install and integrate with existing A/V setup, home networking was a breeze.Biggest problem: Lack of 3rd party apps. Unlike the Roku, there aren't very many "channels" or apps that you can add to customize the experience. The built-in apps are good but not great (Internet Radio app is terrible).
summary: Pretty good. Could use some extras.

reviewText: So little money to receive such pleasure. The interface is excellent.  I enjoy using YOUTUBE for music and other video watching.  Love Netflix and many other programs.  For $100.00 dollars you just can't beat it for another viewing option.
So many new features.  Easy to install.  I resisted for a long while, but the mirroring feature of ipad is great to show movies and share my screen.
So many things available at no extra cost. Variety galore. It was easy to install and is easy to operate. I lowered my cable package and save money all year.

Something as small as an Apple TV can transform a regular television into a gateway for all your Apple media, You Tube, NetFlix and more. I use it so that I did not have to order another expensive DVR from the cable company... The interface it the highlight of this device though using the tiny remote can be a pain for large handed people.
summary: Makes a dumb TV into a seamless Apple Device

reviewText: So much functionality in such a little box! In less than 10 minutes out of the box my TV was interactive within my network, my laptop and two iPads.

So much in a small package. I ordered this so we could watch House of Cards, produced by Net-flicks. Great series and now we watch movies and view things from my iPad on the larger TV screen whenever we want.
So pleased with this purchase. I absolutely love that I can also now listen to my itunes music through my sound bar.
Sorry , but I had to return it because my son got it for me for Xmas. Anyway, it is what I expected. Great product.
So simple and wonderful! Has everything you ciuld possibly need, with the ease of fast set up. Highly reccomend to have for any tv, we take ours to the cottage, with a small tv
So simple. We plugged it in, set up the account info, and it has worked perfectly from day one. Love that I can even set the pictures in the screen saver to my favorites from my photo library.
summary: Simple To Use And Connects Every Apple Product We Own

reviewText: So small and easy to use. This was up and running in 5-10 minutes. I am going to get a second one for downstairs.

So this is really cool if you have a mac and/or iPhone. Setup was a dream and operation is simple. Just wish the streamign providers offered a better selection of newly released videos1 iTUNES is pricey

So yeah I bought this on the recommendation from a co-worker and I love it! I've been thinking about getting rid of my over priced cable and I wanted to see how this would work and it's great! Super easy to set up and super easy to use!
Streaming iPad / iPhone videos and Netflix app make me realize I don't need cable anymore.  No brainier at the price.

Streaming movies/music is smooth with absolutely no interuptions. In the past I used my Samsung B-ray player to stream movies and it was very frustrating as the movie would pause, stream and restart playing again. My Apple TV-3 is sitting next to my Blue Ray player in my entertainment center, and I have no streaming problems at all. Great product, way to go Apple!

Streaming Netflix is a breeze now! The set is so simple ANYONE can do it, there's really no set involved, you plug in the HDMI cord, the power cord and boom, you're up and running. It's a bit on the pricey side, but you won't regret this purchase. Movies stream seamlessly and having the ability to play my iTunes through my tv from my home computers library is a huge plus!

Streaming quality is better than our Samsung blueray and on par with our xbox 360. I'm mostly happy with the content but I wish they would add Amazon Prime streaming content soon. That would bump it to 4 stars, easy.
streamlines all my favorite shows and videos, great while watching netflix
Such a powerful little gadget.  And there are more and more services offered.  Indispensable especially if you have other Apple products
summary: A Must Have for Apple Users

reviewText: Super cool technology. Limited screen content I must admit but the presence of You Tube makes up for it. The big one is the Mirroring of my devices on to the big screen. AAh Bliss.

Super easy to install. Love it. Works great with Netflix and other apps. I only wish it had come with more instructions. Had problems getting it to come on but put it in SLEEP NEVER mode and no more problems.
super nice. bought it so i wouldn't need to sit at my computer all the time to watch a movie, and hate cable b/c I can never find a show to watch.

Technology is Ah...Mazing. This device is our Family go to on the weekends, or when there is nothing on T.V. A must have. Just be careful where you put the remote down at. Since it is so small & thin it can easily slide down in between cushions, or the wall.
tempted to buy a mac mini for a home entertainment setup, but used with an ipad, the apple tv does 90% of what i'd like for much less than the price of another machine.
summary: paired with an iphone/ipad, it's fantastic

reviewText: Thanks for making a great priced product for Christmas!! I gave the gift of apple TV + Netflix to my parents. We love our apple TV!
The ability to mirror with other Apple devices makes this product worth the money. No problems with set up or use.
summary: Great product from Apple to use with all other Apple devices

reviewText: the actual product was a gift for a friend. so I can't tell you how well this one works.But I love mine!

The Appel tv is Great for apple users but not android users I have a lot of apple products and this is one of my Favorites it will only work with hd tvs with hdmi plugins. This devices is worth getting. It lasts a long time to.

The apple remote showed up on time. The only downfall is when purchasing you do not know you need the HDMI cable to hook it up to the tv. I had to go buy one at the store. The device works great. Just let people know about the cable!

The Apple TV box is great. I primarily use it for Netflix and streaming pictures and projecting images from my Iphone and Macbook. Careful though, because episodes from itunes are super expensive, some of them are nearly $5.

The Apple TV device is so much sleeker than I had anticipated, yet it beats out most such devices I have tried in the past. It is unobtrusive kept beside our TV. It took probably 5 minutes or less to set up. Connected wirelessly to my iTunes account, I was vowed by this long. Of course it connects to Netflix , Youtube etc. The thing I would like to see improved is the search feature. I understand the sleek remote and limited buttons on it make it tedious to search for videos, but typing names becomes a little bit of a stretch with it. Hopefully this issue will be resolved some day, which would then make this an even more excellent product!
The apple tv does everything it boasts about. When mirroring to my phone everything shows up on the tv. Its outstanding. Movies from iTunes are awesome.
The apple TV does everything I want: letting me watch movies and TV shows from my computer, watch netflix, and has convenient apps like Watch ESPN, and Youtube
The apple TV does everything you would want it to and more.  The mirroring feature alone is worth the price.

The Apple TV doesn't look like much but it's an absolutely must have if you're the owner of an iOS device (iPhone, iPod, iPad). The Apple TV doesn't provide the most apps but enough to keep someone content. If you're heavily invested in iTunes this is also a must have. Apple provides constant updates with new features (recently HULU)which is second to none in support. The GUI is also great, actually the best out.For me, the best feature is AirPlay; it is rock solid. AirPlay allows you to wirelessly stream any photos, HD Videos (stunning video quality even wirelessly on my HD TV), mirroring of video games as well as YouTube and basically most things on your iOS device.Apple like many of it's devices make using the Apple TV SIMPLE and a joy. Again, it is absolutely worth the $99 for the AirPlay feature alone.
summary: MUST have for iPhone iPod and or iPad owners (iOS)!

reviewText: The Apple TV exceeded my expectations 15 minutes after it was out of the box.It is tiny, beautiful, easy to set up, and incredibly useful.What's to love:1. Easy set up.2. It's easy to play our Netflix account through it.3. It's easy to play movies and TV from your iTunes account.4. It's easy to show your pictures from iPhoto on the screen--although they don't appear entirely as they are organized in iPhoto. (I'd guess about 90%.) Note: 1080 isn't enough lines to do complete justice to good digital pictures, but especially the ones that don't have bright, harsh light in them look at least as sharp as HD movies and TV--true colors and you could count the hairs on a picture of a caterpillar.)I haven't tried to play iTunes music or Web-based video through it yet.If they aren't easy, I'll report back.
The Apple TV gives you so much functionally in regards to iTunes, Hulu, Netflix, Photostream and others. I would say anyone who has an iPhone should have an Apple TV.

The Apple TV has actually replaced a cable subscription for me.  I only watch a few shows, and I can grab these easily either through the iTunes store, Netflix, or Hulu.  This saves a ton of money versus a complete cable subscription, plus all of the content is available on demand, so there's no need to remember to DVR-record anything.  You can also generally avoid commercials, or at least limit them (in the case of Hulu).I also use the Apple TV to stream music through iTunes which is great day to day but also for parties.  The album artwork shows up on the screen which is a nice addition.This is a product that I use every day and would recommend highly to any of my friends.

The apple tv has been a staple in my home as we stream, mirror, and play almost all media through this device.  The product receives the appropriate updates in a timely manner and is well priced on Amazon versus other retail vendors.
summary: Nice addition to our apple family

reviewText: The Apple-TV 'hobby project' works very well as a media content streamer.  Using iTunes, all of your stored media can be played easily.  But more useful is the AirPlay integration with just about all other Apple devices -- every Mac, iPhone and iPad can stream media to the Apple TV.  Using 3rd Party apps such as AcePlayer or Air Video, you can browse all of your network's shared media and play almost all of it through the Apple TV.While other media streaming devices can also browse and stream your content, this product succeeds because 'it just works' quite well and without a lot of fuss, and also does so with an attractive and easy-to use interface.Works so well in fact that it allowed me to re-purpose a Mac Mini that was being used as a Media Center PC -- now my kids have an extra Mac to work on.Rated 4-stars due to lack of Netflix integration at this time, though many will not find that much of a limitation -- it's only a minor point in my case.
summary: Great product -- missing only Netflix integration

reviewText: The Apple TV is a great little add-on if you've already subscribed to the Apple ecosystem. I have a macbook, iPad, and iPhone so I love how i easily fling whatever I'm doing on each of those devices onto my big screen.

The Apple TV is a great product, but you won't be able to take full advantage unless you own other Apple products.Just like the Roku (or several other set-top boxes), you can use the Apple TV to access Netflix or Hulu Plus, YouTube, and many other channels, as well as to purchase or rent movies or TV shows through the online store.But the killer feature for me is that you can use AirPlay and the Apple TV to watch any video, look at any picture, or listen to any audio on your iPhone or iPad on your TV instead.
summary: Great if you own other Apple products!

reviewText: The AppleTv is a great product which we enjoy a lot in our family. Kids are able to stream from netflix and we can rent very recently movies in HD at a reasonable price.

The apple tv is a great streaming box and easy to use. I lost the remote, it is probably somewhere in my couch since it is so tiny but thankfully the app for the iphone works well. If you have an iphone or ipad then this fits great into the ecosystem. They are adding new apps to it everyday and rumors are they will add an app store which would make this device almost flawless.

The Apple TV is an easy way to get videos, music, photos, and podcasts on to your TV. I edit home movies on my Mac and put them in iTunes where they stream to the Apple TV. When I start a show mid-season, I catch up on old episodes by getting them from the iTunes store.

The Apple TV is an excellent value.  Even if your Wii, Xbox, or TV with apps can access Netflix and Hulu this makes everything easier.  My only gripe is after updates you sometimes have to restart your router.  On one occasion I had to restore the settings to factory within iTunes.  I own two of them, and I'm thinking of purchasing another.It's an excellent complement to a Apple device house OR as a media hub for the Cable/Satellite free house.

The apple tv is a phenemonal product, especially if you already have Apple products. I already have Netflix and Hulu accounts and my purchases on my ipad and ipod are paired with my Apple TV so I can watch the tv shows and the movies that I previously puchased on my Apple TV. It's a great product especially considering the price.

The Apple TV is a very impressive solution that couples well with other Apple products.  If you can use AirPlay on any device (Apple or not), it should pair nicely with this.  It provides a very "clean" interface, and it's easy to rip videos (using Handbrake or similar) that will work on your iPhone / iPad which will also work on your AppleTVs.As for the negative aspects of the product, it's similar to any other Apple product.  The biggest disadvantages to the product is a tradeoff for the impressive UI and hardware design--you won't be able to plug in a USB jump drive with an XviD encoded AVI on it and expect it to play.If you use an Apple TV on a home network (or a series of AppleTVs), I'd plan on dedicating a computer to a stable iTunes server that holds your music and movies/TV Shows that you want networked so that you can take full advantage of the convenient interface.
summary: Great device, especially if you've standardized on iTunes / Apple AirPlay products (iPhone, iPad, etc.)

reviewText: The Apple TV is a very nice small low power product which allows me to connect from my MacBook Pro to my tv screen and audio from anywhere in the house, over the wi-fi. I can show hi definition video or just my computer screen, in 1080p. It also will play audio files from my iTunes account, although the iTunes program must be open on whatever computer you want to play from. The TV/Movie connections are almost all subscription, which I'm not going to use. TV shows from the iTunes store are priced at $3.99, which is too high unless there are special circumstances.
summary: I like this product very much.

reviewText: The Apple TV is a wonderful product.  Can watch Hulu Netflix etc. I have apple cloud so can stream all of my music, movies, tv shows, pod casts, etc onto my TV.  Way cheaper than satellite TV and you wont need it with the Apple TV device, Unless you have to have a ton of TV shows all the time.  This is compact and takes up hardly any room and is a typically high quality Apple product.
The Apple TV is best for watching movies. Easy installation Easy easy handling allrecommend is high quality and is designed so that you can use even a child
summary: The Apple TV is best for watching movies. Easy installation Easy easy handling all

reviewText: The Apple TV is definately worth the price!  At $100 you can't beat it!  I love using the Apple TV to watch Netflix, Hulu Plus, and many other apps you use through it!

The Apple TV is easy to set up like most Apple products. Streaming Netflix is great, but the big plus is that this syncs up with my iTunes account so I can play any of my purchased Movies, TV shows, plus all of my music library from the cloud. Watching my photo stream is also a cool feature. I haven't tried using it as a big screen for games from my iPhone or iPad, but I'm looking forward to that. For under $100, its a great product!
summary: Apple TV is as good as promised!

reviewText: The Apple TV is everything it was adv.ertised to be. Easy setup, and connection. Works great with Amazon video. Recommend it to everyone.
The Apple TV is great for watching movies, listening to music, Netflix, a TV-Sized photo player...I love this device!Thanks Apple!
The Apple TV is great. I have one in three rooms of my house. I even keep one in my laptop bag for when I go on trips. Is it worth buying yes, very much so.

The Apple TV is great! It is so neat to show anything on your iPhone, iPad, or I touch on your tv. I have a 60 inch tv so it is cool to view pics and videos on my phone on it. This is the best price to buy it too!

The Apple TV is great- we have bought 2 off of Amazon.  Amazon is the most affordable way to but the Apple TV- free shipping and no sales tax (in our state) plus it was marked down $6 from the original price. Apple TV is great for Netflix and other services like HBO Go.  The Apple TV is very small and easy to fit and hide near your tv.

The Apple TV is probably Apple's best accessory.Aside from being a standalone streaming device, the Apple TV supports AirPlay, which blows the doors off any any other competition. AirPlay allows for any iOS device running iOS 4 or later to play any video or audio over Wi-Fi. AirPlay mirroring is supported on the iPad 2 and later the iPhone 4S and later, or Mac 2011 and later, which allows for whatever is on your device screen to be mirrored to your HD screen without a VGA cable. This is great for Demos, gaming, and Presentations.Another underrated future, is iTunes Home Sharing, which is supported across every iOS device and Mac computer already. That allows for everything in your iTunes library to be streamed to the TV, including encoded DVDs or Blu-rays. I legally encode the physical media that I own and store it on a hard drive. It's all easily accessible through iTunes and the Apple TV.
summary: An Essential for Every Home with an HDTV and a companion Apple Product

reviewText: The Apple TV is simple to hook up and to use.  It make the Bluetooth from ipad to tv simple

The apple TV is the most amazing product I've ever purchased. Its easy to hook up and it links right to your computer. You have easy access to netflix and hulu, and you can listen to your itunes off the TV which is great for parties. You can also upload your photo stream from iphoto if you have a mac. It has so many other features as well.
The apple tv is very simple to hook up and use.  It is also very nice that you can use your iphone or ipad as the remote control.

The Apple TV made life easier for me.  I have twin great nieces living with me while they attend college and purchased Apple TV to minimize arguments related to viewing choices. We created separate accounts and respect the varied viewing selections  (not me-I pay the bills!). It was easy to assemble, which they did without a problem. The price was great and the order arrived earlier than expected!

The AppleTV may get smaller, but it is a pretty big contender.I was originally looking for about any other streaming box that had HDMI and optical, but when the Roku lost it's optical port, I started to look back at the AppleTV. I would do little more with the AppleTV than carry it around the nearest BestBuy, and put it down before leaving. Take three, however, brought 1080p, more RAM, a better processor, and a new interface. The streaming services seem to be getting an upgrade, as is the content.Truth be told, my real reason for getting this little guy is because dlna music capabilities suck on my blu-ray player. I listen to music constantly, and using Remote to control iTunes in my office while AirPlay makes all the sound come from my home theater in my living room is OH so easy! AirParrot lets me put my computer on the TV for some killer web browsing, and those hard to stream movies work pretty well over the Parrot, as well.This is a niche device for me, but I do have some pros and cons.Pro:Setting up is incredibly easy.AirPlay from damn near anything1080pCachingOptical outputIntuitive menusAttractive designGreat remote -- satisfying clickCons:Updates interrupt playbackOccasional erratic behaviorNo Slacker RadioI haven't connected my friend's Netflix account to this little guy, because my BDP-s590 does such an amazing job, but it may be an incredibly capable Netflix player.Be sure to enable AC3 in the settings if your system supports it.

The Apple TV module is everything it says it is.  But it only works if you have blazing fast Internet service.  Six Mbps DSL won't cut it.  You have to have at least twice that much or there are unacceptable buffering issues.  I'd also recommend the latest Apple AirPort wireless router.  BUT, after you have all the pieces together, you can do all sorts of cool things.  I'm not here to tell you about all the features.  Just to tell you what you need to access them.  I'd recommend this over digital cable any day.  Thanks again, Apple.
summary: Great technology, if you have the right system

reviewText: The AppleTV offers a beautiful, easy-to-operate streaming experience that's likely to be far better then your Smart TV's built-in options. The unit is as reliable, fast and trouble-free as you might expect from Apple. The AirPlay streaming feature with other apple devices is especially fun and useful.My only complaints are related to the lack flexibility; it is not possible to add streaming services that Apple has not yet partnered with and not possible to remove the streaming apps that you may not use. Pandora Internet radio is notably absent.

The Apple TV unit itself works well.  The picture quality is great.  Apple keeps adding more channels and making the Apple TV more useful.That said, the Apple remote that comes with it is the worst remote in the history of remotes.  First the remote has only 3 buttons and the utterly useless scroll wheel. Seriously, who makes a remote without a power button? Apple that's who. It takes an eternity to log into your accounts and navigate trough the menus. Second, the remote is super tiny and therefor easily lost, hard to hold onto, and hard to use.  Third all the weight for the remote is in the back and the buttons are in the front making it even more awkward to hold onto and use.I like a lot about the Apple TV, but I rarely use it; mainly because the remote is so horrible.  Every time in try to watch something it takes forever to use the rubbish remote to get to what I want, pause, play, or navigate.  I end up saying "Worst remote ever," at least twice while trying to navigate the convoluted menus and get the show started and at least twice more while trying to put the unit in sleep mode.
The Apple TV was extremely easy to set up (I did it myself).  You do need an HDMI cord to complete the setup.  Excellent deal and great device!

The Apple TV was recommended to me by my brother in law.  I was very cautious at first but I can not live without this device now.  It makes viewing Netflix, my iPhone videos and pictures a convenient breeze.  I would recommend to anyone but especially to those who own an Apple device(s).
The Apple TV works great! I love that I can hook my ipad up to it and stream videos along with my music!!

The Apple TV works great with all our Apple devices as well as watching videos on YouTube, Netflix, or other streaming services. We don't have a DVD/Blu-ray player hooked up to our TV, so this is awesome for watching videos.
The Apple TV works seamlessly with my blu-ray and television. It is great to have all of your iTunes movies at your fingertips
The apply tv arrived right on time. Packaging was good. We hooked this up in the bedroom upstairs and it synchs perfectly with our wifi downstairs.
summary: Apple TV  is exactly what I was looking for

reviewText: The basic setup for the Apple TV was very easy and many of the features work immediately. However, the instructions for accessing the computer or iPad screens is less than adequate, both in the manual supplied and on the web. The web instructions tell you to click on a symbol that does not appear anywhere, and they don't bother to tell you where it is. This lack of information is very frustrating, and the effort to be "elegant" in having a tiny instruction book really is not helpful. However, the things that work without much instruction work really well.

The best feature that I like about it is being able to view movies from Netflix.  Logging offf was a little complicated at first but I am getting use to it.  I thought that this Apple TV had Pandora on it and am disappointed.  I have enjoyed it so far.

The best Netflix Player that I see! I have a Roku too, but this is faster and the quality is very impressive! The bad point is that you have the access only to Apple iTunes, and on Roku you have more options of apps.
summary: The Best Netflix Player, but limited Apps (only Apple)

reviewText: The best out there. I also purchased chromecast and i dont use it. Apple is simply the best out there

The best part and reason for buying it is AirPlay, otherwise save your money and get a Roku!Two drawbacks:1.) limited subscriptions when compared to Roku and Apple is very slow to add new ones.2.) While AirPlay allows Macs running Mt. Lion and other iOS 6 devices to connect wirelessly and show content, there is a serious lagging problem through the Apple TV. Video that streams cleanly on laptop or other device is often just a little behind the computer or LOTS behind the computer with complete stalls.  No good fix in any forum so far.
summary: Just works and connects everything Apple

reviewText: The best price on the Web and I loved how user friendly Apple made this device. Got it promptly and am using it constantly.
The best small device...Most important thing is airplay...works perfectly and very useful if we have all the apple devices. waiting for split screen features coming this fall...

The best thing about Apple products is they come with zero fuss...and the same goes with Apple TV. You take it out of the package, plug it in and you are on! Works perfectly with iphone, ipad, Macbook (with Airplay). Remote is also as simple as it can ever be.As always Amazon did a perfect job in delivering it on time with perfect packaging!

The box is so small I had hard time figuring where to locate so that my universal remote control signal would get to it.  If you have apple products in your house; I have three computers and three cell phones this is the way to easily display or listen to their content.
The charger shipped pretty fast and it is working so far. I use it to charge my phone everynight and there's no problem with it. I am buying another one now.
The coolest gadget I have ever purchased easy setup easy use small active remote its awesome to use for anyone. Comes complete with a detail manual it's easy to setup like I said and simple to use
The couple was beyond thrilled and love their new Apple TV!!!  They say it works great and could not have received a better gift!
The device is slick and the interface is cool. The only drawback for me is navigating using the remote, and limited apps.
summary: It's cool but not 5 star cool

reviewText: The device was easy to install and more-or-less intuitive to use.  At first we had problems with streaming -- but that turned out to be a problem with our cable company and not the device.

The display is fairly easy to use. But the directions for using the device are skimpy.  I believe this is the "Apple way" where users are expected to somehow "discover" the various functions and devices, instead of providing instructions.
