As with my iPad, there are many, many functions that exist, but one usually only finds them when a friend points them out.  This appears to apply to the Apple TV.In addition, if I want to stop a video and try to start it up again, I get an error message every time.  It requires me to "try again later," which may require me to wait a full 24 hours to get back to the video.  I also find the remote to be, as usual, unclear.  The information on the buttons is not at useful or intuitive and they make no sense at all.  The buttons also don't work consistently and I often have to push one or more buttons many times before something happens on the screen.
The Fact that you can download the remote app on your iPhone and use it on the Apple TV is awesome! You can also view your iPhone on the TV. How cool is that ! Too many features ;)

The first thing that really attracted me was the design, because is small and a nice color, had a doubt about if it was very useful or not, but when I found out all you can do with this small box I didn't think to much to buy it, I do recommend this product also because is very easy to set up and use in couple of minutes, something bad is that doesn't include the HDMI cable, after you get the cable all you need is a good wireless connection and you're done!Also let me mention that delivery was in only 3 days, it was well protected, so Apple TV is highly recommended
summary: Nice design and easy to use

reviewText: The fit and finish on this device is much higher in quality and feel than the Roku.  It has a nice solid, heavy feel to it and all the seams are very tight and smooth.  I used to own the Roku 2 and it was an inferior product both aesthetically and functionally. The obvious advantage that the Roku had over the Apple TV was the channel selection but that was about it. Setup on both devices is easy.  Plug them in, they find your wireless network and after the password is entered, you're good to go.  You have the option for a wired connection but for some reason the wireless works better on my network.  The GUI on the Apple is smoother and looks better than the one on the Roku.  The Roku is clunky and it takes forever to scroll through the channels, whereas the Apple has the channels on a grid pattern.  Picture quality is also superior on the Apple TV and the wireless streaming has been glitch free.  I had trouble setting up the homesharing but once it was up and running that also has been free of problems.  The only reason I removed a star on the rating was because of the performance of Airplay.  The sound quality is poor and it fluctuates during playback, becoming louder and softer continuously.  This could be a problem with my network but other people have also complained of this.  The bottom line is that this out performs the Roku with the disadvantage of a small channel lineup  which didn't matter to me because the main reason for this was the home sharing and the use of Netflix.

The hardware of the Apple TV is great and easy to set up, the picture is outstanding. However it is very expensive to rent movies & TV shows and the TV shows are not current. Needed to buy antenna for local TV.
The idea of apple tv is cool but still in its infancy stages.  There just isn't much that sets it apart from on demand on cable.

The iMatch (iTune) and airplay are two main features that I use for AppleTV.Able to push all my music to iMatch and listen from AppleTV is very convenient.I bought two more and sent them to Taiwan for my family to listen to my music,but iMatch/AppleTV does not allow it to cross the Pacific Ocean. This is not good!
the integration with my itunes library and my other apple devices make the device amazing, the only thing to be perfect is the lack of jailbreak and install xbmc,plex or something like that.
summary: excelent device sorry for lack of jailbreak :(

reviewText: The interface could use some better options here -- I would love to have a tile interface for browsing on-network media, like the Boxee's. But a very simplistic interface isn't really a problem here, I'm just comfortable working with something a little more complicated.I liked my boxee a lot -- like I said, I much preferred the interface on that --- but the boxee is a labor of love. It often just stopped working -- either would inexplicably fail to play some media files, or wouldn't be able to load a remote network directory...But this is an Apple product. You plug it in, and it just works. No hassle, no frustration, no cursing. Oh, and it's cheaper, too.
summary: Replaced a boxee, never turning back.

reviewText: Their teacher wanted one to display some things from her iPad onto the TV.  It's worked great for that purpose.

The lack of Amazon prime, an obvious attempt to keep out competition limits the usefulness of this in comparison to the roku for a general coardcutting piece. The mirroring feature still means you have to have the mirrored device blocked up, so mirroring HBOgo means you can't use the iPad at the same time. The only thing I use this one for anymore is dropping music from my computer or iphone/ipad to the tv.

The latest Firmware upgrade prevents Hulu from working if you are connected via Ethernet.Apple is working on a fix in the next Firmware upgrade.If you can't get Hulu to work, disconnect your Ethernet cable and run it on wifi.
summary: Hulu stopped working on Ethernet with Latest Firmware Upgrade

reviewText: The only issues I ever have are due to my network (I'm a computer nerd so my house has a complicated network).  Usually, I can easily find the answers on the support forums.  The device itself works amazingly well and interfaces well with the multiple iTunes libraries on my network.
summary: Works well and easy to use

reviewText: The only only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because I had to go back to the store and buy hdmi cables in order for it to connect to my tv. I thought a device like that would have come with its own cable. My lost. However after going out and buying a hdmi cables my Apple TV works beautiful. Love it

The only real question is if it actually does all the things it claims to do. It does!  Easy to set up. Nice on screen interface. Mirrored my iPhone and my iPad beautifully to my TV. Found my PC computer on my network and I played my iTunes library through my TVs attached sound system. Great little toy. Pod casts and movies are my next venture.
The only reason it does not get a full score, is the lack of streaming from external servers / NAS devices.
summary: Great for what it is made for

reviewText: the only thing i am not happy about with apple TV is that amazon instant video doesnt stream on it.  oh well, we still have hulu plus and netflix  so if something is exclusively on amazon, we watch it on the ipad.  totally worth the price paid, quick shipping, and really glad to not have cable!!

The only two complaints after using this device for three years: the controller is too small and sometimes iTunes store connection is problematic. These are very small issues. Overall I have bought three family members this device. If you use Mac products, this fits perfectly into your life.
The packaging was totally apple-style, very elegant. Functioning well, intend to get an airparrot to mirror my PC. Overall satisfied.

The physical hardware is great, but the software leaves some things lacking.  I wish there was an included browser.  That would make it handy for things that don't have an app yet for the Apple TV (Pandora, Spotify, etc.).  I have locked mine up multiple times when I have left something paused for long periods of time (like overnight).

reviewText: The picture quality is awesome!!  Nearly as good as my blu ray.  Product just runs very well.  This was a good buy from Amazon.  It functions even better in an Apple ecosystem using the Mac, iPod, or iPhone.  Make sure to load all of the TV website apps that you can like ABC, NBC, etc.  They will most likely play smoother when using airplay.  That will allow you to stream free TV shows.  Bye Bye cable bill!!  We now only pay $7.99/mo for Netflix.  The rest is free streaming and local channels using an HD antenna.  Save $$!!
The price is right!  I have had them for a couple of months now and they still work fine.  Colors make it easier for kids to tell which charger is theirs.
The product arrived within a couple of days and only took minutes to set up. It's great to have a few more choices than the standard cable packages.
The product exceeded my expectations apple tvI have no product to give it 5 starsthe product has a good presentation

The product is excellent.  Mirroring works perfect from iphone & ipad.  Even though I have an older mac (thus can't mirror from the computer), I can still link the computer to the apple tv to view movies or listen to music that is on the computer.  The netflix interface is very nice. The problem I had with the product is that when I first installed it, it crashed during the update. To resolve the crash you need to connect the apple tv to your computer.  The cable to connect it to the computer, however, is not supplied.  None of the apple cables I have would work. Luckily my brother had a cable which he uses to connect his android phone to his computer that worked.
summary: excellent product but needs a cable

reviewText: The product is very easy to set up and to use. As always Apple products as as intuitive as life.
The product speaks for itself.  I use it for airplaying iPad videos, browse trailers, view icloud photos, works well for what it is.  Would be better if it supports streaming video from LAN/NAS

the product works extremely well, I can play movies and music directly from my ipod, ipad, iphone and mac computers, and connect the audio through fiber optic to my home theater system. However, comparing with Google's equivalent ChromeCast, which costs only $35, Apple TV is way too expensive, as ChromeCast works nearly exactly the same except it does not has an fiber optic audio output, and it does not have an extra remote control (which is not exactly necessary as your mobile device takes the job).Setting up Apple TV is a little tedious, not as easy as ChromeCast.$50 is a much more reasonable price for Apple TV.
summary: prefect product but price can be tter

reviewText: The quality if this ATV3 is as great as my ATV2, and the higher resolution is amazing, but if you are someone who wants to be able to jailbreak it, it's not there yet.
The quality of picture is so much better on an AppleTV compared to the connection thru my blue ray player.

There a probably thousands of reviews about AppleTV out there, so I am not sure if I can provide much more information.  I had the first model, as well.  I like this one so much better due to the inclusion of NetFlix and other streaming services.  The much smaller size is nice, too.  I actually keep ours behind (under) our television so you barely even see it, other than the small LED light.  Apple products are just so user friendly.

There are alternatives I have tried including Chromecast and Roku. both offer similar services for more than half the cost of the apple TV.We purchased the Apple TV to sync with my wifes Apple products and that works ok, but I cannot justify the cost for the limited uses.
summary: way too expensive, for what you get.

reviewText: There are other cheaper options, but this is the only thing that lets you have easy iphone/ipad tv output. It has some built in video apps, and if you have an iphone for the tv output, there's alot of possibilities.

There are other options out there for streaming media to your TV, but I found the Apple TV easy to set up, a breeze to control (especially with an iPhone), and able to stream even the largest of my movie files without skipping or stuttering at all. It offers a ton of subscription services right in the box, and anything it doesn't offer, I can stream from my other devices using AirPlay. Though not a perfect product, the pro's outweigh the cons in my opinion. (note: We own mostly Apple devices in our home, so our experience may be different than someone with out any. Haven't used it to stream from one of our PC notebooks yet)Pros:Easy set upiPhone as a Remote (great for entering in name/passwords for your subscription services)Tiny footprintFast streaming of networked media hosted on external HDGreat quality from subscription services (NHL is AWESOME!)Nice Screen Savers based on photos from your iphoto or photstream, or from Flickr searchesCons:iTunes does not support .avi movies without a work-aroundslight delay when changing song/movie using airplayNo Spotify/Pandora built-in - must stream this from another deviceNetflix layout is not as intuitive/pretty as other devices like the PS3 or some Blu-Ray playersWould be nice if it had a USB input for an External HD
summary: Does what I needed it to do, and then some!

reviewText: there are so many things you can do with this device added to your TV. Best of all with Airplay your TV can become a mirrored computer screen and with the new Maverick coming out we will be able to add a 2nd computer screen to out TVS with airplay and drag and drop applications to clear the main computer screen ( mainly a app developer or game developer feature ).
There are still apps I wish apple TV would add, but this little thing integrates well with our non-apple products.  I recommend to all considering.

There are tons of reviews out there about the specs and features of the Apple TV. So, I'll just say what I use it for. I primarily use it to watch Netflix or stream videos from my desktop via my IPad to the Apple TV. There are couple of ways I do it. I use Air Video or Air Playit to stream to my IPad, and Airplay to my Apple TV. I have a shared folder on my computer that these streaming apps can connect to. I haven't noticed any lag or delay in playing movies, even large files. MP4 files can play directly from Itunes to the Apple TV. No need for IPad to be in the middle in that scenario. Sometimes I also use Splashtop Remote desktop to connect to my computer and browse on the bigger screen. Splashtop only works with the Mirroring option. For those of you who are new to this, AirPlay and Mirroring are 2 different things and if you do a google search on it, will tell you how to do it.Netflix quality  is much better than what I used to get on my Wii netflix app. I haven't tried to play any games using mirroring, so can't speak to that.So far, I am really happy with my purchase. If you own a IPad or IPhone, this is a neat little toy for less than $99 right now on Amazon.

There are very many neat things about this product. I love that I can view content from my iTunes account in an easy manner and mirror any of my iOS devices to my TV.  It runs smoothly on WiFi and viewing Netflix is a cinch.  The reason for four stars is because I wish it had more app choices and I wish I could access Amazon Prime Video content.  I would buy again, but if you have no iOS devices other streamers may be more suitable for you.
summary: Good product, but could be better

reviewText: the reason i am giving only 3 stars out of 5 is not for the quality or any technical problem i have with the device.the reason this device is getting 3 stars from me is because of Apple...Apple decided to put a certain apps on the Apple TV and even though the platform is ready to have more and different apps, they had decided to keep it closed! so.. you can NOT stream content from Amazon (or anyone else that is not iTunes, Netflix or Hulu)ALL the sport channels and radio channels on it are locked and are very expensive to open.Apple should consider opening the device and give him a pot-light in the App Store.
There is always room for improvement with application offerings, but the hardware works flawlessly and it gets better with every OS upgrade.

There is not a single thing to not like about this. It has Netflix and Hulu. iTunes sharing couldn't be easier. I'm addicted to mine. If you are thinking about cutting your cable and getting this, don't hesitate one second.
There is nothing much to say about this product, its simply great, more than what I expected. I recomend it with no doubt

There's only one thing that I heard of to decide whether to get this or the Roku. If you want Amazon streaming, get the Roku. If you want iTunes, get this.A recent software update made Netflix look awful on the Apple TV, but they seem to have fixed that. I have a Chromecast as backup and comparing the two you could see the difference. Fortunately, it works much better now and it's so much easier to have a remote control than using my iPhone with the Chromecast.

reviewText: There was a lot of different name brand to choose. The apple was the easiest to set up. I have been using it since I received it. I recommend 200%.

These are a nice cheap solution to whole house audio! Every room we have a TV in we have an Apple TV. Its great to have our entire tv show and movie library in every room. When I clean the house listening to music, going from room to room I just hit a new airplay location! If I airplay from my Mac book pro I can airplay to more than one apple tv so then it really is whole house audio!!

These things rock! I can push any of my content from my iPhone / iPad to the screen to share with the family or watch a movie, stream music from my iTunes collections, it washes the dishes, folds my clothes, pays my mortgage, and takes care of the kids all at the same time!

reviewText: The setup is extremely easy.  The family has gotten more use out of the Apple TV in the first month, than the Roku we had over a year.

The setup was easy and the Apple TV works well with Netflix. However, I already had no less than ten devices (four computers, one tablet, two smart phones, one game console, and two DVD players which worked well with Netflix. I primarily bought this for "home sharing" and to see what else it was capable of. Well, it has few other capabilities that are of more than passing curiosities to me, and the home sharing works horribly. I just spent about a half-hour getting the Apple TV to play a movie through home sharing. Five minutes into the movie, it stopped and displayed the message "To access your iTunes library on Apple TV, turn on Home Sharing in iTunes on your computer." Obviously, "home sharing" is already turned on. Another ten minutes of tinkering and (hopefully) I'll be able to watch my movie. This problem didn't seem to occur when I first bought the Apple TV two months ago, but it seems to occur every time now. Extremely frustrating. If you want to access a streaming service like Netflix, the best solution is to connect a computer directly to your TV. You should also be able to access multimedia files directly from your home network, without the added hassle of iTunes. The simplest solution fr streaming is a DVD player, which would be far more functional than Apple TV at only two-thirds the price.
summary: I don't see a purpose for this product

reviewText: These work great for standard entertainment media streaming, but the big benefit is that they have the built-in Apple "AirPlay" which lets one screencast their iPhone or iPad to the device. We use these in classrooms for presentations and math teachers love them as they can write equations on the iPad screen and students can view through the projector.

The title "Wii No More" is because no longer do I use the Wii for playing YouTube or Netflix videos through my TV. In fact, since getting the Apple TV I haven't even turned on the Wii. The Apple TV is much faster at downloading content for play and rarely pauses during playback. For that alone, I would have given the Apple TV 3 stars. Because there's so much more to love about the Apple TV, I've given it 5 stars.Things I love:1. Airplay Mirroring - if I want people to see something I'm doing on my MacBook, I turn on Airplay Mirroring and just like that, it's on the TV. No more trying to squeeze in to see the MacBook screen or dragging a cable across the room to connect the MacBook to the TV.2. Playing content from a computer - as long as Home Sharing is setup I can pull music and video directly from a computer and play it on my TV. The perfect exercise music is always easily accessible.3. Customizing the Home Screen - with the latest Apple TV update, I can remove the home screen icons that I don't use. With parental controls I was able to remove some of them before, but now I have complete control, minus a few "required" icons.4. The Remote App - conducting a search on the Apple TV can be somewhat of a hassle if you are using the Apple Remote that it comes with. Once I started using the Remote App on my iPhone, a keyboard pops up on my phone that I can type the search query in. Down, down, right, right arrow pushing is not required to get to the next letter.5. Size matters - the Apple TV is so small, making it easy to place anywhere. I set it on top of my DVR along with aKinivo 501BN Premium 5 port High speed HDMI switch with IR wireless remote and AC Power adapter - supports 3D, 1080p, which is on aOmniMount Tria 1 B - 1 Shelf Wall Furniture (Black/Dark Glass)mounted behind/above my TV.6. iTunes integration - renting or purchasing new movies/TV shows from iTunes is so fast and easy. If I have subscribed to a TV show, the show automatically downloads to the Apple TV. And I can also choose to download purchases to my MacBook if I want.
The updated version of the original...more menu options, etc.  The actual device is a LOT smaller too which is nice.

The user experience of the Apple TV - meaning the on screen UI and responsiveness is top notch. It is very friendly to use, easy to set up and even a bit exciting to play with. I find myself annoyed at the lack of depth, however. I don't understand why there is no app system on this apple product - it leaves me feeling as if it is a neglected toy as compared to the rest of the Apple product line.I really wish I could watch vudu on this device, as I find it has the best selection of new (in theatre) movies.The Netflix experience is fantastic, definitely the best netflix experience of all of my devices. I love the AirPlay from my iPad and my Macbook, but I've yet to find a practical use for it in my house - it has come in handy on the ones we have at our office though.The very stylish but annoyingly tiny remote control is a frequent pain point. The fact that it is so small means it's always under our butt, between the couch cushions or otherwise hiding. I really just wish it had a normal size remote control as we've evolved our livingroom habits to efficiently manage those without losing them or sitting on them (much).Overall I'd say this product is well designed and fun to use but a bit too closed (platform limitations) and lacks a lot of the functionality I've come to expect from apple products.
summary: Impressed with user experience, bored by lack of content

reviewText: The video quality is very acceptable way better than the built-in wireless device on my TV.So far no complaints of any kind.
the video streaming is great but the sites to download from are limited.  If you want many different ways to stream content, look elsewhere.
They collect me the shipment and tax, and it supossed they didn.'t I just hope this product can be hackeed soon so I can see more TV series and movies

this add-on to your existing tail gate handle is exactly what you need for extra security for your cargo at a great price.  I bought this specifically for our cross country move where I had cargo in the bed that covered by a tonneau.  It worked perfectly.

reviewText: This apple TV changed how I see apple. ALong with my macbook pro the apple TV changed how i run my home, manage my entertainment and school. I cant wait for the iTV...true story.

This AppleTV is a great step up from the original one (which I used to have until now). I've used this for about three months now, and it's just excellent. It hooks up to the TV via HDMI, and if you can get a mounting kit for it (about 15 bucks here on Amazon) it's not even visible as you can hide it behind the TV and the remote still works.1080p HD makes the image look great, and it hooks up to your wireless device to stream from either your computer or any online streaming service available (I use it primarily for Netflix regarding online streaming).Another use it has is streaming images and videos from your iPhone or iPad. You can set up slide shows using your images, show videos, or listen to audio from it. Everything is wireless- no cables required. You can also stream your Mac to the TV using airplay, also no cables!Even though the control is kind of clunky, it's small and gets the job done. If you have an iPhone or iPad, you can also control it using an app on these devices, which is actually extremely useful.I can't recommend this enough. Every house should have one on their main TV! And if you're a Mac user, it should be mandatory that you have one!

This apple tv is smaller than I expected and seemed well made. I bought this apple tv primarily for its ability to mirror iPad onto my TV. Took me awhile to find out where the AirPlay is on my iPad. It is not on the desktop but around the play button while playing video. Initially I had sound but no video. It was due to my os4 on my original iPad. Once I updated my iPad to os7, problem solved. I also found out that it works with os5 on my iTouch. Wonderful device and it works very nicely with high def.
This apple tv is the best for streaming or purchasing items on ITunes. Netflix works very well also. small, affordible and exellent quality just like everything else from apple

This Apple TV is useful since had the airplay inlcuded.  You can use to view all your apps on your Iphone or Ipad.  The channels on the device could be improve by streaming content quicker.  That a WIP.

This Apple TV module packs a lot of power into a very small package.  I have used a smart Blue Ray player for years and this Apple TV module is faster when downloading from the internet and the navigation is very easy to use.  Another excellent product from Apple!!

This apple TV supplements my apple ecosystem. Great user interface.  Able to stream movies from Netflix and use Apple Airplay to watch stuff (pictures, videos) on all our iPods, iPads and iPhones.  Plus it also supplements our free over the air (OTA) tv since we dumped basic cable TV.
This Apple TV was so easy to assemble that a child can do it. Provides many ways to watch TV, listen to music and much more.
summary: No more paying cable for regular TV

reviewText: This Apple TV works so much better that the DVD player that was set up to access netflix and other products. We use it a lot.

This device allowed me to tell my cable provider to gargle my sack.  My household has been free from an ever increasing cable bill for several months now, and we couldn't be happier. reviewText: This device offers much more for the money than any similar device. I love it and would recommend to anyone.

[this device replaces an Apple TV version 2 and the review is based on that]we use this primarily to watch netflix and for the ken burns slideshow (as we have a wired house, and our best travel pictures setup for apple photoshare); the quality of the pictures (taken mostly with real cameras, ie. rebel, nikon P series, not iphones) is noticeably better; so much so that I have found myself watching it for quite a long time, since on a big flat screen, there's quite alot of depth to see, asnd I am truly seeing things in the photos that I have never seen before.as for the netflix support, it seems a bit better than it used to be, especially in the stopping/starting functionality. SWMBO watches her Bones on it, and the HD episodes seem very sharp and without pixellation or such problems as that (we also have a ROKU, just to be safe, so I do have something to compare this to; I've always thought the ROKU streams better than the Apple, but not so sure with this new ATV3; of course, as for the interface, there's no comparison, but i don't have time to go into that).

reviewText: This is a great add on for anyone with an iOS device and an HDTV.The ability to stream photos, music and video wirelessly from you iOS device is great for entertaining friends and show.You can also sync it with your Apple iCloud Photo Stream and it will display your iPhone or iPad's photos as your HDTV wallpaper...pretty cool!

This is a great product that does everything that it is suppose to do . makes a great gift also... highly recommend.

This is a great product that's for sure, however if you get one that needs a software upgrade, don't update it, especially if you use Netflix, it worked great for me until I finally updated the software. Now Netflix app is super slow, however again, this product in itself is still a great buy.
This is a great product! We use it all the time to watch movies with the family, and with its 1080p it has amazing video quality.
this is a great product works great

This is a great, simple product overall.  Apple just needs to commit further to it.  They did add Hulu Plus recently, and that is a BIG plus indeed.  However, they keep adding new iPads, etc but they refuse to bring the App Store or any real app ecosystem to the Apple TV.While it is a far more polished experience than Roku (which I also have), they need more apps.  Obviously they can handle an app ecosystem based on their success with iOS apps and the Mac App Store on OS X but they choose not to with Apple TV.If you use iTunes a lot (I would say I'm more on the music side, and have iTunes Match) and like to use AirPlay from your devices, this is still a killer product.  But I'd love to see more apps.Also, this is a far better option than using other devices like your gaming system.  I used to use my Xbox all the time for this type of media but Apple TV is far less power hungry and I feel that any long use of Xbox is just that much time spent moving closer to hardware failure so I save that time for gaming on it.
summary: Very good, would be 5-stars if Apple would really embrace it more

reviewText: This is a great way to be able to rent videos and watch them on your TV instead of the small screen on the computer. Easy to set up and a great addition to your iTunes collection.  You must have iTunes if you purchase the Apple TV, but I had it already and, with my iPod I have completed my Apple tree.  Enjoy.
This is a great way to watch from our iPad. We can mirror to watch what's on our iPad or or use our Amazon Prime to watch movies.

This is a must-have device especially if you have kids.  I love being able to pull up good programming without having to pay for cable TV.  I have an older LCD TV that has DVI input instead of HDMI.  Just use a HDMI to DVI cable and you're set (although with DVI the audio will need to be routed separately from the AppleTV's TOSlink to your TV, receiver, or DAC.Only problem is that darn PBS activation.  We activate, then it forgets.  Then it won't see that it's been activated.We enjoy it a lot nonetheless.
summary: Great, but trouble with PBS activation

reviewText: This is a must have for football season. We haven't even scratched the surface of what AppleTV is capable of. If you are having doubts, just buy it. You won't regret it.
This is an amazing and easy to use device!  Our primary use will be for viewing our pictures and videos with our family!  Great and easy way to relive those family memories!
summary: if you have a MAC you should buy this also!

reviewText: This is an amazing product that gives you access to HBO GO, Netflix, Hulu and several other options.  The reason I like this over Roku, which I used to have, is that I can play my music from my iPhone.

This is an awesome and easy to use product. We have Netflix and hardly ever watch regular cable any more. I especially love the 'just for kids' section on Netflix. We now have a huge library of kids movies to choose from. There is tons of other features but that's all we have really used and it has been a great source of entertainment. I ended up buying an extra set of the cables so we can easily move it from the living room to the bed room.
summary: Awesome! Easy to use and set up.

reviewText: This is an awesome product. Apple tv syncs with all my apple products (iphone/ipad) You can sit there and watch everything and anything and also mirror your iproducts from your phone straight to the tv... coolest thing ever. If your an Apple fan, this is something that is definitely worth the money. HIT THAT UP!!!
this is an excellent compliment to our television purchase.  it allows you to air play directly from your apple devices to the tv.  highly recommended.
This is another lovely product by the people at apple, The device is sleek and the size is just right, it does not take up much space and it support several device connectivity.Excellent product
this is apple product, what to say, just excellant , just fine, price is higher then other device, but excellant.

This is a really great product! Integrates all your apple stuff with your TV easily.Despite of that, you can access:- Netflix- Vevo- Flickr- Youtube- Rent movies in iTunes- Access your iTunes library- and so much moreGet Apple TV and enjoy it!
This is are second Apple TV for another room.  It is great, love the new HBO to GO.  It would be nice if Apple added the NFL Sunday Ticket

This is a small unit easily connected to any HDMI capable device. It allows you to mirror your itunes from any device. The one drawback is that you can't stream non-itunes videos from your computer. It has a bunch of applications preloaded (Netflix, Hulu, Vudu etc) and the remote works like a champ. You can also download a remote app for your iphone/ipad which makes controlling the system very simple. I love this little box.

This is astonishing to me that I cannot do a true "mirror" from my iPod screen to the big screen. Specifically I bought this device so that I could launch the HBO Go app and watch my paid subscription through Airplay on the Apple TV. But the app says it doesn't support HDMI output. It's unforgivable how limited the Airplay is and how it doesn't truly let you use all your device's apps on the big screen. This fractured experience just makes me want to veto the whole entertainment media establishment. Oh, BTW, the Apple TV is nice, as long as it lasts longer than my Roku (cheap box broke), and I like the movie trailers and all the other content in HD. Very nice.
summary: Airplay is limited to certain apps, no true "mirroring"

reviewText: This is a very easy and simple Apple device to use. It makes your home entertainment centre complete. Love it!

This is a very high quality apple product that blows away the competition. The audio is high fidelity, the look is sleek and ultra-compact. The user menu is easy for a child to navigate and the hook-in to itunes is nothing short of brilliant. Highly recommend using this product. Make sure you have an HDMI cable and an open slot on your TV for using this.I love this setup so much that I'm buying a second one for my neighbor. When I told my neighbor, he was really excited.
This is a very stylish jacket that is well insulated in the cold weather.The shoulders are a little tight so I had to order a size larger than usual.
This is awesome, good picture quality, easy to navigate. I love it . I will recommend this product. no freezing of picture over my WiFi.
This is a wonderful product. I could award 5 stars if Apple can figure out how to connect home network using Windows 7.

This is based on cloud. Cloud is where you have record of purchase with Apple iTunes store. If you purchased a movie on your computer, the APPLE TV allows you to watch it streaming into your TV. Requires internet in broadband capacity to really enjoy this product. Lets you watch Netflix and Hulu as well as Youtube and show flickr dot com slide shows. It has other features yet to tapped in and we are excited to say our household purchased two of these downstairs and upstairs. Apple TV is great to connect your iPad and iPhone to show on TV from different room to share with others and could be used in business situation to show your product video pulled from any youtube account and get the URL from iPhone or iPad while on wifi environment to display directly onto APPLE TV. It requires pairing prior to sending data on to the APPLE TV.

This is beyond my wildest dreams. The number of channels and programs is amazing. I would recommend this product to anyone, especially those who already have Apple products that you can use easily with this product.

This is great for any Apple user as it provides wireless access to any TV or monitor attached to the Apple TV. I use it to display from my iMac, MAC Air, iPhone and iPad. Plus the content available, both pay as you go or subscription services with my cable provider allows me to watch streaming content through the device.

This is great for watching movies off of iTunes or Netflix, and to be able to mirror what you are doing on your iphone or ipad to your TV through this device is really cool. I just hate that Amazon Instant Video is not available. Even if you watch on iPad or Iphone and mirror that to TV through Apple TV, it is blocked. Roku Box would be better for internet TV as it has many more channels and options.
summary: Good for Itunes but not Amazon Prime Video.

reviewText: This is great for watching re-plays of shows through the History Channel and A&E Channel app that I have installed on my iPad.  Picture quality and sound are superb.
summary: Works just as advertised, Great picture

reviewText: This is hands down the best invention ever!!  I love it so much I bought a second and kicked cable.  This has so many features and is constantly updating to provide more access to other TV programs - HBO, Disney Jr, ESPN.  We've had a roku before and in my opinion it doesn't hold a candle to Apple TV.

This is how TVs should work.  You get iTunes movies and TV; Netflix; baseball, hockey, and basketball highlights; Wall Street Journal News on demand; and a whole bunch more..... With AirPlay, you can stream audio, video, and pictures from any iPod, iPad, iPhone, or Mac on your home WiFi network.  My favorite thing to do?  On cleaning day, I use AirPlay to push classic rock from my main iMac to AppleTvs around my house.  Turn up the stereos and/or sound bars and housecleaning turns into a music festival!
summary: You say you want a revolution.....

reviewText: This is just great, everyone in my family enjoys it. My kids love it to play movies or youtube videos. My wife also uses the radio feature alot and youtube also for her morning exercises. Just a great product.

This is just simply amazing. Love being able to push anything from my MacBook, iPad or iPhone directly to my TV at any given time. Some of the included apps like Netflix are amazing as well. Recommend this to anyone who has any Apple product as I mentioned above.

This is like every other device that apple produces, works just as described, enables me to watch movies purchased on ITunes. Netflix is nice and I'd really like it if i could listen to my amazon music & watch prime, but that wasn't the purpose. I purchased this device to share my screen for presentations, it does just that, little  to no latency over a 1 gb network. I have Apples newest airport extreme which does dual bandwidth, I think this helps.

This is my 2nd apple TV, I find the device so easy, intuitive, and useful.  You won't regret getting one of these.  I share my movies on my TV now as a slide show, it is great to easily show your photo stream to friends and family.  Renting movies with a few clicks is one of my favorite uses for Apple TV, and netflix is good too.  This device is the missing link for TVs.
summary: this is my 2nd one, you will not regret buying this device

reviewText: This is my 2nd Apple TV.  I only bought this to update to a 1080p version.  This product interfaces so well with the MAC, the iPad and the iPhone.  Easy to install and within minutes you are showing pictures from you iphone to your big screen TV.  Too many uses to name but if you are thinking of buying one - GET IT! you'll love it.

This is my 2nd one and I love it.  I had to get one for the bedroom since we enjoyed it so much in our Living Room.  Absolutely love this product.  No lag time at all when watching Netflix but that also depends on your Internet connectivity at home.
This is my 3rd Apple TV as a gift.  It's an awesome system, especially if you want to use air play from other devices and play them on your tv.  Can't recommend more highly.  Buy IT.
summary: LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT

reviewText: This is my 3rd Apple TV. I love these things. I have no complaints and would not hesitate to recommend this item.
This is my 4th Apple TV unit cause I'm too lazy to just have one.  I don't have to move the unit from room to room.
This is my second Apple TV and we love them. I have one more room to put one in and we will be fully covered.  We share and use our iPads and Netflix with the Apple TV.

This is my second Apple TV.  I had one of the original ones and this is a definite improvement over what was a great product to start with.  My only complaint is that you can't stream StarzPlay or Showtime through it yet, just HBO.

This is my second Apple TV.  I have one downstairs and bought it solely to watch Yoou Tube concert footage and videos on the big screen.  Apple is expanding their programming.  Unfortunately there is little else they have that interests me that isn't on cable.Like all Apple products Apple TV is easy to use.
This is my second apple TV in the house. We also have a smart TV that makes access to other media services but the apple TV is better, faster for downloads and the quality of the download is superior
This is my second Apple TV. I still use the first one almost daily, so it was only natural that I'd get another when I wanted to expand. The airplay feature is beyond useful!
This is my second Apple TV - it is just as good as the first one!  Easy to setup and very reliable.

This is my second Apple TV.  So convenient to watch movies.  Now I have one in the den and one in the bedroom.  So easy to use ipad and watch on big screen just by using Apple TV. Free shipping is always a plus with Amazon.
This is my second Apple TV. The home sharing feature as well as the iphone mirroring features are my favorite.
This is my second one, goodbye cable and satellite providers no more dishing out money to them, now I control my viewing choice.

This is my third apple TV, I have one attached to every Tv in my home... I do realize that the apps are limited when compared to roku ( I would like to see apps like showtime & max to go added)... but the stream is always smooth and consistent, as long as its connected to 5 GHZ frequency... love the simplicity or the remote but wish it was a little bigger as I am constantly losing it!

This is my third Apple TV.  Love it!  An excellent use of ~$100 if you have a solid iTunes library...and a dedicated "always on" computer/drive running your iTunes library 24x7 that you can tap into.I was surprised, however, to find out that a USED Apple TV was shipped to me...and part of the packaging that would hold a new Apple TV perfectly in place was gone -- the plastic wrap around the outside of the box, the protective plastic around the Apple TV and remotes were part of the mess, but haphazardly replaced, and the cardboard "guides" inside the box that keep eveything in place weren't there.  When I opened the box the remote control was "floating around" freely in the larger box's packaging...it had completely slipped out of the Apple TV box.  Scuffed up.  VERY unlike Amazon!  PLEASE DON'T LET YOUR AWESOME QUALITY CONTROL SLIP AMAZON!!!  I have been a happy customer for years and want to remain so.Also I think this was the FIRST time that my shipment has been late.  Usually UPS and on time or early.  This was FedEx and a day late!?!?!
summary: AWESOME Device for the Money...but beware of re-packaging

reviewText: This is my third Apple TVs for our home.  It is as good as the first one we got when Apple TV first came out.  Most new "smart" TVs can't "AirPlay" with iPad and iPhones.  Therefore, having an Apple TV is essential if you want to display pictures or play video from iPads/iPhones on your big screen TVs.
summary: Expect Nothing Less of Apple Products

reviewText: This is one of my most favorite product that I ever ordered from amazon. My family and I watched all days. I have cancelled my TV service since I got this Apple TV because I got everything I want to see.
This is our second Apple TV. We loved our first so much we had to get another one. Shipped quickly and the price is right.

This is our second of the current Apple TV models, one for upstairs and one for downstairs. They are indispensable. We have a large video catalog on iTunes, both movies and TV shows, and the Apple TVs let you play content within seconds, right to the big screen. I think people assume Apple TVs are only used for streaming content from the web, and while it can do this, it also supports your local content very well. So we use them for playing our own content, streaming shows and movies from Netflix and other outlets, and displaying photos. A nice touch is that you can be watching a movie downstairs, and decide to finish it off upstairs. Turn on Apple TV upstairs and your most recent program is right there, and when you play it, it asks if you want to resume from where you left off. Very convenient.
summary: Very useful, and much misunderstood, I think

reviewText: This is probably the best ever streaming device. In y opinion it is better than roku or any of e other streaming boxes. At under a hundred bucks its a steal. The tech is proven and intuitive. If you've used an iPhone iPad or iPod touch you will figure this out in seconds. Those are some of the reasons I've given it 5 stars.You can get sports subscription streams, Netflix and Hulu plus, all require subscriptions. I'm unsure of amazon prime. I've read that there isn't an app but there is a workaround using amigos device and airplay.I use streaming apps quite a bit and even though I have cable uverse with all the pay channels I still find myself watching streaming media at home. I like being able to quickly find and watch a movie I want without any additional hook ups or hardware.When family or friends visit I like to stream a folder of pictures, maybe from the last holiday we spent together, maybe from an adventure, he'll maybe you enjoy the kinds of pictures that aren't appropriate for everyone. You can quickly separate your shots into folders or albums and share just the album you want with your guests on a nice tv screen. Beats passing your iphone around to everyone.Based on apple being the dominant force in streaming, media, streaming media and media streams I would recommend this over similar boxes. None at this point will fully replace the cable experience but if you subscribe to Hulu plus and Netflix you can watch most or all of your shows within a day or two of airing for under $20/month.

This is really just plug and play if you are using apple products. I plugged it in and connected it to our wireless. I downloaded a software update, which allows us to use Hulu. It is so easy to use. It works flawlessly. The interface is brilliant compared to what comes on our Vizio TV set. If I want to stream music over apple tv, I just open up iTunes and click on the AirPlay button. Same goes for photos and vidoes, etc. The only annoyance is that I have not been successful in getting Amazon videos to work. I can hear the audio, but the video does not show. I use my ipad or iphone as a remote. Great system, better than V Beam, which stopped working two OS upgrades back.
This is something I wanted will help me save on my cable bill. I can view several different movie apps (you have to pay for Hulu).
This is so much fun and easy to use small lightweight and portable apple you did it again will buy again if I need a gift
This is such a great product with a price that is awesome. I have two at home and can't get enough of it. The only thing Apple should consider is embedding more streaming services to the box.
summary: Easy setup and great HD images.

reviewText: This is such a neat Apple product - I never thought it would be so useful when I bought it, but I find myself watching Netflix and HBO Go, sharing music, and screen-sharing almost every day.I'm constantly amazed at how well it can stand up to - and compensate for - a little bit of network congestion.My only complaint about the interfaces within it (e.g. the Netflix app or the HBO app or whatever) is that it's really difficult to navigate and find things.  You can't watch an entire season in sequence (without going back to the menu and selecting the next episode).  I think that could really be improved with a "Play All" button or "Play in Sequence" or something like that.  We have to figure out what episode is next and which we already watched and it is just a tad annoying.We also use a second unit all the time in our photography studio to share photos from our Mac to a large screen TV for clients.  It would work equally well for showing photos off to visitors and family!
summary: I LOVE Apple TV, but the interface could be a lot better

reviewText: This is such a simple solution. Instead of plugging a laptop into the wall, and then plugging the laptop into the TV –– you can just stream everything in a very energy efficient and space efficient package with a great interface. Yes, you need to pay for everything (Netflix subscription, HBO subscription, pay for iTunes movies and TV) but it works very well. In addition, with iPads, iPhones, and newer Mac, you can put whatever is on your display onto your TV, wirelessly. It's a great device!
summary: What a great way to watch TV and Movies

reviewText: This is the 3rd Apple TV  device I have purchased... If I had a 4th I would purchase another. Easy to set up and never a problem.
summary: Love Apple TV.... No more cable for me!

reviewText: This is the 3rd one I've order - one for each room.  Easy and connects easily to all my favorite media outlets and itunes libraries
summary: How are you living without it?

reviewText: This is the Apple version of a Roku streaming device. Integrates beautifully with my ipad, macbook pro, iphone, etc. What more can I say, Apple has done it again!
This is the best $99 I have spent on any type of computer product. I stream music to it, movies, anything that is playing on my iPad or iPhone can be sent to it as well. Love it.

This is the coolest little black box you will ever own.  It just works.  And all of a sudden you're watching streaming video, Netflix, mirroring your phone, iPad, or computer screen, and more. I'm buying some more.
summary: A must-have accessory for every TV

reviewText: This is the fourth Apple TV I've purchased. Having used the new Roku and Chromecast extensively, I simply cannot see how someone passes on purchasing an Apple TV. The ease of use of this device is second to none. It requires nothing but itself and internet. As a standalone media unit, it has quite a robust offering. Go to Apple's website to see all the content available, but needless to say, it is fully-loaded, and getting content updates regularly. Pair this with a Mac, iPhone or iPad and you have endless possibilities. I use an Apple TV in my office as a wireless monitor. Over AirPlay I can stream content not yet available on the device (such as Amazon Instant). For its average price these days (around $85) there is nothing that works as well. You won't regret buying one.
summary: There is nothing that functions as well as Apple TV

reviewText: This is the future right here... and it's only getting better.  If you own any other Apple products or use iTunes, this is a must.
This is the greatest addition to my entertainment center.  We use it more than cable by a long shot, between HuluPlus and Netflix.
This is the greatest device I've ever tested for enjoying multimedia , that' s why I'm  suggesting it with all my friends and family
This is the next best thing to cable or satelite if you have a decent over the air antenna for your local channels, it integrates seemlessly with most Apple products with Airplay.
This is the perfect replacement for DVD's, cable, everything. I have both NetFlix and Hulu Plus and with these two monthly subscriptions I was able to replace my cable.

This is the second AppleTV I bought! As nice and small from the outside, it comes now with more apps: HBO GO, Netlfix, Hulu+, music videos and sports.I would love it Apple would include Spotify or Pandora, but I know that would be like shooting themselves I the foot. :P.If you have a large iTunes library, this is the way to go. Using iTunes Match you can play your songs anywhere. What I really love about videos is streaming those from the cloud (everything you had purchased in iTunes Store).Regarding apps like Netflix, is awesome, I can from any title look for actors and director and then look for more from the selected one. I haven't seen that on Roku.I really recommend it. Just take in consideration it might be more expensive than most of the streaming boxes in the market (considering the lower amount of channels). However, the streaming quality is awesome and practically you can take your movies and tv shows with you anywhere!
summary: Very useful! Best client for Netflix and Hulu+

reviewText: This is the second Apple Tv I have purchased.  The first one was from the Apple store and was more expensive.  I would definitely buy this one again.

This is the second Apple TV I've bought.  I wanted my daughter to enjoy it as much as I do.She can log into her Netflix account from it, and also stream movies.  We both enjoy thatwe can view content from our iPhones and iPads on it.  No wires needed!!!
This is the second Apple TV I've purchased. My daughter "borrowed" mine so I bought another. might just buy one more for another room!
summary: What can I say, it's Apple!

reviewText: This is the second Apple TV that I have purchased. Easy to hook-up and use and always reliable. BUY APPLE!

This is the second Apple TV that I purchased.  One was a giftl, and the other I use.  There are other products out there, but  this one plays very nicely with my Ipad and macbook.  The other one is being used in a pc based environment as so far it is performing flawlessly.  I highly recommend the product.

This is the second box I have purchased, this one for my office. More TV shows, movies, music, podcast, etc than you can ever use. Once live sports and live news break the monopoly of cable companies, this will be how we watch TV in the future.

This is the ultimate. Since i use Mac laptop, Apple tablet and iphone, aside from all the amazing channels, including my favorites, itunes festival/movies/music/tv, netflix, yahoo screen, vevo, youtube and many more, the "Airplay" features brings all of my itunes and anything i wanna watch on line plays directly on my 40" TV. Simply Incredible.  No extra cable wires necessary. I can't live without it.

This is what I tell my friends and family about the Apple TV.  If you have an iphone/ipad, or any other Apple products, it's a "must have".  I take it with me when I travel and buy them as gifts.  They're that cool!

This is what Sony was trying to do in the 80's and 90's...just turns out Apple did it better.  If you have Ipad(s)/Ipod(s)/Mac(s) or any combination this is a great device.  Also, I have DirectTv which has a brutal on-demand service...so AppleTV fills that gap too.  Great product...easy to install...easy to use.  Awesome.
This is what the wife wanted and she loves it.  She can watch all her shows and old series through the various features the Apple TV provides.  We now have two of these in a couple of rooms.

This is where my eyes are burned out! I have watched so many movies and the list keeps getting bigger and bigger on Netflix. I do think I will run out of movies in about a year and a half. But that's what happens when you pick off 3 or 4 movies in a day. At the very minimum one movie. Netflix is worth the money and so was the Apple TV. Although now that I know I need a new TV I'm going to buy a smart TV. Then I won't need the money for the Apple TV anymore! But until then they rock!
summary: I love it, love it, love it, really do still love it, really do!

reviewText: This item came boxed looking brand new and works perfect! My daughter paid almost $100 dollars for hers. As long as it keeps working I am super happy with this purchase!
This item came in the mail expeditiously and it works perfect.  Arrived before Christmas Day.  Looks good and works fine.

This item is something that everyone has to have. It is so entertaining. Listening to your favorite music and also your playlist with this item is so easy and the price is so affordable. Another Thanks to Amazon

*** This item seems to be malfunctioning, so I've been trouble-shooting what any correctable problems might be, or if the item itself is defective.  The install was easily taken care of, and the device worked properly for a short period of time, but it soon began to malfunction - quite often.  As of this writing, it is not responding to any commands.  The battery is fine, the reset options have been tried time and time again, but to no avail. I will update this rating if I'm able to determine the problem and fix it.  If not, however, I may soon be returning the device, once I check to see if it's still under warranty.  Makes me disappointed, because I'm all about Apple everything, and always have been. We shall see...

This item works very well with AirPlay... I did end up purchasing an inexpensive third party app in order to display my mid 2010 MacBook Pro via AirPlay, so all is well. It does have one Con: The Netflix user interface is not all that great on this AppleTV, compared to PS3's Netflix user interface.
summary: AirPlay Works better than Expected... Netflix UI = So-So

reviewText: This latest "Black Box" is highly addictive! I'm stuck in a Netflix alternative universe! Seriusly, this will be a gift that keeps on giving.

This little Apple TV packs a punch! There is so much contented that is streaming and it's amazing how many channels are free! It does cover the major channels like netflix,hulu,etc and best of all you can order movies cheaper then your current cable provider!. The key thing you must have is a great internet provider and a good wireless server to prevent any lag issues. I love mine and best of all I can unplug the unit if the kids have the tv and watch it on another tv in another room. It's a Apple so you know it's quality is outstanding!
summary: Don't let the  size fool you!

reviewText: This little box is great. I bought it on impulse without much research and it does everything I wanted and more. I just set itunes to load minimized during startup on our htpc upstairs in our living room and have this box in the basement family room. It allows me to watch any movies from our htpc library, listen to music files, view all of our photos and stream netflix. It will stream even more stuff but nothing else that I use. It streams blueray content without a hiccup over our n wifi. Well worth the price compared to a roku which we had because it does so much more. May not be great if you don't have a computer with a lot of files you want to be able to view in another room but for us its perfect.

This little box is very easy to install  and easy to use.  We have two of them.  We use it primarily for streaming Netflix, but it is easy to purchase current movies and TV shows, too.  Also, the Smithsonian Channel is free and has many documentaries.
This little device is amazing. Now I enjoy my favorite music, videos, movies and more!  All of this while I peruse some of my favorite pictures,.

This little device won't keep your doctor away, but it will certainly make your life better.  At my cabin, I don't have the super duper mega-channel cable that I do at home.  Nevertheless, I watch a lot of movies and TV series through my Apple.  When I go into town, my dog tells me that he doesn't have to watch stupid commercials that way.  I know this because he is always smiling when I come back to the cabin.  I have one at home, too, because I like the way it streams things my smart TV doesn't seem to stream.  Six million channels on the cable and there is nothing worh watching.  Ever feel that way?  An Apple will fix you right up.
This little gismo changed our viewing habits!  It is great, easy to install and amazing!  We even took it on vacation with us andused it on the cable tv in our rental.

This little TV unit for Apple is great.  My wife and I love being able to watch our iTunes selections on the big screen TV and this is a perfect addition to our collection of gadgets for TV enjoyment.
This makes a hub for everything I need,and works very easy. It's great that all of my apple products can use it. I'm buying another one for my daughter.
This only occasionally works. Not sure if this is a problem on my end or with the product. I've done all the troubleshooting and just can't figure out why it only works a third of the time.
summary: This only occasionally works. Not sure if this is ...

reviewText: This product has exceeded all expectations. We purchased the Apple TV unit for two major reasons: first- access to apps such as netflix, pandora, hulu, as well as being able to see videos, photos etc from our other apple devices, and second- VoiceOver accessibility. Both of these features offer multiple options for programming and accessibility, but the best, totally cool feature is AIRPLAY! Using this simple to access mirroring feature we have been able to share the wide world of apps from our iPhones and iMac and send the display straight to the tv screen. Imaging sharing a YouTube video with the whole family with just one step! Super! And Apple's VoiceOver means that everything is accessible for our family member who is visually impaired! One happy family!

This product has significantly enhanced the use and value of our television set. It synced easily with our cloud providing access to all our Apple related content from our iPhones to iPads to Macs. If you have a TV and you are an Apple user this is a very inexpensive  must have product!

This product I have had for about a year and was hoping for Jailbreak but never happened.Other than that the air play works great and the user interface is awesome the product is very strong and has never crashed on me. The product is great and very easy to rent movies.I don't like that the product is closed. Also a big problem for me was that I have a few movies and few tv shows and I cant search by the name or search by anything.Also no pandora on the product itsself

This product is amazing!  We cannot tear ourselves away from watching series of shows available through the apple tv.  The walking dead seasons have been a hit and we are completely caught up now and ready for the new season in feb.  The only thing you need though is an hdmi cable to hook to your tv.  It did not come with one and had to make a run to a game stop store to get after christmas.
This product is amazing! Wish it would would wireless, So far working fast and great photo quality!! 5 star rating!
this product is really good, it works perfect and I have no problem, however is short-range but what I need is well

This product is so easy to use! I originally purchased a roku but could not get it connect correctly on my college network. I returned it and switched to Apple TV. This has worked out great with the new multi-monitor support with Apple's new Maverick OS. I have used it successfully with my macbook pro with retina display.

This product is what Apple is about. Easy to use, convenient, and some provides great entertainment (hours of youtube videos). Extremly nice to rent new movies, eliminate the use of DVDs and so on. It's not a necessity, but a handy product.

This product is wonderful and we are thoroughly enjoying it. We can stream all of our pictures onto our television, play our I tunes music and watch tons of movies. We are using apple tv a lot more than I thought we would. Highly recommend this product.

This product is wonderful, especially with the addition of the HULU Plus option. I barely even watch cable anymore! Make sure you purchase the HD chord along with the Apple TV. I also love that I can listen to my iTunes library from my television.
This product is working great. Easy to stream movie fromThe internet, and work perfectly for wireless. I referto any body must buy it.

This product ties all of my Apple products together nicely. It's so easy to just put a pictures or videos off of your phone right up on the TV or to stream music off Pandora for a party without having to plug your receiver into the headphone jack. The part I use it for the most is watching movies stored on my Mac Mini downstairs. For $10 the program iFlicks will take video files and convert them so they will play in iTunes. It also adds them to the proper playlist and includes a picture and synopsis just as if you had bought it from iTunes making the Apple TV a great investment. Free shipping and no tax on Amazon seals the deal!
summary: Great if you already have Apple everything!

reviewText: This product was a HUGE disappointment.  I had ordered a Chrome cast and it worked better because I can multi-task on the ipad while streaming and the Apple TV you cant.  Epic FAIL!
This product was easy to use and easy to setup. I had no problems hooking it up to my TV and then linking it to my iTunes, Netflix and Hulu account. I am very happy with my Apple TV.
This product was shipped quickly and works just as described.  Plugged it in and within a minute was connected to the internet and away.

This product worked great when I first got it but after I installed the first updatemy iphone 4, iphone 5, and ipad 2 will not connect using the airplay anymore which is the main reason I bought this thing. Very dissapointing.

This product works great with the other Apple items I have in the house.  I know Chrome and Roku have similar products, and honestly, you can't go wrong with any of them.  However, if you are looking for a bunch of free stuff, then you will be disappointed.  The majority of the good things added to  Apple TV cost money to use.  But, if you have a Macbook or iPhone/iPad, then you can mirror things from your tablet or phone to the TV.  There are some free things on here like YouTube and some sports or news apps, but Netflix, Hulu Plus require a subscription and HBO to Go doesn't work with all Cable providers.

This purchase was actually a gift, because I have had my Apple TV for about 4 months. When first getting the product it's honestly amazing how tiny it is. Then you plug it in, and let me tell you, if your T.V. is Hi-Def you need the HDMI hook-up instead of the RGB Component, trust me.  Very Responsive and Aesthetically Pleasing UI, with just about every little "app" you could use.  The only real downside would be the fact that iTunes charges $5 to rent a movie, but I guess you just can't win them all.
This simple to install and use device has significantly expand our viewing choices. Recommend it to anyone who wants to no longer be tied to network TV.

This small piece of technology enabled me to share whatever photo, video or webpage in my iphone 4s, ipad 2, or MacBook Air with my family. It's amazing how it works on its own with all the devices connected to my home network without any installation whatsoever. I have 4 Apple TV 3rd Generation installed at home in 4 different rooms, and whenever I click on AirPlay icon I instantly get the list of four rooms to choose from. It's just like magic!
This thing always works, it's easy to setup, it's easy to operate. I have an inherent delay right when a show/movie starts - but after starting it's never had an issue.

This thing can pretty much access all your purchases in the cloud (except apps), and stream them to it (while only storing the data until no longer needed)! The perfect Apple iCloud companion for those who are needy for space on their PC, Mac, or iDevice! It can even do a lot more things than just access your iCloud content. It can share audio with Apple Home Sharing linked devices through the AirPlay service (requires Wi-Fi, and Ethernet devices must have a direct connection through the router), and it can access basic and premium services (like YouTube, Netflix, Hulu Plus, The Weather Channel, and more)! However, the only thing I wish it had was the ability to stream Live TV through your Local Cable or Satellite TV provider (or even a DTV antenna), just one of your choice! Hopefully, the next generation will have these extremely useful features, and more! If they do so, I literally will stop at nothing just to trade it in for credit towards the next generation! But..., only the company that offers the highest Trade-In value will earn the right for the future exchange! So (for example) if Amazon can't beat Apple's offer, they may lose out on the action!For right now, this product simply delivers what I need it for at this time, and I'm not regretting this purchase..., at all!Apple launches new devices faster than any other competitor, so please try to wait for the next generation before you buy!But..., if this is all you want, then I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants it exactly for this purpose!
summary: No more storing all iCloud data on your iDevice or Computer

reviewText: This thing is awesome. If you use other apple products, and have a television, it is a must have.Like all apple products, everything 'just works'. Check out built in VEVO for background music videos for your next party. Entertain yourself with selections from Vimeo and YouTube, watch your favorite flicks with Hulu or Netflicks.Looking at a cool picture on your iPhone? Throw it up on the big screen for everybody to see.The onscreen menus and display is eons ahead of the other products on the market.This is by far the best $100 I've spent on multimedia. Ever.

This thing is awesome. iPhotos, iTunes, Streaming Radio, YouTube, DailyMotion, or just your Apple computer screen (e.g., stream movies from your hard drive with no . Works great with iPhones and iPads, too... and it's cheap!  Plus you can jailbreak it, stream content without worry of the heavy-handed MPAA (Cinavia, etc.) ruining your home theatre experience.

This thing is everything. Every single day i use it because i don't live in the US but i always watch the tv shows there, so i bought this and I'm completely in shock of how awesome it is. Would definitely recommand it to you all out there :)

This thing is great; installation was a breeze (literally plug and play!) and now the 5000 plus family photos that reside on the computer are available for viewing on our tv, either as a slide show with music from our iTunes, or as a screen saver while the Apple TV is idle. Works beautifully with amazon prime, Netflix, etc. with plenty of free content from Crackle, PBS, etc. It also allows me to stream content from our iPads and iPod touch, which is a great way to share photos and videos with a group of people.
This thing is great. It has a few glitches every now and then, but being able to stream music and video wirelessly is great. And being able to watch netflix without a laptop is icing on the cake.
This thing looked and felt cheap. It didn't fit snug. After a few uses, it just fell off. You get what you pay for.

This thing was awesome out of the box.  Now, after several "updates" I want to throw it out of a moving car.  During playback audio will completely drop out.  To get it back you have to rewind and play again.  In the middle of a show a black screen with dialogue saying "error can not play content" will just suddenly appear.  You have to restart the show again.  I've had the error screen appear twice during one 20 minute show.  And of course if you try to reset the box to factory settings and original OS version, it won't let you unless you have a wireless connection because it automatically re-installs the latest updates.  Keep in mind all these playback issues occur using Netflix.Because everything I own is Mac I give this thing one star for Airplay and a second star for the iTunes radio/podcast playback.  I do love those two features.
summary: If you're not a Mac house, get the Roku.

reviewText: This tight and easily set up device is just what I would expect from Apple.  Though to really enjoy the unit a membership to Netflix or Hulu is needed, it is an able substitute to cable television for the infrequent viewer.

This tiny little box replaced an old "internet aware DVD player". The Netflix video resolution is better with the Apple TV and it even seems to sound better. I chose the Apple TV over the cheaper Roku box because we have 3 Apple computers in the house and it is fun to be able to show photos and play music from the computers.
This took a little getting used to the remote, but the options it provides for viewing are great.  Highly recommend

This TV was easy to set up and coordinate with my itunes account. It has many capabilities and is easy to use. It is fun to use photos as a screen saver while listening to playlists and other music. Videos from You Tube can be viewed on the TV screen, as well as Hulu Plus and Netflix streaming.The only reason I am not giving it five stars is because it seems to not hold my connection to my iphone 4S. I am able to connect my phone and complete a mirror image, but I then lose the connection. This may be due to the firewall on the WiFi, or may be due to using a slightly older phone? I will continue to explore this issue and update if a solution is found. Since I have many capabilities of viewing videos, I am not sure I will miss this feature. But, it would be an important feature for someone who planned to watch movies via the mirror image of the phone.

This unit replaces an older and more expensive version. I had to work out some problems and had Apple suggest a reset. So far so good. Also, it appears that an infrared button (attached for better remote connection) was at fault. A gummy substance from the fastener had gummed up the devices eye. Having removed the eye and doing a thorough cleaning of the face, along with the reset has helped dispose of the problem. Netflix off of this device is a great have for me. Be advised that Amazon's version of streaming is not available. Beating iTunes pricing on movies makes this understandable. A new blue ray box will get me around this eventually. Sooner than later, since I feel Apple, as rich as it is, gets far too much for its movies.
This was a birthday gift for myself.  Its awesome to have a small unit like this that works seamlessly with my iphone and ipad.  I think I will purchase a second one for my bedroom.
This was a Christmas gift for my boyfriend.  He is an Apple person, so he loved that he can link all of his different devices with the Apple TV.  He is very pleased.
This was a Christmas present for my husband, and it made him extremely happy.  He played with it all day like a little kid.  Lol!
This was a gift for myself and I absolutely love it!!!! I recommend it to everyone! It's awesome! So happy!
This was a gift for my son and his family. They love it! they use it every day great performance.
This was a gift for my son. He has installed it on his home network and TV and is thoroughly enjoying the features. This was a great buy for a Christmas gift.
This was a gift for my son. He is very pleased with it. It does what he needs and is compact.
This was a gift that my son wanted to give my daughter-in-law for Mother's Day.  She loved it.  Met all her expectations and was a great price.

This was a great addition to expand the use of other Apple devices such as an Apple laptop, iPad or iPhone. All these devices can be connected to your TV through this box. Set-up is simple and immediate. Hint: make sure that the operating software on ALL your items is up to date or you will have problems connecting.

This was a great addition to my other Apple products and I love the AirPlay option but just don't forget that little remote when you travel! It took me forever how to figure out how to set it up without the remote when I went out of town but besides that everything is good. I hope to eventually cut the cable cord and get rid of DirecTV.
This was a joke and waste of money , could have picked better ones at Walmart . they are hard to fit in the phone

This was an awesome purchase! My son was so surprised to open this! He loves this addition to his electronics collection and uses it for sharing things with his youth group and friends. Great price, too!
This was an item on my son's wish list for Christmas.  He likes it very much. He's happy, I'm happy.

This was a present and I was really worried if this would work as well as people do mention. Well, Apple TV exceeded all of our expectations. This is another Apple product that really has no shortcomings!

This was easy to hook up - I already had a Netflix account so it was great to watch movies on my big-screen TV instead of the computer.The only negative would be the remote - it's so tiny and if you lose it, you're screwed.  There are no buttons on the unit to change channels, applications, etc.
This was easy to install.  Great picture and sound quality.  Movies look and sound fantastic.  I would recommend this to anyone with an iTunes account

This was easy to set up and works as advertised. However, it does not directly stream Amazon streaming. It only mirrors it so you do not get a full screen presentation. Hulu Plus is streamed a bit choppy in moving scenes as well.I added the digital optical audio cable so I could use my receiver with it. Works like a charm.Compared to the Roku I sent back, this works like a charm. I would prefer a Smart TV so I would have fewer remotes to deal with, but the price difference is staggering. If it actually streamed Amazon directly, I would give it five stars.
summary: It Works, Just not so well on Amazon streaming

reviewText: This was easy to set up, small and compact and full of entertainment . Can't go wrong with this , my kids live it

This was everything I expected and then some.  It seemlessly integrated both our home computers into the network so we can play music, home videos and movies from our iTunes accounts residing on our computers on the tv and home stereo.
This was just as described and my daughter loved it. Packaged well too. This saved me from having to hook another TV up to my satellite.

This was my second Apple TV.  It had a problem where it did not connect to my network.  Actually it didn't even see any networks.  Must have had an issue on the board.  My other works fine.  I won't ding the rating as I really like this product.

This was my third AppleTV, and it keeps getting better, all for 99 bucks. My home is an Apple world, and the AppleTV ties it all together seamlessly into my living room, and now in any other room since I have two others. I love being able to play my music, movies, Pandora, the new iTunes Radio, Netflix, YouTube, etc. all right on my home theater system and control it all from my iPhone or iPad. The ability to browse something on my iPhone or iPad and quickly throw it up to my home theater via AirPlay is just awesome.  My only beef is the lack of analog audio outputs that I had on my First Generation AppleTV.
